  23+ 8E25
  24+ 8E25              ; Message to enqeue is a string held at DE that must be terminated in \0
  25+ 8E25              ;                                       IYH = timer for message
  26+ 8E25 3A 8E 97     EnqueMessage:           ld      a,(MessageCount)                    ; Maximum message count check
  27+ 8E28                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng    MAXMESSAGES            ; we do not enque if queue is full
  27+ 8E28 FE 05       >                        cp    MAXMESSAGES
  27+ 8E2A D0          >                        ret	 nc
  28+ 8E2B 3C                                   inc     a
  29+ 8E2C 32 8E 97                             ld      (MessageCount),a                    ; get ready for next message
  30+ 8E2F 4F           .AddMessage:            ld      c,a
  31+ 8E30 3A 8F 97                             ld      a,(MessageCurrent)                  ; a = current message id + count + 1
  32+ 8E33 81                                   add     c                                   ;
  33+ 8E34                                      JumpIfALTNusng MAXMESSAGES, .ReadyToAdd     ; a = a modulus 5 (note we can only hit 5 messages
  33+ 8E34 FE 05       >                        cp      MAXMESSAGES
  33+ 8E36 DA 3B 8E    >                        jp		c, .ReadyToAdd
  34+ 8E39 D6 05        .CircularQueue:         sub     MAXMESSAGES                         ; so only need 1 cycle of modulus
  35+ 8E3B 21 37 98     .ReadyToAdd:            ld      hl,MessageTimeout                   ; write out message display time
  36+ 8E3E ED 31                                add     hl,a                                ; as some may be brief messages
  37+ 8E40 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ;
  38+ 8E41 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                               ;
  39+ 8E43 77                                   ld      (hl),a                              ;
  40+ 8E44 79                                   ld      a,c                                 ; get back index
  41+ 8E45 21 90 97                             ld      hl,MessageIndex
  42+ 8E48                                      HLEquAddrAtHLPlusA                          ; hl = target location for message
  42+ 8E48 CB 27       >                    sla         a
  42+ 8E4A ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  42+ 8E4C 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
  42+ 8E4D 23          >                    inc         hl
  42+ 8E4E 66          >                    ld          h,(hl)
  42+ 8E4F 6F          >                    ld          l,a
  43+ 8E50 EB                                   ex      de,hl                               ; de = destination, hl = message
  44+ 8E51                                      ldCopyTextAtHLtoDE                          ; copy over text as we have done the rest
  44+ 8E51 7E          >.CopyLoop:              ld      a,(hl)
  44+ 8E52 12          >                        ld      (de),a
  44+ 8E53 FE 00       >                        cp      0
  44+ 8E55 CA 5C 8E    >                        jp      z,.DoneCopy

  44+ 8E59 13          >                        inc     de

  44+ 8E5C             >.DoneCopy:

1028  8FAB                  include "./Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm
   1+ 8FAB              ; We enter here with hl pointing at XX16 and bc = XX15 value
   2+ 8FAB              ; so xx12 = XX15 * XX16 row
   3+ 8FAB              XX12ProcessOneRow:
   4+ 8FAB              XX12CalcXCell:
   5+ 8FAB ED 4B 83 C0          ld		bc,(UBnkXScaled)
   6+ 8FAF 5E           		ld		e,(hl)								    ; get orientation ZX
   7+ 8FB0 23           		inc		hl
   8+ 8FB1 56           		ld		d,(hl)                                  ; so now e = xx16 value d = xx16 sign
   9+ 8FB2 7A           		ld		a,d
  10+ 8FB3 A8                   xor     b
  11+ 8FB4 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit                            ; a = XX 16 sign
  12+ 8FB6 DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; orientation sign to ixh
  13+ 8FB8 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  14+ 8FB9 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  15+ 8FBB 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  16+ 8FBC E5           		push	hl
  17+ 8FBD 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  18+ 8FBF 60           		ld		h,b
  19+ 8FC0 69           		ld		l,c
  20+ 8FC1 CD 07 A9     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  21+ 8FC4 22 B1 94     		ld		(XX12PVarResult1),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result, we only want to use high byte later
  22+ 8FC7 DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  23+ 8FC9 32 B8 94     		ld		(XX12PVarSign1),a					    ; S = sign  not sign 1 and 2 are reversed in memory so that fetchign back will put 1 in high byte 2 in low byte
  24+ 8FCC E1           		pop		hl
  25+ 8FCD              XX12CalcYCell:
  26+ 8FCD ED 4B 85 C0          ld		bc,(UBnkYScaled)
  27+ 8FD1 23           		inc		hl
  28+ 8FD2 5E           		ld		e,(hl)							    	; get orientation ZX
  29+ 8FD3 23           		inc		hl
  30+ 8FD4 56           		ld		d,(hl)
  31+ 8FD5 7A           		ld		a,d
  32+ 8FD6 A8                   xor     b
  33+ 8FD7 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit
  34+ 8FD9 DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; XX16 orientation sign to ixh
  35+ 8FDB 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  36+ 8FDC E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  37+ 8FDE 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  38+ 8FDF E5           		push	hl
  39+ 8FE0 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  40+ 8FE2 60           		ld		h,b
  41+ 8FE3 69           		ld		l,c
  42+ 8FE4 CD 07 A9     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  43+ 8FE7 22 B3 94     		ld		(XX12PVarResult2),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result
  44+ 8FEA DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  45+ 8FEC 32 B7 94     		ld		(XX12PVarSign2),a					    ; S = sign
  46+ 8FEF E1           		pop		hl
  47+ 8FF0              XX12CalcZCell:
  48+ 8FF0 ED 4B 87 C0          ld		bc,(UBnkZScaled)
  49+ 8FF4 23           		inc		hl
  50+ 8FF5 5E           		ld		e,(hl)								    ; get orientation ZX
  51+ 8FF6 23           		inc		hl
  52+ 8FF7 56           		ld		d,(hl)
  53+ 8FF8 7A           		ld		a,d
  54+ 8FF9 A8                   xor     b
  55+ 8FFA E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit
  56+ 8FFC DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; orientation sign to ixh
  57+ 8FFE 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  58+ 8FFF E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  59+ 9001 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  60+ 9002 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  61+ 9004 60           		ld		h,b
  62+ 9005 69           		ld		l,c
  63+ 9006 CD 07 A9     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  64+ 9009 22 B5 94     		ld		(XX12PVarResult3),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result
  65+ 900C DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  66+ 900E 32 B9 94     		ld		(XX12PVarSign3),a					    ; S = sign
  67+ 9011              XX12CalcCellResult:
  68+ 9011 2A B1 94     		ld		hl,(XX12PVarResult1)				    ; X Cell Result
  69+ 9014 ED 5B B3 94  		ld		de,(XX12PVarResult2)				    ; Y Cell Result
  70+ 9018 ED 4B B7 94  		ld		bc,(XX12PVarSign2)					    ; b = var 1 result sign c = var 2 result signs
  71+ 901C              XX12MSBOnly:
  72+ 901C 6C           		ld		l,h									    ; now move results into lower byte so / 256
  73+ 901D 5A           		ld		e,d									    ; for both results
  74+ 901E AF           		xor		a									    ;
  75+ 901F 67           		ld		h,a									    ;
  76+ 9020 57           		ld		d,a									    ; so set high byte to 0
  77+ 9021 CD B2 AE     		call	ADDHLDESignBC                           ;  XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; returns with HL = result1 + result 2 signed in a
  78+ 9024 47           		ld		b,a									    ; move sign into b ready for next calc
  79+ 9025 3A B9 94     		ld		a,(XX12PVarSign3)					    ; result of the calcZ cell
  80+ 9028 4F           		ld		c,a									    ; goes into c to align with DE
  81+ 9029 ED 5B B5 94  		ld		de,(XX12PVarResult3)				    ; now add result to Result 3
  82+ 902D 5A           		ld		e,d                                     ; d = result /256
  83+ 902E 16 00        		ld		d,0									    ; and only us high byte
  84+ 9030 CD B2 AE     		call	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; returns with HL = result and a = sign
  85+ 9033 C9           		ret											    ; hl = result, a = sign
  86+ 9034              								    ; hl = result, a = sign
  87+ 9034
  88+ 9034              XX12EquNodeDotTransMat:							    ; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
  89+ 9034              ;...X cell
  90+ 9034 21 56 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow0x0     			; process orientation matrix row 0
  91+ 9037 CD AB 8F             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
  92+ 903A 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
  93+ 903B 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
  94+ 903C B0           		or		b
  95+ 903D 32 8A C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
  96+ 9040 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
  97+ 9041 32 89 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
  98+ 9044              ;...Y cell
  99+ 9044 21 5E C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow1y0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 100+ 9047 CD AB 8F             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 101+ 904A 47           		ld		b,a
 102+ 904B 7C           		ld		a,h
 103+ 904C              ;		ld		a,l
 104+ 904C B0           		or		b
 105+ 904D 32 8C C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 106+ 9050 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 107+ 9051 32 8B C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for
 108+ 9054              ;...Z cell
 109+ 9054 21 66 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow2z0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 110+ 9057 CD AB 8F             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 111+ 905A 47           		ld		b,a
 112+ 905B 7C                   ld		a,h
 113+ 905C              ;		ld		a,l
 114+ 905C B0           		or		b
 115+ 905D 32 8E C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12zSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 116+ 9060 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 117+ 9061 32 8D C0             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a						; that is result done for
 118+ 9064 C9                   ret
 119+ 9065
 120+ 9065              XX12EquNodeDotOrientation:							; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
 121+ 9065              ;...X cell
 122+ 9065 21 56 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow0x0     			; process orientation matrix row 0
 123+ 9068 CD AB 8F             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
 124+ 906B 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
 125+ 906C 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
 126+ 906D B0           		or		b
 127+ 906E 32 8A C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 128+ 9071 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 129+ 9072 32 89 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
 130+ 9075              ;...Y cell
 131+ 9075 21 5E C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow1y0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 132+ 9078 CD AB 8F             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 133+ 907B 47           		ld		b,a
 134+ 907C 7C           		ld		a,h
 135+ 907D              ;		ld		a,l
 136+ 907D B0           		or		b
 137+ 907E 32 8C C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 138+ 9081 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 139+ 9082 32 8B C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for
 140+ 9085              ;...Z cell
 141+ 9085 21 66 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow2z0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 142+ 9088 CD AB 8F             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 143+ 908B 47           		ld		b,a
 144+ 908C 7C                   ld		a,h
 145+ 908D              ;		ld		a,l
 146+ 908D B0           		or		b
 147+ 908E 32 8E C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12zSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 148+ 9091 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 149+ 9092 32 8D C0             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a						; that is result done for
 150+ 9095 C9                   ret
 151+ 9096
 152+ 9096              XX12EquNodeDotXX16:					         		; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
 153+ 9096              ;...X cell
 154+ 9096 21 3E C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX     			; process orientation matrix row 0
 155+ 9099 CD AB 8F             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
 156+ 909C 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
 157+ 909D 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
 158+ 909E B0           		or		b
 159+ 909F 32 8A C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 160+ 90A2 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 161+ 90A3 32 89 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
 162+ 90A6              ;...Y cell
 163+ 90A6 21 44 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 164+ 90A9 CD AB 8F             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 165+ 90AC 47           		ld		b,a
 166+ 90AD 7C           		ld		a,h
 167+ 90AE              ;		ld		a,l
 168+ 90AE B0           		or		b
 169+ 90AF 32 8C C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 170+ 90B2 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 171+ 90B3 32 8B C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for
 172+ 90B6              ;...Z cell
 173+ 90B6 21 4A C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 174+ 90B9 CD AB 8F             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 175+ 90BC 47           		ld		b,a
 176+ 90BD 7C                   ld		a,h
 177+ 90BE              ;		ld		a,l
 178+ 90BE B0           		or		b
 179+ 90BF 32 8E C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12zSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 180+ 90C2 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 181+ 90C3 32 8D C0             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a						; that is result done for
 182+ 90C6 C9                   ret
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm

1031  913F                  include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
   1+ 913F 06 09        ScaleXX16Matrix197:     ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
   2+ 9141 0E C5                                ld		c,ConstNorm         ; c = 197
   3+ 9143 21 3E C0                             ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
   4+ 9146 7E           .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		a,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value
   5+ 9147 5F                                   ld		e,a                 ;
   6+ 9148 23                                   inc		hl                  ;
   7+ 9149 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)              ;
   8+ 914A 57                                   ld		d,a                 ;
   9+ 914B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  10+ 914D DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  11+ 914F                                      ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  11+ 914F CB 23       >			   sla e
  11+ 9151 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  12+ 9153 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  13+ 9154 C5                                   push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  14+ 9155 E5                                   push	hl                  ; save HL
  15+ 9156 CD B1 AA                             call	DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC; AEquAmul256DivD; DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	; result in BC = A*256 / 197 or D *512 / 197 = 2.6 * vector element, effectivley the result will always be in c
  16+ 9159 E1                                   pop		hl
  17+ 915A 2B                                   dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  18+ 915B 71                                   ld      (hl),c              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  19+ 915C 23                                   inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  20+ 915D                                  ;    ld      a,(hl)
  21+ 915D                                  ;    and     $80
  22+ 915D DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
  23+ 915F 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  24+ 9160 C1                                   pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  25+ 9161 23                                   inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  26+ 9162 10 E2                                djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  27+ 9164 C9                                   ret
  28+ 9165
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
1032  9165
1033  9165                  include "./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm
   1+ 9165              ;note: DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC as per
   2+ 9165              ;                                   BC = A0
   3+ 9165              ;                                   DE = 0C
   4+ 9165              ;                                   so BC = a * 256 / C
   5+ 9165
   6+ 9165              ; We can cheat here, Speed is always 0 or positive
   7+ 9165              ; z postion will always be positive if we can see it
   8+ 9165
   9+ 9165 EB           InitStarAtHL:           ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  10+ 9166 CD 05 9D                             call    doRND               ; a = random OR bit 5
  11+ 9169 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  12+ 916A F6 08                                or      8                   ; .
  13+ 916C 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; save to x pos
  14+ 916D E6 7F                                and     $7F                 ; a = abs a
  15+ 916F 23                                   inc     hl                  ;
  16+ 9170 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ;
  17+ 9171 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  18+ 9172 CD 05 9D                             call    doRND               ; a = -ve (random / 2)
  19+ 9175 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  20+ 9176 0F                                   rrca                        ; .
  21+ 9177 E6 80                                and     $80                 ; .
  22+ 9179 B6                                   or      (hl)                ; or with
  23+ 917A 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  24+ 917B 23                                   inc     hl
  25+ 917C EB                                   ex      de,hl
  26+ 917D CD 05 9D                             call    doRND
  27+ 9180 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  28+ 9181 F6 04                                or      4
  29+ 9183 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  30+ 9184 23                                   inc     hl
  31+ 9185 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  32+ 9187 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  33+ 9188 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  34+ 9189 CD 05 9D                             call    doRND
  35+ 918C EB                                   ex      de,hl
  36+ 918D 0F                                   rrca
  37+ 918E E6 80                                and     $80
  38+ 9190 B6                                   or      (hl)
  39+ 9191 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  40+ 9192 23                                   inc     hl
  41+ 9193 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  42+ 9194 CD 05 9D                             call    doRND
  43+ 9197 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  44+ 9198 F6 90                                or      144
  45+ 919A 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  46+ 919B 23                                   inc     hl
  47+ 919C F6 70                                or      %01110000
  48+ 919E E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  49+ 91A0 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  50+ 91A1 23                                   inc     hl
  51+ 91A2 C9                                   ret
  52+ 91A3

  54+ 91A4 CD 05 9D                             call    doRND

 100+ 91E9
 101+ 91E9              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
 102+ 91E9 7C           StarsSUBHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
 103+ 91EA E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 104+ 91EC 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 105+ 91ED AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 106+ 91EE                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
 106+ 91EE FA 1C 92    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDEOppSGN
 107+ 91F1 78           .SUBHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 108+ 91F2 B2                                   or      d
 109+ 91F3                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 109+ 91F3 FA FD 91    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameNeg
 110+ 91F6 B7                                   or      a
 111+ 91F7 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 112+ 91F9                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 112+ 91F9 FA 10 92    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 113+ 91FC C9                                   ret
 114+ 91FD 7C           .SUBHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 115+ 91FE E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 116+ 9200 67                                   ld      h,a
 117+ 9201 7A                                   ld      a,d
 118+ 9202 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 119+ 9204 57                                   ld      d,a
 120+ 9205 B7                                   or      a
 121+ 9206 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 122+ 9208                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 122+ 9208 FA 10 92    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 123+ 920B 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 124+ 920C F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
 125+ 920E 67                                   ld      h,a
 126+ 920F C9                                   ret
 127+ 9210              .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:     NegHL
 127+ 9210 AF          >                    xor a
 127+ 9211 95          >                    sub l
 127+ 9212 6F          >                    ld l,a
 127+ 9213 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 127+ 9214 94          >                    sub h
 127+ 9215 67          >                    ld h,a
 128+ 9216 78                                   ld      a,b
 129+ 9217 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 130+ 9219 B4                                   or      h
 131+ 921A 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 132+ 921B C9                                   ret
 133+ 921C B7           .SUBHLDEOppSGN:         or      a
 134+ 921D 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 135+ 921E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 136+ 9220 67                                   ld      h,a
 137+ 9221 7A                                   ld      a,d
 138+ 9222 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 139+ 9224 57                                   ld      d,a
 140+ 9225 19                                   add     hl,de
 141+ 9226 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 142+ 9227 B4                                   or      h
 143+ 9228 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 144+ 9229 C9                                   ret
 145+ 922A
 146+ 922A 7C           StarsADDHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
 147+ 922B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 148+ 922D 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 149+ 922E AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 150+ 922F                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
 150+ 922F FA 47 92    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
 151+ 9232 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 152+ 9233 B2                                   or      d
 153+ 9234                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 153+ 9234 FA 39 92    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
 154+ 9237 19                                   add     hl,de
 155+ 9238 C9                                   ret
 156+ 9239 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 157+ 923A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 158+ 923C 67                                   ld      h,a
 159+ 923D 7A                                   ld      a,d
 160+ 923E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 161+ 9240 57                                   ld      d,a
 162+ 9241 19                                   add     hl,de
 163+ 9242 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 164+ 9244 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 165+ 9245 67                                   ld      h,a
 166+ 9246 C9                                   ret
 167+ 9247 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:         ld      a,h                         ; here HL and DE are opposite  so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 168+ 9248 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 169+ 924A 67                                   ld      h,a
 170+ 924B 7A                                   ld      a,d
 171+ 924C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 172+ 924E 57                                   ld      d,a
 173+ 924F B7                                   or      a
 174+ 9250 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 175+ 9252 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
 176+ 9254 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:  ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 177+ 9255 B4                                   or      h
 178+ 9256 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 179+ 9257 C9                                   ret
 180+ 9258              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:      NegHL
 180+ 9258 AF          >                    xor a
 180+ 9259 95          >                    sub l
 180+ 925A 6F          >                    ld l,a
 180+ 925B 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 180+ 925C 94          >                    sub h
 180+ 925D 67          >                    ld h,a
 181+ 925E 78                                   ld      a,b
 182+ 925F EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 183+ 9261 B4                                   or      h
 184+ 9262 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 185+ 9263 C9                                   ret
 186+ 9264              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 187+ 9264 06 0B        InitialiseStars:        ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 188+ 9266 21 C8 9A                             ld      hl,varDust
 189+ 9269 CD 65 91     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitStarAtHL
 190+ 926C 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 191+ 926E C9                                   ret
 192+ 926F              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 193+ 926F 06 0B        InitialiseHyperStars:   ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 194+ 9271 21 C8 9A                             ld      hl,varDust
 195+ 9274 CD A3 91     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitHyperStarAtHL
 196+ 9277 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 197+ 9279 C9                                   ret
 198+ 927A              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 199+ 927A 06 0B        DustForward:            ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars                  ; get the number of stars to process
 200+ 927C FD 21 C8 9A                          ld      iy,varDust                          ; hl is now a pointer to the dust array
 201+ 9280 C5           StarProcessLoop:        push    bc                                  ; save counter +1
 202+ 9281 FD 7E 05     .Qequ64XSpeedDivZHi:    ld      a,(iy+5)                            ; e  = z high
 203+ 9284 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; d = 0
 204+ 9285 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; de = zhi/256
 205+ 9287 3A 6E 98                             ld      a,(DELTA)                           ; a = speed
 206+ 928A                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .NormalSpeed               ; if we are stationary set speed
 206+ 928A FE 00       >                        cp	0
 206+ 928C C2 90 92    >                        jp	nz,.NormalSpeed
 207+ 928F 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; so it is at least some dust movement
 208+ 9290 47           .NormalSpeed:           ld      b,a                                 ;
 209+ 9291 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                 ; bc = delta * 256
 210+ 9293 CD 25 AB                             call    BC_Div_DE                           ; BC = Speed/Z , HL = remainder
 211+ 9296                                      ShiftHLRight1
 211+ 9296 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 211+ 9298 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 212+ 929A                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; hl = remainder/2 so now 64 * speed / zhi
 212+ 929A CB 3C       >			   srl h
 212+ 929C CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 213+ 929E 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ;
 214+ 929F F6 01                                or      1                                   ; so ensure A is at least 1 for ambient movement
 215+ 92A1 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                               ; preserve A which is also VarQ = 64 * speed / zhi
 216+ 92A3 FD 6E 04 FD  .ZequZMinusSpeedX64:    ld      hl,(iy+4)                           ; hl = z
 216+ 92A7 66 05
 217+ 92A9 ED 5B 6F 98                          ld      de, (DELTA4)                         ; de = delta4 i.e. speed * 64 pre computed
 218+ 92AD CD E9 91                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned
 219+ 92B0                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,ResetStar                  ; if z ended up negative then reset the star
 219+ 92B0 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 219+ 92B2 C2 07 94    >                        jp      nz,ResetStar
 220+ 92B5 FD 75 04 FD                          ld      (iy+4),hl                           ; save new z pos
 220+ 92B9 74 05
 221+ 92BB FD 6E 00 FD  .XEquXPlusXhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; hl  = x
 221+ 92BF 66 01
 222+ 92C1 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 223+ 92C2 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 224+ 92C4 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(x hi)
 225+ 92C5 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 226+ 92C7 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(x hi) * Q
 227+ 92C9 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 228+ 92CA E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 229+ 92CC B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 230+ 92CD 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 231+ 92CE CD 2A 92                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; x = x + (x hi/256 * Q)
 232+ 92D1 7C                                   ld      a,h
 233+ 92D2 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 234+ 92D4                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $70, ResetStar
 234+ 92D4 FE 70       >                        cp     $70
 234+ 92D6 D2 07 94    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 235+ 92D9 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl                           ;
 235+ 92DD 74 01
 236+ 92DF FD 6E 02 FD  .YEquYPlusYhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; hl  = y
 236+ 92E3 66 03
 237+ 92E5 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 238+ 92E6 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 239+ 92E8 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(y hi)
 240+ 92E9 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 241+ 92EB ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(y hi) * Q
 242+ 92ED 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 243+ 92EE E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 244+ 92F0 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 245+ 92F1 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 246+ 92F2 CD 2A 92                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; y = y + (x hi/256 * Q)
 247+ 92F5 7C                                   ld      a,h
 248+ 92F6 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 249+ 92F8                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60, ResetStar
 249+ 92F8 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 249+ 92FA D2 07 94    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 250+ 92FD 7C                                   ld      a,h
 251+ 92FE E6 80                                and     $80
 252+ 9300 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoSecondCheck
 253+ 9302 7C                                   ld      a,h
 254+ 9303                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $20, ResetStar
 254+ 9303 FE 20       >                        cp     $20
 254+ 9305 D2 07 94    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 255+ 9308 FD 75 02 FD  .NoSecondCheck:         ld      (iy+2),hl                           ;
 255+ 930C 74 03
 256+ 930E              ; Now roll
 257+ 930E              ;  6. x = x - alpha * y / 256
 258+ 930E 2A 89 97     .XRoll:                 ld      hl,(ALP1)                           ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 259+ 9311 7D                                   ld      a,l
 260+ 9312 FE 00                                cp      0
 261+ 9314 28 4C                                jr      z,.NoRoll                           ; don;t roll if magnitude is 0
 262+ 9316                                      ;break
 263+ 9316                                      ;ld      a,$80
 264+ 9316                                      ;xor     l                                   ; l = flipped sign as we are rotating stars not us
 265+ 9316 E5                                   push    hl
 266+ 9317 7C                                   ld      a,h
 267+ 9318 E6 80                                and     $80
 268+ 931A 4F           .rxSaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 269+ 931B 55           .rxDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 270+ 931C FD 7E 03                             ld      a,(iy+3)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 271+ 931F 5F                                   ld      e,a
 272+ 9320 E6 80                                and     $80
 273+ 9322 47           .rxBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 274+ 9323 7B           .rxEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 275+ 9324 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 276+ 9326 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 277+ 9327 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 278+ 9329 79                                   ld      a,c
 279+ 932A A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 280+ 932B B2                                   or      d
 281+ 932C 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 282+ 932D FD 6E 00 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 282+ 9331 66 01
 283+ 9333 CD E9 91                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 284+ 9336 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl
 284+ 933A 74 01
 285+ 933C              ;  5. y = y + alpha * x / 256
 286+ 933C              .YRoll:                 ;break
 287+ 933C E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 288+ 933D 7C                                   ld      a,h
 289+ 933E E6 80                                and     $80
 290+ 9340 4F           .rySaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 291+ 9341 55           .ryDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 292+ 9342 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 293+ 9345 5F                                   ld      e,a
 294+ 9346 E6 80                                and     $80
 295+ 9348 47           .ryBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 296+ 9349 7B           .ryEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 297+ 934A E6 7F                                and     $7F
 298+ 934C 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 299+ 934D ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 300+ 934F 79                                   ld      a,c
 301+ 9350 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 302+ 9351 B2                                   or      d
 303+ 9352 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 304+ 9353 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 304+ 9357 66 03
 305+ 9359 CD 2A 92                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 306+ 935C FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 306+ 9360 74 03
 307+ 9362 3A 79 97     .NoRoll:                ld      a,(BET1)
 308+ 9365 FE 00                                cp      0
 309+ 9367 28 22                                jr      z,.NoPitch
 310+ 9369              ;  8. y = y - beta * 256
 311+ 9369 57           .YPitch:                ld      d,a                                 ; d = BET1
 312+ 936A FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)
 313+ 936D 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; e = Y HI
 314+ 936E ED 30                                mul                                         ; de = BET1 * YHi so now D = BETA & YHI / 256
 315+ 9370 5F                                   ld      e,a
 316+ 9371 ED 30                                mul                                         ; so now de = (BETA & Yhi) ^ 2
 317+ 9373                                      ShiftDELeft1                                ; de = 2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2)
 317+ 9373 CB 23       >			   sla e
 317+ 9375 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 318+ 9377 3A 7B 97                             ld      a,(BET2FLIP)                        ; get inverted Sign
 319+ 937A B2                                   or      d
 320+ 937B 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = - (2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2))
 321+ 937C FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)
 321+ 9380 66 03
 322+ 9382 CD 2A 92                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned
 323+ 9385 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 323+ 9389 74 03
 324+ 938B              ; now work out screen pos
 325+ 938B              ; Note two optimistations, write to layer 2 - we get a free removal via double buffer cls
 326+ 938B              ; read z dept than determine hw many pixesl to plot, e.g. 1,2,3,4
 327+ 938B              ;        pop     de
 328+ 938B               ;       call    ProjectStarXToScreen
 329+ 938B                                      ;pop     de
 330+ 938B              .NoPitch:
 331+ 938B FD 7E 01     .ProjectStar:           ld      a,(iy+1)
 332+ 938E 6F                                   ld      l,a
 333+ 938F E6 7F                                and     $7F
 334+ 9391                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegXPt
 334+ 9391 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 334+ 9393 C2 9C 93    >                        jp      nz,StarNegXPt
 335+ 9396 C6 80                                add     a,$80
 336+ 9398 4F                                   ld      c,a
 337+ 9399 C3 A1 93                             jp      StarDoneX
 338+ 939C 47           StarNegXPt:             ld      b,a
 339+ 939D 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 340+ 939F 90                                   sub     b
 341+ 93A0 4F                                   ld      c,a
 342+ 93A1 FD 7E 03     StarDoneX:              ld      a,(iy+3)
 343+ 93A4 6F                                   ld      l,a
 344+ 93A5 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 345+ 93A7                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegYPt
 345+ 93A7 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 345+ 93A9 C2 B2 93    >                        jp      nz,StarNegYPt
 346+ 93AC C6 60                                add     a,$60
 347+ 93AE 47                                   ld      b,a
 348+ 93AF C3 B7 93                             jp      StarDoneY
 349+ 93B2 47           StarNegYPt:             ld      b,a
 350+ 93B3 3E 60                                ld      a,$60
 351+ 93B5 90                                   sub     b
 352+ 93B6 47                                   ld      b,a
 353+ 93B7 3E 92        StarDoneY:              ld      a,L2DustColour
 354+ 93B9 C5                                   push    bc
 355+ 93BA              .DrawStar:              MMUSelectLayer2
 355+ 93BA ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 355+ 93BE CD FF E0       call    l2_plot_pixel
 356+ 93C1 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 357+ 93C4 C1                                   pop    bc
 358+ 93C5                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60,EndofStarsLoop
 358+ 93C5 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 358+ 93C7 D2 F7 93    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 359+ 93CA 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 360+ 93CC 0C                                   inc     c
 361+ 93CD C5                                   push    bc
 362+ 93CE                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 362+ 93CE ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 363+ 93D2 CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 364+ 93D5 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 365+ 93D8 C1                                   pop    bc
 366+ 93D9                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $37,EndofStarsLoop
 366+ 93D9 FE 37       >                        cp     $37
 366+ 93DB D2 F7 93    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 367+ 93DE 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 368+ 93E0 04                                   inc     b
 369+ 93E1 C5                                   push    bc
 370+ 93E2                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 370+ 93E2 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 370+ 93E6 CD FF E0         call    l2_plot_pixel
 371+ 93E9 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 372+ 93EC C1                                   pop    bc
 373+ 93ED 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 374+ 93EF 0D                                   dec     c
 375+ 93F0                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 375+ 93F0 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 375+ 93F4 CD FF E0         call    l2_plot_pixel
 376+ 93F7 C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 377+ 93F8 FD E5        NextStarLoop3:          push    iy                                      ; +1
 378+ 93FA E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0
 379+ 93FB ED 34 06 00                          add     hl,6
 380+ 93FF E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 381+ 9400 FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 382+ 9402 05                                   dec     b
 383+ 9403 C2 80 92                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 384+ 9406 C9                                   ret
 385+ 9407 C1           ResetStar:              pop     bc                                      ; 0
 386+ 9408 FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1 (current star)
 387+ 940A E1                                   pop     hl                                      ; 0
 388+ 940B CD 65 91                             call    InitStarAtHL
 389+ 940E C3 F8 93                             jp      NextStarLoop3
 390+ 9411              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 391+ 9411 FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 392+ 9414 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 393+ 9417 6F                                   ld      l,a
 394+ 9418 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 395+ 941A 47                                   ld      b,a
 396+ 941B CD C8 AA                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 397+ 941E 7D                                   ld      a,l
 398+ 941F                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 398+ 941F CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 398+ 9421 C2 2C 94    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 399+ 9424              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 400+ 9424 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 401+ 9426 26 00                                ld          h,0
 402+ 9428 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 403+ 9429 C3 33 94                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 404+ 942C              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 405+ 942C 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 406+ 942E 26 00                                ld          h,0
 407+ 9430                                      ClearCarryFlag
 407+ 9430 B7          >                        or a
 408+ 9431 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 409+ 9433              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 410+ 9433 7D                                   ld          a,l
 411+ 9434 32 20 9B                             ld          (varStarX),a
 412+ 9437 C9                                   ret
 413+ 9438
 414+ 9438 FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 415+ 943B FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 416+ 943E 6F                                   ld          l,a
 417+ 943F E6 7F                                and         $7F
 418+ 9441 47                                   ld          b,a
 419+ 9442 CD C8 AA                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 420+ 9445 7D                                   ld          a,l                                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 421+ 9446                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 421+ 9446 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 421+ 9448 C2 53 94    >                        jp      nz,StarNegativeYPoint
 422+ 944B                                  ;StarPositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
 423+ 944B 2E 60                               ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 424+ 944D                                      ClearCarryFlag
 424+ 944D B7          >                        or a
 425+ 944E ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 426+ 9450 C3 58 94                             jp          StarStoreYPoint
 427+ 9453              StarNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
 428+ 9453 2E 60                                ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 429+ 9455 26 00                                ld          h,0
 430+ 9457 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
 431+ 9458              StarStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 432+ 9458 7D                                   ld          a,l
 433+ 9459 32 21 9B                             ld          (varStarY),a
 434+ 945C C9                                   ret
 435+ 945D
 436+ 945D

   3+ 945E 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 9462 7D
   4+ 9463 5D 94        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 9465 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 9467 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 946A 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 946C 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 9470              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 9470
  11+ 9470              memfill_dma:
  12+ 9470              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 9470              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 9470 32 5D 94     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 9473              .set_target:
  16+ 9473 22 6A 94     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 9476              .set_length:
  18+ 9476 ED 53 65 94  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 947A              .write_dma:
  20+ 947A 21 5E 94     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 947D 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 947F 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 9481 ED B3        	otir
  24+ 9483 C9           	ret
  25+ 9484
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
1040  9484                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 9484
   2+ 9484 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 9488 7D
   3+ 9489 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 948B 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 948D 14 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 9490 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 9492 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 9496              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 9496
  10+ 9496              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 9496              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 9496              .set_target:
  13+ 9496 22 90 94     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 9499              .set_source:
  15+ 9499 ED 53 89 94  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 949D              .set_length:
  17+ 949D ED 43 8B 94  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 94A1              .write_dma:
  19+ 94A1 21 84 94     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 94A4 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 94A6 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 94A8 ED B3        	otir
  23+ 94AA C9           	ret
  24+ 94AB
# file closed: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm

 177+ 94BA 00 00 00...  Keys					DS	40          ; This is the list of key states for all the VK keys presssed i.e. VK_CAPS through to VK_B
 178+ 94E2              c_KeyBoardLen 			equ $ - Keys
 179+ 94E2 00 00 00...  RawKeys					DS	8
 180+ 94EA FE FD FB F7  KeyAddrTab				DB	$FE, $FD, $FB, $F7, $EF, $DF, $BF, $7F
 180+ 94EE EF DF BF 7F
 181+ 94F2              ; Now keyboard map lists each game key and the corresponding address in the Keys table to get the value. This way redefining keys is just a case
 182+ 94F2              ; of updating this table with the respective location to look up
 183+ 94F2              ; key list sequence is in table above
 184+ 94F2 C9 94 CA 94  KeyboardMap             DW  Keys+KeyCode_Front        ,Keys+KeyCode_Aft          ,Keys+KeyCode_Left         ,Keys+KeyCode_Right        ,Keys+KeyCode_RollLeft
 184+ 94F6 CB 94 CC 94
 184+ 94FA D4 94
 185+ 94FC D3 94 C4 94                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_RollRight    ,Keys+KeyCode_Dive         ,Keys+KeyCode_Climb        ,Keys+KeyCode_Accellerate  ,Keys+KeyCode_Decellerate
 185+ 9500 BF 94 C5 94

 186+ 9506 DD 94 C8 94                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_FireLaser    ,Keys+KeyCode_TargetMissle ,Keys+KeyCode_FireMissile  ,Keys+KeyCode_UnarmMissile ,Keys+KeyCode_ECM

 187+ 9518 DB 94

 201+ 956A
 202+ 956A              ; mapping of a code to the lookup table Keyboard map. So if you are using an addr_Pressed you can then fetch from KeyboardMap the address in Keys
 203+ 956A              ; for the raw key press status
 204+ 956A              addr_Pressed_Front         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Front
 205+ 956A              addr_Pressed_Aft           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Aft
 206+ 956A              addr_Pressed_Left          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Left
 207+ 956A              addr_Pressed_Right         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Right
 208+ 956A              addr_Pressed_RollLeft      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollLeft
 209+ 956A              addr_Pressed_RollRight     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollRight
 210+ 956A              addr_Pressed_Dive          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Dive
 211+ 956A              addr_Pressed_Climb         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Climb
 212+ 956A              addr_Pressed_Accellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Accellerate
 213+ 956A              addr_Pressed_Decellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Decellerate
 214+ 956A              addr_Pressed_FireLaser     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_FireLaser
 215+ 956A              addr_Pressed_TargetMissle  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_TargetMissle

 217+ 956A              addr_Pressed_UnarmMissile  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_UnarmMissile
 218+ 956A              addr_Pressed_ECM           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_ECM

 226+ 956A              addr_Pressed_BuyCargo      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_BuyCargo
 227+ 956A              addr_Pressed_SellCargo     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_SellCargo
 228+ 956A              addr_Pressed_Equip         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Equip
 229+ 956A              addr_Pressed_GalacticChrt  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GalacticChrt
 230+ 956A              addr_Pressed_LocalChart    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_LocalChart

 233+ 956A              addr_Pressed_Inventory     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Inventory
 234+ 956A              addr_Pressed_GameSkip      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GameSkip

 239+ 956A              addr_Pressed_Quit          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Quit
