 245+ 956A
 246+ 956A              MIsKeyPressed:          MACRO   keyaddress, misstarget
 247+ 956A ~                                    ld      hl,(keyaddress)
 248+ 956A ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
 249+ 956A ~                                    JumpIfAIsZero   misstarget
 250+ 956A                                      ENDM
 251+ 956A
 252+ 956A 21 BA 94     init_keyboard:          ld		hl,Keys                         ; no key s are pressed by default
 253+ 956D 11 28 00                             ld		de, c_KeyBoardLen               ;
 254+ 9570 3E 00                                ld		a,0                             ;
 255+ 9572 CD 70 94                             call	memfill_dma                     ;
 256+ 9575 C9                                   ret                                     ;
 257+ 9576
 258+ 9576
 259+ 9576
 260+ 9576 DD 21 E2 94  scan_keyboard:          ld		ix,RawKeys                      ; hl = table of raw IO port readings
 261+ 957A 21 EA 94                             ld		hl,KeyAddrTab                   ; de = table of IO ports to read
 262+ 957D 0E 08                                ld		c,8                             ; 8 ports to ready
 263+ 957F 11 BA 94                             ld      de,Keys                         ; ix = table of key states from raw read
 264+ 9582 7E           .PortReadLoop:          ld		a,(hl)							; Set up port to read as (hl)$FE
 265+ 9583 DB FE                                in		a,($FE)							; read port to a
 266+ 9585 DD 77 00                             ld      (ix+0),a                        ; save raw scan
 267+ 9588 DD 23                                inc     ix
 268+ 958A 23                                   inc		hl                              ; and ready for next read
 269+ 958B 06 05        .ProcessInputBits:      ld		b,5								; loop all bits (there are only 5 keys to a group)
 270+ 958D 1F           .ProcessBitsLoop:       rra                                     ; shit bit 0 into carry
 271+ 958E CB 47                                bit		0,a								; is bit set
 272+ 9590 30 08                                jr      nc,.SetKeyPressed               ; low bit means it was pressed
 273+ 9592 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 274+ 9594                                      ZeroA
 274+ 9594 AF          >                        xor a
 275+ 9595 C3 A2 95                             jp      .SetKey
 276+ 9598 20 0B                                jr		nz,.SkipKeySet
 277+ 959A FD 6F        .SetKeyPressed:	        ld      iyl,a                           ; save current input byte
 278+ 959C 1A                                   ld      a,(de)                          ; get current keystate
 279+ 959D FE 02                                cp      2
 280+ 959F 28 02                                jr      z,.AlreadyHeld
 281+ 95A1 3C                                   inc     a                               ; and increment by 1 as its moved from previous state
 282+ 95A2 12           .SetKey:                ld		(de),a				  	        ; save key Pressed state
 283+ 95A3 FD 7D        .AlreadyHeld:           ld      a,iyl                           ; and retrieve the current input byte
 284+ 95A5 13           .SkipKeySet:	        inc		de								; move to next key
 285+ 95A6 10 E5                                djnz	.ProcessBitsLoop				; Process all key group bits
 286+ 95A8 0D                                   dec     c                               ; thats one row of bits all processed
 287+ 95A9 20 D7                                jr      nz,.PortReadLoop				; Read next input port
 288+ 95AB C9                                   ret
 289+ 95AC
 290+ 95AC
 291+ 95AC
 292+ 95AC              GetKeyStateAddressDE:   MACRO
 293+ 95AC ~                                    ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 294+ 95AC ~                                    add     hl,a
 295+ 95AC ~                                    ld      e,(hl)
 296+ 95AC ~                                    inc     hl
 297+ 95AC ~                                    ld      d,(hl)                          ; now de = address in keypress list
 298+ 95AC                                      ENDM
 299+ 95AC
 300+ 95AC              GetKeyStateAddressHL:   MACRO
 301+ 95AC ~                                    ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 302+ 95AC ~                                    add     hl,a
 303+ 95AC ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
 304+ 95AC ~                                    inc     hl
 305+ 95AC ~                                    ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 306+ 95AC ~                                    ld      l,a
 307+ 95AC                                      ENDM
 308+ 95AC
 309+ 95AC
 310+ 95AC              ;;old debug codeCurrentX            DB 0
 311+ 95AC              ;;old debug codeCurrentY            DB 0
 312+ 95AC              ;;old debug code
 313+ 95AC              ;;old debug codedisplayKeyStatus:       xor         a
 314+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ld          (CurrentX),a
 315+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ld          hl,RawKeys
 316+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(hl)
 317+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        and         %00011111
 318+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ld          b,5
 319+ 95AC              ;;old debug code.displayLoop:           push        bc,,hl
 320+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        rra
 321+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        jr          c,.displayNoPress
 322+ 95AC              ;;old debug code.displayPress:          push        af
 323+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 324+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ld          e,a
 325+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentY)
 326+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ld          d,a
 327+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,'*'
 328+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 329+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 330+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 331+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        add         a,8
 332+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ld          (CurrentX),a
 333+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        pop         af
 334+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        pop         bc,,hl
 335+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        djnz        .displayLoop
 336+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ret
 337+ 95AC              ;;old debug code.displayNoPress:        push        af
 338+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 339+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ld          e,a
 340+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentY)
 341+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ld          d,a
 342+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,'O'
 343+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 344+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 345+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 346+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        add         a,8
 347+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ld          (CurrentX),a
 348+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        pop         af
 349+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        pop         bc,,hl
 350+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        djnz        .displayLoop
 351+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ret
 352+ 95AC              ;;old debug code
 353+ 95AC              ;;old debug codedisplayDownStatus:      ld  a,(Keys+      KeyCode_CursorUp)
 354+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        cp  0
 355+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        jr      z,.displayNoUp
 356+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        cp  1
 357+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        jr      z,.displayUp
 358+ 95AC              ;;old debug code.displayHeld:           ld      de,8*15
 359+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ld      a,"*"
 360+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 361+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 362+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ret
 363+ 95AC              ;;old debug code.displayUp:             ld      de,8*15
 364+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ld      a,"+"
 365+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 366+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 367+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ret
 368+ 95AC              ;;old debug code.displayNoUp:             ld      de,8*15
 369+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ld      a,"O"
 370+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 371+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 372+ 95AC              ;;old debug code                        ret
 373+ 95AC              ;;old debug code
 374+ 95AC
 375+ 95AC
 376+ 95AC              ; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping does this with keyboard scan, waits until key gets to state 1, if it was already held then#
 377+ 95AC              ; it will have to be let go to reset of 0 and scan again
 378+ 95AC              ; Deprecated as not used as yet
 379+ 95AC              ;;;;;;wait_for_key_a_press:   GetKeyStateAddressHL
 380+ 95AC              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 381+ 95AC              ;;;;;;.wait_loop:             call    scan_keyboard
 382+ 95AC              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl                              ; get key address into hl
 383+ 95AC              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 384+ 95AC              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,(hl)
 385+ 95AC              ;;;;;;                        JumpIfANENusng  1,.wait_loop             ; will also loop if held down when entering this routine
 386+ 95AC              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl                              ; tidy up rogue push, less t states than detecting if we want to push or not
 387+ 95AC              ;;;;;;                        ret
 388+ 95AC              ;;;;;;; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping does this with keyboard scan waits until key gets to state 2
 389+ 95AC              ;;;;;;wait_for_key_a_held:    GetKeyStateAddressDE
 390+ 95AC              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 391+ 95AC              ;;;;;;.wait_loop:             call    scan_keyboard
 392+ 95AC              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl
 393+ 95AC              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 394+ 95AC              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,(hl)
 395+ 95AC              ;;;;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng  2, .wait_loop
 396+ 95AC              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl
 397+ 95AC              ;;;;;;                        ret
 398+ 95AC
 399+ 95AC              ; Gets the current keystate of the c_Pressed Key in a register
 400+ 95AC              get_key_a_state:        GetKeyStateAddressHL                    ; reads a mapped key and sets a to key staus, e.g. 0 1 or >=2 DOES NOT SCAN KEYBOARD
 400+ 95AC 21 F2 94    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 400+ 95AF ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 400+ 95B1 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 400+ 95B2 23          >                        inc     hl
 400+ 95B3 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 400+ 95B4 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 401+ 95B5 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 402+ 95B6 C9                                   ret
 403+ 95B7
 404+ 95B7              ; sets they keystate of c pressed key in a register to 1 (pressed)
 405+ 95B7              force_key_press:        GetKeyStateAddressHL                    ; read key locations
 405+ 95B7 21 F2 94    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 405+ 95BA ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 405+ 95BC 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 405+ 95BD 23          >                        inc     hl
 405+ 95BE 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 405+ 95BF 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 406+ 95C0 3E 01                                ld      a,1
 407+ 95C2 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 408+ 95C3 C9                                   ret
 409+ 95C4
 410+ 95C4              ; returns z is set if c_ key is pressed
 411+ 95C4              is_key_pressed:         GetKeyStateAddressHL
 411+ 95C4 21 F2 94    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 411+ 95C7 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 411+ 95C9 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 411+ 95CA 23          >                        inc     hl
 411+ 95CB 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 411+ 95CC 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 412+ 95CD 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 413+ 95CE FE 01                                cp      1                               ; we cant just test bit 0 as this may have been held long
 414+ 95D0 C9                                   ret
 415+ 95D1
 416+ 95D1              ; returns nz is set if c_ key is held, if key was held then keystate would be 2 or 3, i.e. bit 1 set
 417+ 95D1              is_key_held:            GetKeyStateAddressHL
 417+ 95D1 21 F2 94    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 417+ 95D4 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 417+ 95D6 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 417+ 95D7 23          >                        inc     hl
 417+ 95D8 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 417+ 95D9 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 418+ 95DA 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 419+ 95DB E6 02                                and     Bit1Only                        ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 420+ 95DD C9                                   ret
 421+ 95DE
 422+ 95DE              ; checks to see if any key is pressed in the key table
 423+ 95DE 21 BA 94     is_any_key_pressed:     ld      hl,Keys
 424+ 95E1 01 28 00                             ld      bc,40
 425+ 95E4 3E 01                                ld      a,1
 426+ 95E6 ED B1                                cpir                                    ; search for the value 1
 427+ 95E8 28 03                                jr      z,.KeyPressed                   ; if a key was pressed then handle press
 428+ 95EA                                      SetAFalse
 428+ 95EA 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 429+ 95EC C9                                   ret
 430+ 95ED 3E 27        .KeyPressed:            ld      a,39                            ; so c will be how many keys still to scan
 431+ 95EF 91                                   sub     c                               ; so a = 40 - c to get to result
 432+ 95F0 C9                                   ret
 433+ 95F1
 434+ 95F1 21 BA 94     is_any_key_held:        ld      hl,Keys
 435+ 95F4 06 28                                ld      b,40
 436+ 95F6 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 437+ 95F8 7E           .KeyReadLoop:           ld      a,(hl)
 438+ 95F9 E6 02                                and     Bit1Only                        ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 439+ 95FB C2 05 96                             jp      nz,.KeyPressed
 440+ 95FE 23                                   inc     hl
 441+ 95FF 0C                                   inc     c
 442+ 9600 10 F6                                djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 443+ 9602                                      SetAFalse
 443+ 9602 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 444+ 9604 C9                                   ret
 445+ 9605 79           .KeyPressed:            ld      a,c
 446+ 9606 C9                                   ret
 447+ 9607
 448+ 9607
 449+ 9607 00 00 00...  InputString             DS  30              ; used for a 30 character input buffer
 450+ 9625 00                                   DB  0               ; end of string marker as a safety
 451+ 9626 00           InputCursor             DB  0
 452+ 9627 00           EnterPressed            DB  0               ; zero notpressed FF pressed
 453+ 9628 00           InputChanged            DB  0
 454+ 9629              InputLimit              EQU 20
 455+ 9629
 456+ 9629 21 07 96     keyboard_copy_input_to_de:  ld      hl,InputString
 457+ 962C 3A 26 96                                 ld      a,(InputCursor)
 458+ 962F FE 00                                    cp      0
 459+ 9631 28 05                                    jr      z,.NoString
 460+ 9633 4F                                       ld      c,a
 461+ 9634 06 00                                    ld      b,0
 462+ 9636 ED B0                                    ldir
 463+ 9638 3E 00        .NoString                   ld      a,0
 464+ 963A 12                                       ld      (de),a
 465+ 963B C9                                       ret
 466+ 963C
 467+ 963C AF           initInputText:          xor     a
 468+ 963D 32 26 96                             ld      (InputCursor),a
 469+ 9640                                      SetMemFalse EnterPressed
 469+ 9640 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 469+ 9642 32 27 96    >                        ld      (EnterPressed),a
 470+ 9645                                      SetMemFalse InputChanged
 470+ 9645 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 470+ 9647 32 28 96    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 471+ 964A 21 07 96                             ld      hl,InputString
 472+ 964D 06 1E                                ld      b,30
 473+ 964F 77           .wipeloop:              ld      (hl),a
 474+ 9650 23                                   inc     hl
 475+ 9651 10 FC                                djnz    .wipeloop
 476+ 9653 C9                                   ret
 477+ 9654
 478+ 9654              InputName:              SetMemFalse InputChanged
 478+ 9654 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 478+ 9656 32 28 96    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 479+ 9659 CD DE 95                             call    is_any_key_pressed
 480+ 965C FE FF                                cp      $FF
 481+ 965E C8                                   ret     z
 482+ 965F 4F           .KeyPressed:            ld      c,a
 483+ 9660 3A 26 96                             ld      a,(InputCursor)                 ; No key so we can now look at if we are at the end of the buffer
 484+ 9663 FE 14                                cp      InputLimit                      ; move to variable later and then cp (hl)
 485+ 9665 28 0B                                jr      z,.DeleteOrEnterOnly            ;
 486+ 9667 21 42 95                             ld      hl,ASCII_Map
 487+ 966A 79                                   ld      a,c
 488+ 966B ED 31                                add     hl,a
 489+ 966D 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 490+ 966E FE 41                                cp      "A"
 491+ 9670 30 0B                                jr      nc,.AlphaPressed
 492+ 9672              ; CAPS and Symbol act as delete for now
 493+ 9672 FE 20        .DeleteOrEnterOnly      cp      " "                             ; if space was  pressed (mapped to Hash in ASCII table))
 494+ 9674 28 33                                jr      z,.SpacePressed               ; for now we will ignore the shift and just assume delete
 495+ 9676 FE 3E                                cp      ">"         ; ENTER
 496+ 9678 28 19                                jr      z,.EnterPressed
 497+ 967A FE 23                                cp      "#"         ; CAPS
 498+ 967C C9                                   ret
 499+ 967D 47           .AlphaPressed:          ld      b,a
 500+ 967E 3A 26 96                             ld      a,(InputCursor)
 501+ 9681 4F                                   ld      c,a
 502+ 9682 21 07 96                             ld      hl,InputString
 503+ 9685 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 504+ 9687 78                                   ld      a,b
 505+ 9688 70                                   ld      (hl),b
 506+ 9689 79                                   ld      a,c
 507+ 968A 21 26 96                             ld      hl,InputCursor
 508+ 968D 34                                   inc     (hl)
 509+ 968E                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 509+ 968E AF          >                        xor     a
 509+ 968F 32 28 96    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 510+ 9692 C9                                   ret
 511+ 9693 3A 26 96     .EnterPressed:          ld      a,(InputCursor)
 512+ 9696 21 07 96                             ld      hl,InputString
 513+ 9699 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 514+ 969B                                      ZeroA
 514+ 969B AF          >                        xor a
 515+ 969C 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 516+ 969D                                      SetMemTrue EnterPressed
 516+ 969D AF          >                        xor     a
 516+ 969E 32 27 96    >                        ld      (EnterPressed),a
 517+ 96A1                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 517+ 96A1 AF          >                        xor     a
 517+ 96A2 32 28 96    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 518+ 96A5 CD 6A 95                             call    init_keyboard           ; Flush keyboard status so futher inputs don't auto read the enter key as a second press
 519+ 96A8 C9                                   ret
 520+ 96A9 3A 26 96     .SpacePressed:          ld      a,(InputCursor)         ; Space = delete
 521+ 96AC FE 00                                cp      0                       ; if input is zero length then can not delete
 522+ 96AE C8                                   ret     z
 523+ 96AF 3D                                   dec     a                       ; move back one and update cursor pos
 524+ 96B0 32 26 96                             ld      (InputCursor),a         ;
 525+ 96B3 21 07 96                             ld      hl,InputString          ; now update end of line to null
 526+ 96B6 ED 31                                add     hl,a                    ; .
 527+ 96B8                                      ZeroA                           ; .
 527+ 96B8 AF          >                        xor a
 528+ 96B9 77                                   ld      (hl),a                  ; .
 529+ 96BA                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 529+ 96BA AF          >                        xor     a
 529+ 96BB 32 28 96    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 530+ 96BE C9                                   ret
 531+ 96BF
 532+ 96BF AF           MovementKeyTest:        xor     a
 533+ 96C0 32 7C 98                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 534+ 96C3 3A 7E 98                             ld      a,(MenuIdMax)
 535+ 96C6 E6 FC                                and     $FC
 536+ 96C8 20 26                                jr      nz,CursorKeys
 537+ 96CA 2A 00 95     ClimbDiveKeys:          ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Climb)
 538+ 96CD 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 539+ 96CE                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanDiveKey
 539+ 96CE A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 539+ 96CF CA DD 96    >                        jp	z, ScanDiveKey
 540+ 96D2 3A 7C 98                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 541+ 96D5 F6 80                                or      $80
 542+ 96D7 32 7C 98                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 543+ 96DA C3 13 97                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 544+ 96DD 2A FE 94     ScanDiveKey:            ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Dive)

 546+ 96E1 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 546+ 96E2 CA 13 97    >                        jp	z, ScanLeftKey
 547+ 96E5 3A 7C 98                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 548+ 96E8 F6 40                                or      $40
 549+ 96EA 32 7C 98                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 550+ 96ED C3 13 97                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 551+ 96F0 2A 3C 95     CursorKeys:             ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorUp)
 552+ 96F3 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 553+ 96F4                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanCursorDownKey
 553+ 96F4 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 553+ 96F5 CA 03 97    >                        jp	z, ScanCursorDownKey
 554+ 96F8 3A 7C 98                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 555+ 96FB F6 80                                or      $80
 556+ 96FD 32 7C 98                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 557+ 9700 C3 13 97                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 558+ 9703 2A 3E 95     ScanCursorDownKey:      ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorDown)
 559+ 9706 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 560+ 9707                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanLeftKey
 560+ 9707 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 560+ 9708 CA 13 97    >                        jp	z, ScanLeftKey
 561+ 970B 3A 7C 98                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 562+ 970E F6 40                                or      $40
 563+ 9710 32 7C 98                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 564+ 9713 2A FA 94     ScanLeftKey:            ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollLeft)
 565+ 9716 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 566+ 9717                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanRightKey
 566+ 9717 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 566+ 9718 CA 24 97    >                        jp	z, ScanRightKey
 567+ 971B 3A 7C 98                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 568+ 971E F6 20                                or      $20
 569+ 9720 32 7C 98                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 570+ 9723 C9                                   ret

 572+ 9727 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)

 573+ 9728 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 573+ 9729 CA 35 97    >                        jp	z, ScanHomeKey
 574+ 972C 3A 7C 98                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 575+ 972F F6 10                                or      $10
 576+ 9731 32 7C 98                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 577+ 9734 C9                                   ret
 578+ 9735 2A 1A 95     ScanHomeKey:            ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_HomeCursor)
 579+ 9738 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 580+ 9739                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanRecentreKey
 580+ 9739 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 580+ 973A CA 46 97    >                        jp	z, ScanRecentreKey

 587+ 974B C8          >                        ret     z

 321+ 997D 00           SoundToggle				DB	0				; 03C6
 322+ 997E 00           KeyboardRecenterToggle	DB	0				; 03C8
 323+ 997F 00           PATGMask				DB	0				; &03C9    \ PATG	\ Mask to scan keyboard X-key, for misjump
 324+ 9980 00           FlashToggle				DB  0				; 03CA \ FLH \ flash toggle
 325+ 9981 00           ReverseJoystick			DB	0				; 03CB \ JSTGY \ Y reverse joystick Y channel
 326+ 9982 00           JoystickToggle			DB	0				; 03CD  \ JSTK    \ K toggle keyboard/joystick
 327+ 9983 00           DigitalJoystick			DB	0				; 03CE \ JDB   \ . = toggle between keyboard and bitpaddle
 328+ 9984 00           DiskReadFailFlag		DB	0				; 03CF \ CATF \ Disk catalog fail flag
 329+ 9985
 330+ 9985              ; Working Data
 331+ 9985
 332+ 9985              ;UniverseTable			DS	26				; 1741  \ address pointers for 13 ships INF on pages &9. 37 bytes each.
 333+ 9985              ; $0900 =	EQUW page9+37* 0 \ copied to inner worskpace INWK on zero-page when needed
 334+ 9985              ; $0925 =	EQUW page9+37* 1
 335+ 9985              ; $094A =	EQUW page9+37* 2
 336+ 9985              ; $096F =	EQUW page9+37* 3
 337+ 9985              ; $0994 =	EQUW page9+37* 4
 338+ 9985              ; $09B9 =	EQUW page9+37* 5
 339+ 9985              ; $09DE =	EQUW page9+37* 6
 340+ 9985              ; $0A03 =	EQUW page9+37* 7
 341+ 9985              ; $0A28 =	EQUW page9+37* 8
 342+ 9985              ; $0A4D =	EQUW page9+37* 9
 343+ 9985              ; $0A72 =	EQUW page9+37*10
 344+ 9985              ; $0A97 =	EQUW page9+37*11
 345+ 9985              ; $0ABC =	EQUW page9+37*12 \ allwk up to &0ABC while heap for edges working down from &CFF.
 346+ 9985
 347+ 9985
 348+ 9985
 349+ 9985              ; 0b00 is start address of data to save

1059  9D04                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 9D04              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 9D04              doRND2:
   3+ 9D04 A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 9D05              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 9D05              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & B)"
   6+ 9D05 3A 65 97     doRND:                  ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   7+ 9D08 CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
   8+ 9D0A 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
   9+ 9D0B 21 67 97     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  10+ 9D0E 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  11+ 9D0F 32 65 97     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  12+ 9D12 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  13+ 9D13 79                                   ld		a,c
  14+ 9D14 32 67 97                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  15+ 9D17 08                                   ex		af,af'
  16+ 9D18 3A 66 97                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  17+ 9D1B 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  18+ 9D1C 21 68 97     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  19+ 9D1F 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  20+ 9D20 32 66 97                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  21+ 9D23 08                                   ex		af,af'
  22+ 9D24 79                                   ld		a,c
  23+ 9D25 32 68 97                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  24+ 9D28 08                                   ex		af,af'
  25+ 9D29 C9                                   ret
  26+ 9D2A
  27+ 9D2A              fillHeapRandom4Points:                      ; counter Y, 4 rnd bytes to edge heap
  28+ 9D2A 06 04        	ld		b,4
  29+ 9D2C 21 0E C2     	ld		hl,UbnkLineArray				; line data
  30+ 9D2F              FillRandom:                                 ; Writes random bytes hl = start address, b = nbr bytes to fill
  31+ 9D2F              EE55:
  32+ 9D2F CD 05 9D     	call	doRND							; get random
  33+ 9D32 77           	ld		(hl),a							; (XX19),Y
  34+ 9D33 23           	inc		hl
  35+ 9D34 10 F9        	djnz	FillRandom						; 3to6 = random bytes for seed
  36+ 9D36 C9               ret
  37+ 9D37
# file closed: ./Variables/random_number.asm

   7+ 9D4D ED A0                                ldi
   8+ 9D4F ED A0                                ldi
   9+ 9D51 ED A0                                ldi
  10+ 9D53 C9                                   ret
  11+ 9D54
  12+ 9D54 21 5E 98     copy_system_to_galaxy:  ld		hl,SystemSeed
  13+ 9D57 11 70 99                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  14+ 9D5A 18 EB                                jr		copy_seed
  15+ 9D5C
  16+ 9D5C 21 70 99     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ 9D5F 11 64 99                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ 9D62 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ 9D64
  20+ 9D64 21 64 99     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ 9D67 11 70 99                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ 9D6A 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ 9D6C
  24+ 9D6C 21 64 99     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ 9D6F 11 5E 98                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ 9D72 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ 9D74
  28+ 9D74 21 5E 98     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ 9D77 11 64 99                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ 9D7A 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ 9D7C
  32+ 9D7C              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ 9D7C CD 7F 9D     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ 9D7F              .NextStep:
  35+ 9D7F CD 82 9D     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ 9D82              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ 9D82 3A 5E 98     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ 9D85 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ 9D86 21 60 98     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ 9D89 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ 9D8A 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ 9D8B 3A 5F 98     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ 9D8E 21 61 98     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ 9D91 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ 9D92 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ 9D93 3A 60 98     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ 9D96 32 5E 98     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ 9D99 3A 61 98     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ 9D9C 32 5F 98     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ 9D9F 3A 63 98     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ 9DA2 32 61 98     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ 9DA5 3A 62 98     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ 9DA8 32 60 98     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ 9DAB B7           		or		a
  55+ 9DAC 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ 9DAD 21 60 98     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ 9DB0 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ 9DB1 32 62 98     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ 9DB4 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ 9DB5 21 61 98     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ 9DB8 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ 9DB9 32 63 98     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ 9DBC C9           		ret
  64+ 9DBD
  65+ 9DBD              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ 9DBD CD C0 9D     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ 9DC0              .NextStep:
  68+ 9DC0 CD C3 9D     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ 9DC3              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ 9DC3              ; x = a + c
  71+ 9DC3 3A 64 99     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ 9DC6 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ 9DC7 21 66 99     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ 9DCA 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ 9DCB 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ 9DCC              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ 9DCC 3A 65 99     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ 9DCF 21 67 99     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ 9DD2 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ 9DD3 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ 9DD4 3A 66 99     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ 9DD7 32 64 99     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ 9DDA 3A 67 99     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ 9DDD 32 65 99     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ 9DE0 3A 69 99     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ 9DE3 32 67 99     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ 9DE6 3A 68 99     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ 9DE9 32 66 99     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ 9DEC B7           		or		a
  90+ 9DED 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ 9DEE 21 66 99     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ 9DF1 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ 9DF2 32 68 99     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ 9DF5 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ 9DF6 21 67 99     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ 9DF9 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ 9DFA 32 69 99     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ 9DFD C9           		ret
  99+ 9DFE
 100+ 9DFE 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ 9DFF 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ 9E00 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ 9E01
 104+ 9E01 AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ 9E02 32 77 98                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ 9E05 3A 5F 98     .CounterLoop:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 107+ 9E08 4F                                   ld		c,a
 108+ 9E09 3A 77 99     .calcLocaldy:           ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 109+ 9E0C 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 110+ 9E0D 79                                   ld		a,c
 111+ 9E0E 90                                   sub		b
 112+ 9E0F CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 113+ 9E11 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedy
 114+ 9E13 ED 44        .negativedy:            neg
 115+ 9E15 32 00 9E     .positivedy:            ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 116+ 9E18 ED 5B FE 9D                          ld		de,(working_distX)
 117+ 9E1C BA                                   cp		d
 118+ 9E1D 30 24                                jr		nc,.toofar
 119+ 9E1F 3A 61 98     .calcLocaldx:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 120+ 9E22 4F                                   ld		c,a
 121+ 9E23 3A 76 99                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 122+ 9E26 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 123+ 9E27 79                                   ld		a,c
 124+ 9E28 90                                   sub		b
 125+ 9E29 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 126+ 9E2B 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedx
 127+ 9E2D ED 44        .negativedx:            neg
 128+ 9E2F 4F           .positivedx:            ld		c,a
 129+ 9E30 BB                                   cp		e
 130+ 9E31 30 10                                jr		nc,.toofar
 131+ 9E33 3A 00 9E     .Nearer:			    ld		a,(current_distY) 				; we have a closer system
 132+ 9E36 47                                   ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 133+ 9E37 ED 43 FE 9D                          ld		(working_distX),bc
 134+ 9E3B C5                                   push	bc
 135+ 9E3C CD 74 9D                             call 	copy_system_to_working
 136+ 9E3F C1                                   pop		bc
 137+ 9E40 78                                   ld		a,b								;
 138+ 9E41 B1                                   or		c								;
 139+ 9E42 C8                                   ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 140+ 9E43 CD 7C 9D     .toofar:                call	next_system_seed
 141+ 9E46 3A 77 98                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 142+ 9E49 3D                                   dec		a
 143+ 9E4A FE 00                                cp		0
 144+ 9E4C C8                                   ret		z
 145+ 9E4D 32 77 98                             ld		(XSAV),a
 146+ 9E50 18 B3                                jr		.CounterLoop
 147+ 9E52
 148+ 9E52              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 149+ 9E52 3A 65 99     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 150+ 9E55 E6 07        		and		7
 151+ 9E57 32 FD 98     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 152+ 9E5A 3A 66 99     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 153+ 9E5D CB 3F        		srl	a
 154+ 9E5F CB 3F        		srl	a
 155+ 9E61 CB 3F        		srl	a
 156+ 9E63 CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 157+ 9E65 E6 07        		and		7
 158+ 9E67 32 FE 98     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 159+ 9E6A CB 3F        		srl	a
 160+ 9E6C FE 00        		cp		0
 161+ 9E6E 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 162+ 9E70              .Fedual:
 163+ 9E70 3A FD 98     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 164+ 9E73 F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 165+ 9E75 32 FD 98     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 166+ 9E78              .CanBeRich:
 167+ 9E78 3A FD 98     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 168+ 9E7B EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 169+ 9E7D 32 FF 98     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 170+ 9E80 47           		ld		b,a
 171+ 9E81 3A 67 99     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 172+ 9E84 E6 03        		and		3
 173+ 9E86 80           		add		a,b
 174+ 9E87 32 FF 98     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 175+ 9E8A 3A FE 98     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 176+ 9E8D CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 177+ 9E8F 47           		ld		b,a
 178+ 9E90 3A FF 98     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 179+ 9E93 80           		add		a,b
 180+ 9E94 32 FF 98     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 181+ 9E97 CB 27        		sla		a
 182+ 9E99 CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 183+ 9E9B 47           		ld		b,a
 184+ 9E9C 3A FD 98     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 185+ 9E9F 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 186+ 9EA0 47           		ld		b,a
 187+ 9EA1 3A FE 98     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 188+ 9EA4 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 189+ 9EA5 32 00 99     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 190+ 9EA8 3A FD 98     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 191+ 9EAB EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 192+ 9EAD C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 193+ 9EAF 57           		ld		d,a
 194+ 9EB0 3A FE 98     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 195+ 9EB3 C6 04        		add		4
 196+ 9EB5 5F           		ld		e,a
 197+ 9EB6 ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 198+ 9EB8 3A 00 99     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 199+ 9EBB 57           		ld		d,a
 200+ 9EBC ED 30        		mul
 201+ 9EBE CB 23        		sla		e
 202+ 9EC0 CB 1A        		rr		d
 203+ 9EC2 CB 23        		sla		e
 204+ 9EC4 CB 1A        		rr		d
 205+ 9EC6 CB 23        		sla		e
 206+ 9EC8 CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 207+ 9ECA ED 53 02 99  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 208+ 9ECE              .DoRadius:
 209+ 9ECE 3A 67 99     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 210+ 9ED1 4F           		ld		c,a
 211+ 9ED2 3A 69 99     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 212+ 9ED5 E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 213+ 9ED7 C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 214+ 9ED9 47           		ld		b,a							;
 215+ 9EDA ED 43 06 99  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 216+ 9EDE C9           		ret
 217+ 9EDF
# file closed: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm

  36+ A025
  37+ A025
  38+ A025              getTableText:
  39+ A025              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  40+ A025              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  41+ A025 D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  42+ A026 ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  43+ A028 ED 31        	add		hl,a
  44+ A02A 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  45+ A02B 23           	inc		hl
  46+ A02C 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  47+ A02D EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  48+ A02E D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  49+ A02F C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  50+ A030
  51+ A030
  52+ A030              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  53+ A030              ;               -----------------------------------
  54+ A030              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  55+ A030              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  56+ A030              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  57+ A030              ;               1       1       Impossible
  58+ A030              getRankIndex:
  59+ A030              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  60+ A030              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  61+ A030 7A           	ld		a,d
  62+ A031 B3           	or		e
  63+ A032 FE 00        	cp		0
  64+ A034 C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  65+ A035 AF           	xor 	a
  66+ A036 21 84 9F     	ld		hl,RankingTable
  67+ A039              .testLoop:
  68+ A039 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  69+ A03A 23           	inc		hl
  70+ A03B 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  71+ A03C E5           	push	hl
  72+ A03D 60           	ld		h,b
  73+ A03E 69           	ld		l,c
  74+ A03F CD 69 AC     	call	compare16HLDE
  75+ A042 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  76+ A044              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  77+ A044 E1           	pop		hl
  78+ A045 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  79+ A046 23           	inc		hl
  80+ A047 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  81+ A048 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  82+ A04A              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  83+ A04A E1           	pop		hl
  84+ A04B C9           	ret
  85+ A04C
# file closed: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

 164+ A475
 165+ A475 00           TextDummy					DB  0
 166+ A476
 167+ A476 1E A4 22 A4  TextTokens			DW  TextLargeCargoBay, TextEscapePod, TextFuelScoops				; 0 2
 167+ A47A 25 A4
 168+ A47C 28 A4 2B A4  					DW  TextECMSystem, TextEnergyBomb, TextEnergyUnit					; 3 5
 168+ A480 2E A4
 169+ A482 31 A4 34 A4  					DW  TextDockingComp, TextGalacticHyper  							; 6 7
 170+ A486 37 A4 3B A4  					DW	TextFrontLaser, TextLeftLaser, TextRightLaser, TextRearLaser	; 8 11
 170+ A48A 3F A4 43 A4
 171+ A48E 47 A4 4B A4  					DW  TextShortRangeChart, TextGalacticChart, TextDataOn				; 12 14
 171+ A492 4E A4
 172+ A494 51 A4 54 A4  TextTokenEconomy	DW  TextRichIndustrial, TextAvgIndustrial, TextPoorIndustrial, TextMainIndustrial, TextMainAgricultural, TextRichAgricultural, TextAvgAgricultural,  TextPoorAgricultural
 172+ A498 5A A4 57 A4
 172+ A49C 63 A4 5D A4
 172+ A4A0 60 A4 66 A4
 173+ A4A4 69 A4        					DW  TextLightYears		                                            ; 21 23
 174+ A4A6 6C A4 70 A4  					DW  Text0LightYears, TextMarketPrices
 175+ A4AA 75 A4        					DW  TextDummy;  25
 176+ A4AC 00 00 00...  TextBuffer			DS	33
 177+ A4CD
 178+ A4CD              TextEconomyOffset   EQU (TextTokenEconomy - TextTokens)/2
 179+ A4CD              TextGovOffset       EQU (WordIdxGovernment - WordIdx)/2
 180+ A4CD
 181+ A4CD              CapitaliseString:
 182+ A4CD              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 183+ A4CD              .CapLoop:
 184+ A4CD 23           	inc		hl
 185+ A4CE 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 186+ A4CF FE 00        	cp		0
 187+ A4D1 C8           	ret		z
 188+ A4D2 FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 189+ A4D4 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 190+ A4D6 FE 41        	cp		'A'
 191+ A4D8 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 192+ A4DA              .LowerCase:
 193+ A4DA C6 20        	add		a,'a'-'A'
 194+ A4DC 77           	ld		(hl),a
 195+ A4DD 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop
 196+ A4DF
 197+ A4DF              WordIndexToAddress:
 198+ A4DF 21 50 A3     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 199+ A4E2 ED 31        	add		hl,a
 200+ A4E4 ED 31        	add		hl,a
 201+ A4E6 D5           	push	de
 202+ A4E7 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
 203+ A4E8 23           	inc		hl
 204+ A4E9 56           	ld		d,(hl)
 205+ A4EA EB           	ex		de,hl
 206+ A4EB D1           	pop		de
 207+ A4EC C9           	ret
 208+ A4ED
 209+ A4ED
 210+ A4ED              expandTokenToString:
 211+ A4ED              ; ">expandTokenToString a = texttoken"
 212+ A4ED 21 76 A4     	ld		hl,TextTokens
 213+ A4F0 CD 25 A0     	call	getTableText
 214+ A4F3 11 AC A4     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 215+ A4F6              .ReadLoop:
 216+ A4F6 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 217+ A4F7 FE 00        	cp		0
 218+ A4F9 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 219+ A4FB E5           	push	hl
 220+ A4FC D5           	push	de
 221+ A4FD 21 50 A3     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 222+ A500 CD 25 A0     	call	getTableText
 223+ A503 D1           	pop		de
 224+ A504              .WordExpandLoop:
 225+ A504 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 226+ A505 FE 00        	cp		0
 227+ A507 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 228+ A509              ;.GetChar:
 229+ A509 12           	ld		(de),a
 230+ A50A 13           	inc		de
 231+ A50B 23           	inc		hl
 232+ A50C 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 233+ A50E              .AddSpace:
 234+ A50E 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 235+ A510 12           	ld		(de),a
 236+ A511 13           	inc		de
 237+ A512 E1           	pop		hl
 238+ A513 23           	inc		hl
 239+ A514 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 240+ A516              .ReadDone:
 241+ A516 1B           	dec		de
 242+ A517 AF           	xor		a
 243+ A518 12           	ld		(de),a
 244+ A519 C9           	ret
 245+ A51A
# file closed: ./Tables/dictionary.asm

  12+ A593              NamingLoop:
  13+ A593 3A 69 99     	ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)	; a = first byte of name seed
  14+ A596 E6 1F        	and 	$1F					; Keep bottom 5 bits only
  15+ A598 FE 00        	cp		0					; 0 = skip 2 chars
  16+ A59A 28 12        	jr		z,.SkipPhrase
  17+ A59C C6 0C        	add		a,12
  18+ A59E CB 27        	sla		a					; phrase = (a+12)*2
  19+ A5A0 21 1A A5     	ld		hl,name_digrams

  24+ A5AA 28 02        	jr		z,.SkipPhrase

 204+ A5B4              ;CA                      DEX 		\ continue 9to127 tokens

 218+ A5B4              ;	.TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase
 219+ A5B4              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 220+ A5B4              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 221+ A5B4              ;C9 5B                   CMP #&5B	\ >= ascii 'Z'+1
 222+ A5B4              ;B0 02                   BCS TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 223+ A5B4              ;69 20                   ADC #&20	\ else Upper to lowercase

 225+ A5B4              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC \ TT26 \ print character

 230+ A5B4              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 231+ A5B4              ;90 22                   BCC TT74 	\ print as is using TT26
 232+ A5B4              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ A5B4              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 234+ A5B4              ;09 40                   ORA #&40	\ set bit6 in QQ17 so subsequent ones lower
 235+ A5B4              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 236+ A5B4              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore token
 237+ A5B4              ;D0 EC                   BNE TT44	\ guaranteed up, print as Uppercase with TT26.
 238+ A5B4              ;

 246+ A5B4              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.
 247+ A5B4              ;

   1+ A5CD              ; HL = HL (signed) + A (unsigned), uses HL, DE, A
   2+ A5CD 57           AddAusngToHLsng:        ld      d,a
   3+ A5CE 5C                                   ld      e,h
   4+ A5CF 7C                                   ld      a,h
   5+ A5D0 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
   6+ A5D2 67                                   ld      h,a
   7+ A5D3 7A                                   ld      a,d
   8+ A5D4 ED 31                                add     hl,a
   9+ A5D6 7B                                   ld      a,e
  10+ A5D7 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  11+ A5D9 B4                                   or      h
  12+ A5DA C9                                   ret
  13+ A5DB              ; HL = A (unsigned) - HL (signed), uses HL, DE, BC, A
  14+ A5DB 44           HLEequAusngMinusHLsng:  ld      b,h
  15+ A5DC 4F                                   ld      c,a
  16+ A5DD 78                                   ld      a,b
  17+ A5DE E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  18+ A5E0 20 08                                jr      nz,.DoAdd
  19+ A5E2 EB           .DoSubtract:            ex      de,hl               ; move hl into de
  20+ A5E3 26 00                                ld      h,0                 ; hl = a
  21+ A5E5 69                                   ld      l,c
  22+ A5E6                                      ClearCarryFlag
  22+ A5E6 B7          >                        or a
  23+ A5E7 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ; hl = a - hl
  24+ A5E9 C9                                   ret
  25+ A5EA 79           .DoAdd:                 ld      a,c
  26+ A5EB ED 31                                add hl,a
  27+ A5ED C9                                   ret

  29+ A5EE              ; DEL = DEL + BCH signed, uses BC, DE, HL, IY, A
  30+ A5EE 78           AddBCHtoDELsigned:      ld      a,b                 ; Are the values both the same sign?
  31+ A5EF AA                                   xor     d                   ; .
  32+ A5F0 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
  33+ A5F2 20 19                                jr      nz,.SignDifferent   ; .
  34+ A5F4 78           .SignSame:              ld      a,b                 ; if they are then we only need 1 signe
  35+ A5F5 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; so store it in iyh
  36+ A5F7 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ;
  37+ A5F9 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
  38+ A5FA E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  39+ A5FC 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
  40+ A5FD 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
  41+ A5FE E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  42+ A600 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
  43+ A601 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; l = h + l
  44+ A602 85                                   add     l                   ; .
  45+ A603 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
  46+ A604 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; e = e + c + carry
  47+ A605 8B                                   adc     e                   ; .
  48+ A606 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
  49+ A607 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; d = b + d + carry (signed)
  50+ A608 8A                                   adc     d                   ;
  51+ A609 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; d = or back in sign bit
  52+ A60B 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
  53+ A60C C9                                   ret                         ; done
  54+ A60D 78           .SignDifferent:         ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
  55+ A60E FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = b sign
  56+ A610 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  57+ A612 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
  58+ A613 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
  59+ A614 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a               ; iyl = d sign
  60+ A616 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  61+ A618 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
  62+ A619 E5                                   push    hl                  ; hl = bc - de
  63+ A61A 60 69                                ld      hl,bc               ; if bc < de then there is a carry
  64+ A61C ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ;
  65+ A61E E1                                   pop     hl                  ;
  66+ A61F 38 0E                                jr      c,.BCHltDEL
  67+ A621 20 1C                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH        ; if the result was not zero then DEL > BCH
  68+ A623 7C           .BCeqDE:                ld      a,h                 ; if the result was zero then check lowest bits
  69+ A624                                      JumpIfALTNusng l,.BCHltDEL
  69+ A624 BD          >                        cp      l
  69+ A625 DA 2F A6    >                        jp		c, .BCHltDEL
  70+ A628 20 15                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH
  71+ A62A              ; The same so its just zero
  72+ A62A AF           .BCHeqDEL:              xor     a                  ; its just zero
  73+ A62B 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .
  74+ A62C 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .
  75+ A62D 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .
  76+ A62E C9                                   ret                        ; .
  77+ A62F              ;BCH is less than DEL so its DEL - BCH the sort out sign
  78+ A62F 7D           .BCHltDEL:              ld      a,l                ; l = l - h                      ; ex
  79+ A630 94                                   sub     h                  ; .                              ;   01D70F DEL
  80+ A631 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .                              ;  -000028 BCH
  81+ A632 7B                                   ld      a,e                ; e = e - c - carry              ;1.
  82+ A633 99                                   sbc     c                  ; .                              ;
  83+ A634 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .                              ;
  84+ A635 7A                                   ld      a,d                ; d = d - b - carry              ;
  85+ A636 98                                   sbc     b                  ; .                              ;
  86+ A637 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .                              ;
  87+ A638 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl              ; as d was larger, take d sign
  88+ A63A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
  89+ A63C B2                                   or      d                  ;
  90+ A63D 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
  91+ A63E C9                                   ret
  92+ A63F 7C           .DELltBCH:              ld      a,h                ; l = h - l
  93+ A640 95                                   sub     l                  ;
  94+ A641 6F                                   ld      l,a                ;
  95+ A642 79                                   ld      a,c                ; e = c - e - carry
  96+ A643 9B                                   sbc     e                  ;
  97+ A644 5F                                   ld      e,a                ;
  98+ A645 78                                   ld      a,b                ; d = b - d - carry
  99+ A646 9A                                   sbc     d                  ;
 100+ A647 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 101+ A648 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh              ; as b was larger, take b sign into d
 102+ A64A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 103+ A64C B2                                   or      d                  ;
 104+ A64D 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 105+ A64E C9                                   ret
 106+ A64F
 107+ A64F
 108+ A64F              ;BHL = AHL + DE where AHL = 16 bit + A sign and DE = 15 bit signed
 109+ A64F 47           AddAHLtoDEsigned:       ld      b,a                     ; B = A , C = D (save sign bytes)
 110+ A650 4A                                   ld      c,d                     ; .
 111+ A651 A9                                   xor     c                       ; A = A xor C
 112+ A652 CB BA                                res     7,d                     ; clear sign bit of D
 113+ A654 20 02                                jr nz,  .OppositeSigns          ; if A xor C is opposite signs job to A0A1
 114+ A656 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; HL = HL + DE
 115+ A657 C9                                   ret                             ; return
 116+ A658 ED 52        .OppositeSigns:         sbc     hl,de                   ; HL = HL -DE
 117+ A65A D0                                   ret     nc                      ; if no carry return
 118+ A65B 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; else HL = HL + DE
 119+ A65C EB                                   ex      de,hl                   ;      swap HL and DE
 120+ A65D A7                                   and     a                       ;      reset carry
 121+ A65E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                   ;      HL = DE - HL (as they were swapped)
 122+ A660 41                                   ld      b,c                     ;      B = sign of C
 123+ A661 C9                                   ret                             ;      ret
 124+ A662
 125+ A662
 126+ A662
 127+ A662              ; a = value to add
 128+ A662              ; b = offset (equivalent to regX)
 129+ A662              ; returns INWK [x] set to new value
 130+ A662              addINWKbasigned:
 131+ A662 21 0C C0     		ld 		hl,UBnKxlo                  ; hl = INWK 0
 132+ A665 4F           		ld      c,a                         ; preserve a
 133+ A666 78           		ld		a,b
 134+ A667 ED 31        		add		hl,a                        ; hl = INWK[x]
 135+ A669 79                   ld      a,c                         ; get back a value
 136+ A66A E6 80                and     $80                         ; get sign bit from a
 137+ A66C 47                   ld      b,a                         ; now b = sign bit of a
 138+ A66D 79                   ld      a,c                         ; a = original value
 139+ A66E E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit                ; a = unsigned version of original value
 140+ A670              ; hl = unsigned version of INWK0[b]
 141+ A670              ; a = value to add, also in c which will optimise later code
 142+ A670              ; b = sign bit of a ( in old code was varT)
 143+ A670              addhlcsigned:
 144+ A670 5E                   ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = INKK value
 145+ A671 23                   inc     hl
 146+ A672 56                   ld      d,(hl)
 147+ A673 23                   inc     hl                          ; now pointing a sign
 148+ A674 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; a = sign bit
 149+ A675 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value now and de = pointer to sign
 150+ A676 A8                   xor     b                           ; a = resultant sign
 151+ A677 CB 7F                bit     7,a                         ; is it negative?
 152+ A679 28 28                jr      z,.postivecalc
 153+ A67B              .negativecalc:
 154+ A67B 7C                   ld      a,h
 155+ A67C E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
 156+ A67E 67                   ld      h,a                         ; strip high bit
 157+ A67F DD 68                ld      ixl,b                       ; save sign bit from b into d
 158+ A681 06 00                ld      b,0                         ; c = value to subtract so now bc = value to subtract
 159+ A683 ED 42                sbc     hl,bc
 160+ A685 DD 45                ld      b,ixl                       ; get sign back
 161+ A687 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to sign
 162+ A688 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;
 163+ A689 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
 164+ A68B DE 00                sbc     a,0                         ; subtract carry which could flip sign bit
 165+ A68D F6 80                or      $80                         ; set bit 0
 166+ A68F A8                   xor     b                           ; flip bit on sign (var T)
 167+ A690 77                   ld      (hl),a
 168+ A691 2B                   dec     hl
 169+ A692 72                   ld      (hl),d
 170+ A693 2B                   dec     hl
 171+ A694 73                   ld      (hl),e                      ; write out DE to INKW[x]0,1
 172+ A695 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 173+ A696 D8                   ret     c                           ; if carry was set then we can exit now
 174+ A697              .nocarry:
 175+ A697 CD 7F AC             call    negate16hl                  ; get hl back to positive, a is still inkw+2
 176+ A69A B0                   or      b                           ; b is still varT
 177+ A69B EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 178+ A69C 73                   ld      (hl),e
 179+ A69D 23                   inc     hl
 180+ A69E 72                   ld      (hl),d
 181+ A69F 23                   inc     hl
 182+ A6A0 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; set sign bit in INKK[x]+2
 183+ A6A1 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to sign
 184+ A6A2 C9                   ret
 185+ A6A3              .postivecalc:
 186+ A6A3 DD 68                ld      ixl,b
 187+ A6A5 06 00                ld      b,0
 188+ A6A7 19                   add     hl,de
 189+ A6A8 EB                   ex      de,hl
 190+ A6A9 DD B5                or      ixl                         ; we don;t need to recover b here
 191+ A6AB 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; push sign into INWK[x]
 192+ A6AC 2B                   dec     hl
 193+ A6AD 72                   ld      (hl),d
 194+ A6AE 2B                   dec     hl
 195+ A6AF 73                   ld      (hl),e
 196+ A6B0 C9                   ret
 197+ A6B1
 198+ A6B1              ;a = a AND 80 (i.e. bit 7) =>carry       so value is -
 199+ A6B1              ;MVT1
 200+ A6B1              ;    S = bits 6 to 0 of A
 201+ A6B1              ;    A = sign bit => T
 202+ A6B1              ;    xor sign bit with ink[x] Sign
 203+ A6B1              ;    if negative thn its not an add
 204+ A6B1              ;
 205+ A6B1              ;        and h, 7F
 206+ A6B1              ;        b = 0
 207+ A6B1              ;        c = varS
 208+ A6B1              ;        subtract INW[X]hilo, bc
 209+ A6B1              ;        retain carry
 210+ A6B1              ;        get INKW[x]Sign
 211+ A6B1              ;        and 7F
 212+ A6B1              ;        subtract carry (so will go negtive if negative)
 213+ A6B1              ;        xor bit 7 of h with T to flip bit
 214+ A6B1              ;        write to INKW[x]Sign
 215+ A6B1              ;
 216+ A6B1              ;    else
 217+ A6B1              ;MV10.
 218+ A6B1              ;        add INWK[x]hi,lo, varS
 219+ A6B1              ;        or      sign bit
 220+ A6B1
 221+ A6B1
# file closed: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm
1070  A6B1                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm
   1+ A6B1              ; Note its big endian
   2+ A6B1 2A AA 9C     addDEtoCash:            ld      hl,(Cash)
   3+ A6B4 19                                   add     hl,de
   4+ A6B5 22 AA 9C                             ld      (Cash),hl
   5+ A6B8 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
   6+ A6BB 2A AC 9C                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
   7+ A6BE ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ A6C0 22 AC 9C                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ A6C3 C9                                   ret
  10+ A6C4
  11+ A6C4 2A AA 9C     subDEfromCash:          ld      hl,(Cash)
  12+ A6C7 7C                                   ld      a,h
  13+ A6C8 B5                                   or      l
  14+ A6C9 2A AC 9C                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  15+ A6CC B4                                   or      h
  16+ A6CD B5                                   or      l
  17+ A6CE C8                                   ret     z               ; No cash return
  18+ A6CF B7                                   or      a
  19+ A6D0 2A AA 9C                             ld      hl,(Cash)
  20+ A6D3 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  21+ A6D5 22 AA 9C                             ld      (Cash),hl
  22+ A6D8 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
  23+ A6DB 2A AC 9C                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  24+ A6DE ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  25+ A6E0 22 AC 9C                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  26+ A6E3                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,.ZeroCash
  26+ A6E3 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
  26+ A6E5 C2 E9 A6    >                        jp      nz,.ZeroCash
  27+ A6E8 C9                                   ret
  28+ A6E9 21 00 00     .ZeroCash:              ld      hl,0
  29+ A6EC 22 AA 9C                             ld      (Cash),hl
  30+ A6EF 22 AC 9C                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  31+ A6F2 C9                                   ret
