1071  A6F3                  INCLUDE "./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
   1+ A6F3              ;INPUTS: ahl = dividend cde = divisor
   2+ A6F3              ;OUTPUTS: cde = quotient ahl = remainder
   3+ A6F3 47           Div24by24:              ld b,a
   4+ A6F4 E5                                   push hl
   5+ A6F5 DD E1                                pop ix
   6+ A6F7 2E 18                                ld l,24
   7+ A6F9 E5                                   push hl
   8+ A6FA AF                                   xor a
   9+ A6FB 67                                   ld h,a
  10+ A6FC 6F                                   ld l,a
  11+ A6FD DD 29        .Div24by24loop:         add ix,ix
  12+ A6FF CB 10                                rl b
  13+ A701 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
  14+ A703 17                                   rla
  15+ A704 B9                                   cp c
  16+ A705 38 0C                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  17+ A707 20 05                                jr nz,.Div24by24setbit
  18+ A709 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
  19+ A70B 19                                   add hl,de
  20+ A70C 38 05                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  21+ A70E ED 52        .Div24by24setbit:       sbc hl,de
  22+ A710 99                                   sbc a,c
  23+ A711 DD 23                                inc ix
  24+ A713 E3           .Div24by24skip:         ex (sp),hl
  25+ A714 2D                                   dec l
  26+ A715 E3                                   ex (sp),hl
  27+ A716 20 E5                                jr nz,.Div24by24loop
  28+ A718 D1                                   pop de
  29+ A719 48                                   ld c,b
  30+ A71A DD E5                                push ix
  31+ A71C D1                                   pop de
  32+ A71D C9                                   ret
  33+ A71E
  34+ A71E FD 67        Div24by24ASigned:       ld      iyh,a
  35+ A720 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  36+ A722 CD F3 A6                             call    Div24by24
  37+ A725 F5                                   push    af
  38+ A726 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
  39+ A728 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  40+ A72A B1                                   or      c
  41+ A72B 4F                                   ld      c,a
  42+ A72C F1                                   pop     af
  43+ A72D C9                                   ret
  44+ A72E
  45+ A72E
  46+ A72E FD 67        Div24by24LeadSign:      ld      iyh,a           ; Preserve signed in IYL
  47+ A730 A9                                   xor     c               ; flip sign if negative
  48+ A731 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit    ; .
  49+ A733 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a           ; .
  50+ A735 79                                   ld      a,c             ; make both values ABS
  51+ A736 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  52+ A738 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; .
  53+ A739 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; .
  54+ A73B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  55+ A73D CD F3 A6                             call    Div24by24       ; do abs divide
  56+ A740 FD B5                                or      iyl             ; bring in sign bit
  57+ A742 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save a
  58+ A744 79                                   ld      a,c             ; sort sign for c
  59+ A745 FD B5                                or      iyl             ;
  60+ A747 4F                                   ld      c,a             ;
  61+ A748 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; sort sign of a
  62+ A74A C9                                   ret
  63+ A74B
  64+ A74B              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  65+ A74B              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  66+ A74B              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  67+ A74B              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  68+ A74B 47           PROJ256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
  69+ A74C 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  70+ A74E 16 00                                ld      d,0
  71+ A750 3A 72 98                             ld      a,(varQ)
  72+ A753 5F                                   ld      e,a
  73+ A754 21 00 00     PROJDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  74+ A757 78                                   ld      a,b
  75+ A758 06 10                                ld      b,16
  76+ A75A CB 31        PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll     c       ; unroll 16 times
  77+ A75C 17                                   rla             ; ...
  78+ A75D ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl       ; ...
  79+ A75F ED 52                                sbc     hl,de       ; ...
  80+ A761 30 02                                jr      nc,PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP       ; ...
  81+ A763 19                                   add     hl,de       ; ...
  82+ A764 0D                                   dec     c       ; ...
  83+ A765 10 F3        PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  84+ A767 79                                   ld      a,c
  85+ A768 32 73 98                             ld      (varR),a
  86+ A76B C9                                   ret
  87+ A76C
  88+ A76C              ;INPUTS:    bhl = dividend  cde = divisor where b and c are sign bytes
  89+ A76C              ;OUTPUTS:   cahl = quotient cde = divisor
  90+ A76C 32 6E 97     DVID3B2:                ld      (varPhi2),a                     ;DVID3B2 \ Divide 3 bytes by 2, K = [P(HiLo).A]/[INWK_z HiLo], for planet radius, Xreg protected. ; P+2    \ num sg
  91+ A76F                                      ldCopy2Byte UBnKzlo, varQ               ; [QR} = Ubnk zlohi  (i.e. Inwk_z HiLo)
  91+ A76F 2A 12 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnKzlo)
  91+ A772 22 72 98    >                        ld       (varQ),hl
  92+ A775 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                    ;
  93+ A778 32 74 98                             ld      (varS),a                        ; S = inkw z sign
  94+ A77B ED 5B 6C 97  DVID3B:                 ld      de,(varP)                       ; K (3bytes)=P(Lo Hi Hi2)/S.R.Q approx  Acc equiv K(0).; get P and P+1 into de
  95+ A77F 7B                                   ld      a,e                             ; num lo
  96+ A780 F6 01                                or      1                               ; must be at least 1
  97+ A782 32 6C 97                             ld      (varP),a                        ; store
  98+ A785 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; update DE too
  99+ A786 3A 6E 97                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ; varP Sign     E.D.A = P Lo Hi Hi2
 100+ A789 21 74 98                             ld      hl,varS                         ; hl = address of VarS
 101+ A78C AE                                   xor     (hl)                            ; A = PHi2 Xor S Signs
 102+ A78D E6 80                                and     $80                             ;
 103+ A78F 32 8F 98                             ld      (varT),a                        ; T = Sign bit of A
 104+ A792 FD 2E 00                             ld      iyl,0                           ; iyl = yReg = counter
 105+ A795 3A 6E 97                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ;
 106+ A798 E6 7F                                and     $7F                             ; A = Ph2 again but minus sign bit
 107+ A79A              DVL9:                   JumpIfAGTENusng $40,DV14                ; counter Y up; if object is over $40 away then scaled and exit Y count
 107+ A79A FE 40       >                        cp     $40
 107+ A79C D2 AA A7    >                        jp		nc,DV14
 108+ A79F                                      ShiftDELeft1                            ; de (or P,P1) > 1
 108+ A79F CB 23       >			   sla e
 108+ A7A1 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 109+ A7A3 CB 17                                rl      a                               ; and accumulator as 3rd byte
 110+ A7A5 FD 2C                                inc     iyl
 111+ A7A7 C2 9A A7                             jp      nz,DVL9                         ; loop again with a max of 256 iterations
 112+ A7AA 32 6E 97     DV14:                   ld      (varPhi2),a                     ; scaled, exited Ycount
 113+ A7AD ED 53 6C 97                          ld      (varP),de                       ; store off the value so far
 114+ A7B1 3A 74 98                             ld      a,(varS)                        ; zsign
 115+ A7B4 E6 7F                                and     $7F                             ; denom sg7
 116+ A7B6                                      ; jp mi,DV9                             ; this can never happen as bit 7 is and'ed out
 117+ A7B6 2A 72 98                             ld      hl,(varQ)                       ; demon lo
 118+ A7B9 FD 2D        DVL6:                   dec     iyl                             ; counter Y back down, roll S. ;  scale Y back
 119+ A7BB                                      ShiftHLLeft1
 119+ A7BB CB 25       >			   sla l
 119+ A7BD CB 14       >			   rl  h
 120+ A7BF CB 17                                rl      a                               ; mulitply QRS by 2
 121+ A7C1 F2 B9 A7                             jp      p,DVL6                          ; loop roll S until Abit7 set.
 122+ A7C4 22 72 98     DV9:                    ld      (varQ),hl                       ; bmi cant enter here from above ; save off so far
 123+ A7C7 32 72 98                             ld      (varQ),a                        ; Q \ mostly empty so now reuse as hi denom
 124+ A7CA 3E FE                                ld      a,$FE                           ;  Xreg protected so can't LL28+4
 125+ A7CC 32 73 98                             ld      (varR),a                        ;  R
 126+ A7CF 3A 6E 97                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ; P+2 \ big numerator
 127+ A7D2 CD 4B A7                             call    PROJ256mulAdivQ                 ; TODO LL31\ R now =A*256/Q
 128+ A7D5 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 129+ A7D7 32 87 98                             ld      (varKp1),a
 130+ A7DA 32 88 98                             ld      (varKp2),a
 131+ A7DD 32 89 98                             ld      (varKp3),a                      ; clear out K+1 to K+3
 132+ A7E0 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl                           ; Y counter for scale
 133+ A7E2                                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,DV12                 ; Ycount +ve
 133+ A7E2 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 133+ A7E4 CA 0F A8    >                        jp      z,DV12
 134+ A7E7 3A 73 98                             ld      a,(varR)                        ; R     \ else Y count is -ve, Acc = remainder.
 135+ A7EA ED 5B 86 98                          ld      de,(varK)                       ; d= k1
 136+ A7EE 2A 8A 98                             ld      hl,(varK2)                      ; h = k3, l = k2
 137+ A7F1 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; use e to hold K0 pulled from a
 138+ A7F2 CB 27        DVL8:                   sla     a                               ; boost up a                     ;  counter Y up
 139+ A7F4 CB 12                                rl      d                               ; k1
 140+ A7F6 CB 15                                rl      l                               ; k2
 141+ A7F8 CB 14                                rl      h                               ; k3
 142+ A7FA FD 2C                                inc     iyl
 143+ A7FC 20 F4                                jr      nz,DVL8                         ;
 144+ A7FE ED 53 86 98  DVL8Save:               ld      (varK),de
 145+ A802 22 8A 98                             ld      (varK2),hl                      ; save back K0 to k3
 146+ A805 3A 8F 98                             ld      a,(varT)
 147+ A808 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; get varT into c reg
 148+ A809 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ; a= k3 (sign)
 149+ A80A B1                                   or      c                               ; merge in varT (sign)that was saved much earlier up)
 150+ A80B 32 99 98                             ld      (varK3),a                       ; load sign bit back into K3
 151+ A80E C9                                   ret
 152+ A80F              DV12:                   JumpIfAIsZero   DV13                    ; Y Count zerp, go to DV13
 152+ A80F A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 152+ A810 CA 27 A8    >                        jp	z, DV13
 153+ A813 3A 73 98                             ld      a,(varR)                        ; Reduce Remainder
 154+ A816 CB 3F        DVL10:                  srl     a                               ; divide by 2                     ; counter Y reduce
 155+ A818 FD 2D                                dec     iyl
 156+ A81A C2 16 A8                             jp      nz,DVL10                        ; loop y reduce until y is zero
 157+ A81D 32 86 98                             ld      (varK),a                        ; k Lo
 158+ A820                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varKp3                 ; Copy sign to K+3
 158+ A820 3A 8F 98    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 158+ A823 32 89 98    >                        ld       (varKp3),a
 159+ A826 C9                                   ret
 160+ A827              DV13:                   ldCopyByte  varR,varK                   ; R \ already correct so copy to K lo;DV13   \ Ycount zero \ K(1to2) already = 0
 160+ A827 3A 73 98    >                        ld       a,(varR)
 160+ A82A 32 86 98    >                        ld       (varK),a
 161+ A82D                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varKp3                 ; Copy sign to K+3
 161+ A82D 3A 8F 98    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 161+ A830 32 89 98    >                        ld       (varKp3),a
 162+ A833 C9                                   ret
 163+ A834
 164+ A834
 165+ A834 CD 6C A7     PLS6:                   call    DVID3B2                         ; Returns AHL K ( 2 1 0 )
 166+ A837 3A 89 98                             ld      a,(varKp3)
 167+ A83A E6 7F                                and     $7F
 168+ A83C 21 88 98                             ld      hl,varKp2
 169+ A83F B6                                   or      (hl)
 170+ A840 C2 55 A8                             jp      nz,PL44TooBig
 171+ A843 3A 87 98                             ld      a,(varKp1)
 172+ A846 FE 04                                cp      4                               ; if high byte > 4 then total > 1024 so too big
 173+ A848 30 0B                                jr      nc,PL44TooBig
 174+ A84A                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; we have a good result regardless
 174+ A84A B7          >                        or a
 175+ A84B 2A 86 98                             ld      hl,(varK)                       ; get K (0 1)
 176+ A84E 3A 89 98                             ld      a,(varKp3)                      ; if sign bit high?
 177+ A851 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 178+ A853 C8                                   ret     z                               ; no so we can just return
 179+ A854 C9           PL44:                   ret
 180+ A855 37           PL44TooBig:             scf
 181+ A856 C9                                   ret

   1+ A857              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient

   3+ A85A 3A 72 98                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ A85D C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ A85F 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ A862 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ A863                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ A863 CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ A865 CB 1D       >			   rr  l

  11+ A86C 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ A86D EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ A86E              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1

  17+ A878 EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ A879 D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ A87B C9                                   ret
  20+ A87C
  21+ A87C
  22+ A87C              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  23+ A87C ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  24+ A87C ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  25+ A87C ~                                    ld      e,a
  26+ A87C ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  27+ A87C ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  28+ A87C ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  29+ A87C ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  30+ A87C ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ A87C ~                                    ld      d,a
  32+ A87C ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  33+ A87C ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  34+ A87C ~                                    ld      e,a
  35+ A87C ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  36+ A87C ~                                    ld      a,d
  37+ A87C ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  38+ A87C ~                                    ld      d,a
  39+ A87C                                      ENDM

  44+ A87C              madXAequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned

  45+ A892 2A 73 98     madDEaddRS:             ld		hl,(varR)

  47+ A898 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE

  54+ A89E 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  55+ A89F E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  56+ A8A1 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  57+ A8A2 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  58+ A8A3                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  58+ A8A3 FA BB A8    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  59+ A8A6 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  60+ A8A7 B2                                   or      d
  61+ A8A8                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  61+ A8A8 FA AD A8    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  62+ A8AB 19                                   add     hl,de
  63+ A8AC C9                                   ret
  64+ A8AD 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  65+ A8AE E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  66+ A8B0 67                                   ld      h,a
  67+ A8B1 7A                                   ld      a,d
  68+ A8B2 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  69+ A8B4 57                                   ld      d,a
  70+ A8B5 19                                   add     hl,de
  71+ A8B6 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  72+ A8B8 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  73+ A8B9 67                                   ld      h,a
  74+ A8BA C9                                   ret
  75+ A8BB 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  76+ A8BC E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  77+ A8BE 67                                   ld      h,a
  78+ A8BF 7A                                   ld      a,d
  79+ A8C0 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  80+ A8C2 57                                   ld      d,a
  81+ A8C3 B7                                   or      a
  82+ A8C4 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  83+ A8C6 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  84+ A8C8 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  85+ A8C9 B4                                   or      h
  86+ A8CA 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  87+ A8CB C9                                   ret
  88+ A8CC              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  88+ A8CC AF          >                    xor a
  88+ A8CD 95          >                    sub l
  88+ A8CE 6F          >                    ld l,a
  88+ A8CF 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  88+ A8D0 94          >                    sub h
  88+ A8D1 67          >                    ld h,a
  89+ A8D2 78                                   ld      a,b
  90+ A8D3 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  91+ A8D5 B4                                   or      h
  92+ A8D6 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  93+ A8D7 C9                                   ret

  96+ A8D8                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
  97+ A8D8                  ;
  98+ A8D8                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
  99+ A8D8                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 100+ A8D8                  ;
 101+ A8D8                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 102+ A8D8                  ;         carry reset
 103+ A8D8                  ;
 104+ A8D8                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 105+ A8D8 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 106+ A8D9 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 107+ A8DA ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 108+ A8DC EB                                   ex de,hl
 109+ A8DD ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 110+ A8DF
 111+ A8DF 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 112+ A8E0 85                                   add a,l
 113+ A8E1 57                                   ld  d,a
 114+ A8E2 EB                                   ex de,hl
 115+ A8E3
 116+ A8E3 7A                                   ld  a,d
 117+ A8E4 CE 00                                adc a,0
 118+ A8E6 C9                                   ret
 119+ A8E7
 120+ A8E7
 121+ A8E7
 122+ A8E7                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 123+ A8E7                 ;
 124+ A8E7                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 125+ A8E7                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 126+ A8E7                 ;
 127+ A8E7                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 128+ A8E7                 ;         carry reset
 129+ A8E7                 ;
 130+ A8E7                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 131+ A8E7
 132+ A8E7
 133+ A8E7
 134+ A8E7 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 135+ A8E8 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 136+ A8E9 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 137+ A8EA 6A                                   ld l,d
 138+ A8EB E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 139+ A8EC 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 140+ A8ED              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 141+ A8ED ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 142+ A8EF EB                                   ex de,hl
 143+ A8F0 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 144+ A8F2
 145+ A8F2 AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 146+ A8F3 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 147+ A8F4 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 148+ A8F5
 149+ A8F5 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 150+ A8F6 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 151+ A8F7 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 152+ A8F9
 153+ A8F9 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 154+ A8FA 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 155+ A8FB
 156+ A8FB 7A                                   ld a,d
 157+ A8FC 85                                   add a,l
 158+ A8FD 67                                   ld h,a
 159+ A8FE 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 160+ A8FF
 161+ A8FF D1                                   pop de
 162+ A900 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 163+ A902
 164+ A902 EB                                   ex de,hl
 165+ A903 ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 166+ A905 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 167+ A906
 168+ A906 C9                                   ret
 169+ A907
 170+ A907              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 171+ A907              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 172+ A907              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 173+ A907              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 174+ A907              ;         carry reset
 175+ A907              ; maths is
 176+ A907              ;        hl = y , de= x
 177+ A907              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 178+ A907              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 179+ A907              ;
 180+ A907              ;
 181+ A907              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 182+ A907 C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 183+ A908 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 184+ A909 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 185+ A90A 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 186+ A90B 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 187+ A90C 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 188+ A90D ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 189+ A90F EB                                   ex de,hl
 190+ A910 ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 191+ A912 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 192+ A913 59                                   ld e,c
 193+ A914 50                                   ld d,b
 194+ A915 ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 195+ A917 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 196+ A918 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 197+ A919 67                                   ld h,a
 198+ A91A 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 199+ A91B                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 200+ A91B AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 201+ A91C C1                                   pop     bc
 202+ A91D C9                                   ret
 203+ A91E
 204+ A91E
 205+ A91E              ; CHL = multiplicand D = multiplier
 206+ A91E              ; DCHL = CHL * D
 207+ A91E 7A           mulCHLbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 208+ A91F AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 209+ A920 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 210+ A922 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 211+ A924 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; now CHL = ABS (CHL)
 212+ A925 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 213+ A927 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; .
 214+ A928 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 215+ A929 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 216+ A92B              ; At this point CHL = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 217+ A92B 57           .mul1:                  ld      d,a                 ; first do D * L
 218+ A92C 5D                                   ld      e,l                 ; .
 219+ A92D ED 30                                mul     de                  ; DE = L * D
 220+ A92F 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save multiplier
 221+ A930 6B                                   ld      l,e                 ; L = p0
 222+ A931 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; carry byte
 223+ A932 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; retrieve muliplier and save carry byte along with flags
 224+ A933 5C           .mul2:                  ld      e,h                 ; byte 2 of multiplicand
 225+ A934 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; and multiplier
 226+ A935 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; now its D & L
 227+ A937 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte with flags
 228+ A938 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; add low byte carry to result and retain carry too through next instructions
 229+ A939 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; h = P1
 230+ A93A 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = carry byte
 231+ A93B 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save carry byte and get back multiplier with flags
 232+ A93C 59           .mul3:                  ld      e,c                 ; byte 3 of multiplicand
 233+ A93D 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 234+ A93E ED 30                                mul     de                  ;
 235+ A940 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte and carry prior to first add
 236+ A941 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ;
 237+ A942 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; recover saved resultant sign
 238+ A944 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; c byte 3. Note the value range allowed can never cause a byte 3 carry
 239+ A945 C9                                   ret
 240+ A946
 241+ A946              ;  CHL = 53456 D = 1E
 242+ A946              ;  56 * 1E = A14 L = 14 carry = 0A
 243+ A946              ;  34 * 1E = 618 H = 18 +A = 22 carry = 6
 244+ A946              ;  5  * 1E = 096 C = 96 + 6 = 9C
 245+ A946              ;  CHL = 9C2214
 246+ A946
 247+ A946              ; DELC = HLE * D, uses HL, DE, C , A , IYH
 248+ A946              ; HLE = multiplicand D = multiplier
 249+ A946 7A           mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 250+ A947 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 251+ A948 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 252+ A94A FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 253+ A94C 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 254+ A94D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 255+ A94F 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 256+ A950 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 257+ A951 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 258+ A953              ; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 259+ A953 ED 30        .mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 260+ A955 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save mulitplier
 261+ A956 4B                                   ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 262+ A957 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; save carry and get back multiplier
 263+ A958 08                                   ex      af,af'
 264+ A959 5D           .mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 265+ A95A 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 266+ A95B ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 267+ A95D 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; .
 268+ A95E 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + carry byte
 269+ A95F 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 270+ A960 7A                                   ld      a,d
 271+ A961 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save new carry byte
 272+ A962 5C           .mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; e = H * D
 273+ A963 57                                   ld      d,a
 274+ A964 ED 30                                mul     de
 275+ A966 08                                   ex      af,af'
 276+ A967 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ;
 277+ A968 5F                                   ld      e,a
 278+ A969 FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 279+ A96B C9                                   ret
 280+ A96C
 281+ A96C
 282+ A96C              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 283+ A96C              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 284+ A96C              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 285+ A96C              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 286+ A96C              ;         carry reset
 287+ A96C              ;
 288+ A96C              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 289+ A96C 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 290+ A96D AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 291+ A96E 32 6C A9                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 292+ A971 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 293+ A972 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 294+ A975 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 295+ A977 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 296+ A979 57                                   ld      d,a
 297+ A97A 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 298+ A97C 32 6C A9                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 299+ A97F 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 300+ A980 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 301+ A983 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 302+ A985 E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 303+ A987 67                                   ld      h,a
 304+ A988 3A 6C A9                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 305+ A98B EE 80                                xor     $80
 306+ A98D 32 6C A9                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 307+ A990 CD 07 A9     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 308+ A993 3A 6C A9     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 309+ A996 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 310+ A999 C8                                   ret     z
 311+ A99A AF           .Negateghl: 			xor 	a
 312+ A99B 95                                   sub 	l
 313+ A99C 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 314+ A99D 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 315+ A99E 94                                   sub 	h
 316+ A99F 67                                   ld 		h,a
 317+ A9A0 C9                                   ret
 318+ A9A1
 319+ A9A1 AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 320+ A9A2 32 6C A9                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 321+ A9A5 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 322+ A9A6 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 323+ A9A9 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 324+ A9AB E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 325+ A9AD 57                                   ld      d,a

 327+ A9B0 32 6C A9                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a

 329+ A9B6 3A 6C A9     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 330+ A9B9 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 331+ A9BC C8                                   ret     z

 333+ A9BE 95                                   sub 	l
 334+ A9BF 6F                                   ld 		l,a

1073  A9C4                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"

   1+ A9C4              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ A9C4              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ A9C4
   4+ A9C4              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ A9C4 ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ A9C4 ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ A9C4 ~            			mul
   8+ A9C4              			ENDM
   9+ A9C4
  10+ A9C4              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ A9C4 ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ A9C4 ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ A9C4 ~            			mul
  14+ A9C4 ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ A9C4              			ENDM
  16+ A9C4
  17+ A9C4
  18+ A9C4              asm_squa:
  19+ A9C4 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  20+ A9C6              ; "ASM SQUA2 : TESTGOOD"
  21+ A9C6              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi singed"
  22+ A9C6              asm_squa2:
  23+ A9C6 5F           	ld e, a
  24+ A9C7 57           	ld d,a
  25+ A9C8 ED 30        	mul
  26+ A9CA ED 53 6C 97  	ld (varP),de
  27+ A9CE 7B           	ld a,e
  28+ A9CF C9           	ret
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
1074  A9D0                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ A9D0              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ A9D0              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ A9D0              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ A9D0              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ A9D0              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ A9D0              asm_sqrt:
   7+ A9D0 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ A9D3 61           	ld h,c
   9+ A9D4 69           	ld l,c
  10+ A9D5              .sqrloop:
  11+ A9D5 CB 38        	srl b
  12+ A9D7 CB 19        	rr c
  13+ A9D9 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ A9DA EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ A9DB ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ A9DD 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ A9DF EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ A9E0 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ A9E1 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ A9E3              .sqrbit:
  21+ A9E3 19           	add hl,de
  22+ A9E4 EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ A9E5 B7           	or a
  24+ A9E6 ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ A9E8              .sqrfi:
  26+ A9E8 CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ A9EA CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ A9EC CB 38        	srl b
  29+ A9EE CB 19        	rr c
  30+ A9F0 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ A9F2 C9           	ret
  32+ A9F3
  33+ A9F3
  34+ A9F3              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ A9F3 3A 72 98     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ A9F6 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ A9F7 3A 73 98     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ A9FA 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ A9FB CD D0 A9     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ A9FE 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ A9FF 32 72 98     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ AA02 C9           	ret
  43+ AA03
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
1075  AA03                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ AA03              ;
   2+ AA03              ;   Set flags E to 11111110
   3+ AA03              ;   Loop:   A << 2
   4+ AA03              ;           if carry was 0
   5+ AA03              ;               if a >= D
   6+ AA03              ;                   A = A - D
   7+ AA03              ;                   clear carry (probably irrelevant really)
   8+ AA03              ;           else
   9+ AA03
  10+ AA03              ;               sla flags << bringing in carry of 1
  11+ AA03              ;               if bit 7 of flag was set then loop
  12+ AA03              ;                                        elase a = e and exit
  13+ AA03              ;
  14+ AA03              ;
  15+ AA03              ;
  16+ AA03
  17+ AA03              AEquAmul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
  17+ AA03 BA          >                        cp     d
  17+ AA04 D2 22 AA    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
  18+ AA07 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
  19+ AA09 CB 27        .DivideLoop:            sla     a
  20+ AA0B 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
  21+ AA0D                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
  21+ AA0D BA          >                        cp      d
  21+ AA0E DA 13 AA    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
  22+ AA11 92                                   sub     d
  23+ AA12                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
  23+ AA12 B7          >                        or a
  24+ AA13              .SkipSub:               FlipCarryFlag                       ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  24+ AA13 3F          >                        ccf
  25+ AA14 CB 13                                rl      e
  26+ AA16 38 F1                                jr      c,.DivideLoop
  27+ AA18 7B                                   ld      a,e
  28+ AA19 C9                                   ret
  29+ AA1A 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  30+ AA1B                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  30+ AA1B 37          >                        scf
  31+ AA1C CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  32+ AA1E 38 E9                                jr      c,.DivideLoop               ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  33+ AA20 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  34+ AA21 C9                                   ret
  35+ AA22 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  36+ AA24 C9                                   ret
  37+ AA25
  38+ AA25
  39+ AA25              ; Divide 8-bit values
  40+ AA25              ; In: Divide E by divider C
  41+ AA25              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
  42+ AA25              ;
  43+ AA25              ;;;Div8:
  44+ AA25              ;;;    xor a
  45+ AA25              ;;;    ld b,8
  46+ AA25              ;;;Div8_Loop:
  47+ AA25              ;;;    rl e
  48+ AA25              ;;;    rla
  49+ AA25              ;;;    sub c
  50+ AA25              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
  51+ AA25              ;;;    add a,c
  52+ AA25              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
  53+ AA25              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
  54+ AA25              ;;;    ld b,a0
  55+ AA25              ;;;    ld a,e
  56+ AA25              ;;;    rla
  57+ AA25              ;;;    cpl
  58+ AA25              ;;;    ret
  59+ AA25
  60+ AA25              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
  61+ AA25              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
  62+ AA25              ;;         A is a copy of E
  63+ AA25              ;;         HL is the remainder
  64+ AA25              ;;         BC is not changed
  65+ AA25              ;; so DE = DE /BC
  66+ AA25              ;140 bytes
  67+ AA25              ;145cc
  68+ AA25
  69+ AA25              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
  70+ AA25 ~                                rla
  71+ AA25 ~                                adc     hl,hl
  72+ AA25 ~                                sbc     hl,bc
  73+ AA25 ~                                jr      nc,$+3
  74+ AA25 ~                                add     hl,bc
  75+ AA25                                  ENDM
  76+ AA25
  77+ AA25              DEequDEDivBC:
  78+ AA25 AF               xor a
  79+ AA26 ED 62            sbc hl,hl
  80+ AA28 7A               ld a,d
  81+ AA29                  MacroDEDivBC
  81+ AA29 17          >                    rla
  81+ AA2A ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  81+ AA2C ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  81+ AA2E 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  81+ AA30 09          >                    add     hl,bc

 106+ AAB1
 107+ AAB1
 108+ AAB1
 109+ AAB1              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
 110+ AAB1              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 111+ AAB1              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 112+ AAB1              ; Our use
 113+ AAB1              ; BC = A0
 114+ AAB1              ; DE = 0C
 115+ AAB1              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
 116+ AAB1              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
 116+ AAB1 B9          >                        cp     c
 116+ AAB2 D2 DD AA    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
 117+ AAB5 47                                   ld      b,a
 118+ AAB6 59                                   ld      e,c
 119+ AAB7 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 120+ AAB9 16 00                                ld      d,0
 121+ AABB C3 C8 AA                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
 122+ AABE 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
 123+ AABF 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 124+ AAC1 21 72 98                             ld      hl,varQ
 125+ AAC4 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 126+ AAC5 16 00                                ld      d,0
 127+ AAC7 5F                                   ld      e,a
 128+ AAC8              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
 129+ AAC8 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
 130+ AACB 78                                   ld      a,b
 131+ AACC 06 10                                ld      b,16
 132+ AACE CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
 133+ AAD0 17                                   rla			; ...
 134+ AAD1 ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
 135+ AAD3 ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
 136+ AAD5 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
 137+ AAD7 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 138+ AAD8 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 139+ AAD9 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 140+ AADB 47                                   ld   b,a
 141+ AADC C9                                   ret
 142+ AADD 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 143+ AAE0 C9                                   ret
 144+ AAE1
 145+ AAE1              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 146+ AAE1 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 147+ AAE3 AF                                   xor a
 148+ AAE4 CB 21        .div8_loop:	            sla c
 149+ AAE6 17                                   rla
 150+ AAE7 BA                                   cp d
 151+ AAE8 38 02                                jr c,.div8_skip
 151+ AAEA
 152+ AAEA 0C                                   inc c
 153+ AAEB 92                                   sub d
 154+ AAEC 10 F6        .div8_skip:	            djnz .div8_loop
 155+ AAEE C9                                   ret
 156+ AAEF              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 157+ AAEF 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 158+ AAF1 AF                                   xor a
 159+ AAF2 CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 160+ AAF4 CB 14                                rl	h
 161+ AAF6              ;    add hl,hl
 162+ AAF6 17                                   rla
 163+ AAF7 B9                                   cp c
 164+ AAF8 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 165+ AAFA 2C                                   inc l
 166+ AAFB 91                                   sub c
 167+ AAFC 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 168+ AAFE C9                                   ret
 169+ AAFF              ;
 170+ AAFF              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 171+ AAFF              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 172+ AAFF              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 173+ AAFF              ;
 174+ AAFF              HLDivC_Iteration: 	MACRO
 175+ AAFF ~            					add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 176+ AAFF ~            					rla				; ...
 177+ AAFF ~            					cp	c			; ...
 178+ AAFF ~            					jr	1F
 179+ AAFF ~            					sub	c			; ...
 180+ AAFF ~            1:
 181+ AAFF ~            					inc	l			; ...
 182+ AAFF              					ENDM
 183+ AAFF
 184+ AAFF
 185+ AAFF
 186+ AAFF              ; ">div1616: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder"
 187+ AAFF 21 00 00     Div1616:            ld hl,0
 188+ AB02 78                               ld a,b
 189+ AB03 06 08                            ld b,8
 190+ AB05 17           .Div16_Loop1:       rla
 191+ AB06 ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 192+ AB08 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 193+ AB0A 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd1
 194+ AB0C 19                               add hl,de
 195+ AB0D 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd1:      djnz .Div16_Loop1
 196+ AB0F 17                               rla
 197+ AB10 2F                               cpl
 198+ AB11 47                               ld b,a
 199+ AB12 79                               ld a,c
 200+ AB13 48                               ld c,b
 201+ AB14 06 08                            ld b,8
 202+ AB16 17           .Div16_Loop2:       rla
 203+ AB17 ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 204+ AB19 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 205+ AB1B 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd2
 206+ AB1D 19                               add hl,de

 208+ AB20 17                               rla

 210+ AB22 41                               ld b,c
 211+ AB23 4F                               ld c,a
 212+ AB24 C9                               ret

 226+ AB25              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 227+ AB25              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 228+ AB25              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 229+ AB25              ;min: 738cc
 230+ AB25              ;max: 898cc
 231+ AB25              ;avg: 818cc
 232+ AB25              ;144 bytes
 233+ AB25 AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
