 259+ AB99                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 259+ AB99 17          >				   rla
 259+ AB9A ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 259+ AB9C 19          >				   add	hl,de
 259+ AB9D 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 259+ AB9F ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 259+ ABA1             >1:
 260+ ABA1                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 260+ ABA1 17          >				   rla
 260+ ABA2 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 260+ ABA4 19          >				   add	hl,de
 260+ ABA5 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 260+ ABA7 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 260+ ABA9             >1:
 261+ ABA9                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 261+ ABA9 17          >				   rla
 261+ ABAA ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 261+ ABAC 19          >				   add	hl,de
 261+ ABAD 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 261+ ABAF ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 261+ ABB1             >1:
 262+ ABB1 17                                   rla
 263+ ABB2 4F                                   ld c,a
 264+ ABB3 C9                                   ret
 265+ ABB4
 266+ ABB4              ;Inputs:
 267+ ABB4              ;     DE,BC are 8.8 Fixed Point numbers
 268+ ABB4              ;Outputs:
 269+ ABB4              ;     DE is the 8.8 Fixed Point result (rounded to the least significant bit)
 270+ ABB4              ;if DE is 0 : 122cc or 136cc if BC is negative
 271+ ABB4              ;if |BC|>=128*|DE| : 152cc or 166cc if BC is negative
 272+ ABB4              ;Otherwise:
 273+ ABB4              ;min: 1107cc
 274+ ABB4              ;max: 1319cc
 275+ ABB4              ;avg: 1201cc
 276+ ABB4 78           BC_Div_DE_88:           ld a,b  ; First, find out if the output is positive or negative
 277+ ABB5 AA                                   xor d
 278+ ABB6 F5                                   push af   ;sign bit is the result sign bit
 279+ ABB7              ; Now make sure the inputs are positive
 280+ ABB7 A8                                   xor b     ;A now has the value of B, since I XORed it with D twice (cancelling)
 281+ ABB8 F2 C1 AB                             jp p,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1   ;if Positive, don't negate
 282+ ABBB AF                                   xor a
 283+ ABBC 91                                   sub c
 284+ ABBD 4F                                   ld c,a
 285+ ABBE 9F                                   sbc a,a
 286+ ABBF 90                                   sub b
 287+ ABC0 47                                   ld b,a
 288+ ABC1 7A           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1:      ld a,d  ;now make DE negative to optimize the remainder comparison
 289+ ABC2 B2                                   or d
 290+ ABC3 FA CC AB                             jp m,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2
 291+ ABC6 AF                                   xor a
 292+ ABC7 93                                   sub e
 293+ ABC8 5F                                   ld e,a
 294+ ABC9 9F                                   sbc a,a
 295+ ABCA 92                                   sub d
 296+ ABCB 57                                   ld d,a
 297+ ABCC B3           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2:      or e      ;if DE is 0, we can call it an overflow ;A is the current value of D
 298+ ABCD 28 1D                                jr z,div_fixed88_overflow
 299+ ABCF 26 00                                ld h,0          ;The accumulator gets set to B if no overflow.;We can use H=0 to save a few cc in the meantime
 300+ ABD1 78                                   ld a,b;if B+DE>=0, then we'll have overflow
 301+ ABD2 83                                   add a,e
 302+ ABD3 7A                                   ld a,d
 303+ ABD4 8C                                   adc a,h
 304+ ABD5 38 15                                jr c,div_fixed88_overflow
 305+ ABD7 68                                   ld l,b  ;Now we can load the accumulator/remainder with B;H is already 0
 306+ ABD8 79                                   ld a,c
 307+ ABD9 CD F4 AB                             call div_fixed88_sub
 308+ ABDC 4F                                   ld c,a
 309+ ABDD 78                                   ld a,b      ;A is now 0
 310+ ABDE CD F4 AB                             call div_fixed88_sub
 311+ ABE1 51                                   ld d,c
 312+ ABE2 5F                                   ld e,a
 313+ ABE3 F1                                   pop af
 314+ ABE4 F0                                   ret p
 315+ ABE5 AF                                   xor a
 316+ ABE6 93                                   sub e
 317+ ABE7 5F                                   ld e,a
 318+ ABE8 9F                                   sbc a,a
 319+ ABE9 92                                   sub d
 320+ ABEA 57                                   ld d,a
 321+ ABEB C9                                   ret
 322+ ABEC
 323+ ABEC 11 FF 7F     div_fixed88_overflow:   ld de,$7FFF
 324+ ABEF F1                                   pop af
 325+ ABF0 F0                                   ret p
 326+ ABF1 13                                   inc de
 327+ ABF2 1C                                   inc e
 328+ ABF3 C9                                   ret
 329+ ABF4
 330+ ABF4              ;min: 456cc
 331+ ABF4              ;max: 536cc
 332+ ABF4              ;avg: 496cc
 333+ ABF4 06 08        div_fixed88_sub:        ld b,8
 334+ ABF6 17           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3:      rla
 335+ ABF7 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
 336+ ABF9 19                                   add hl,de
 337+ ABFA 38 02                                jr c,$+4
 338+ ABFC ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 339+ ABFE 10 F6                                djnz BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3
 340+ AC00 8F                                   adc a,a
 341+ AC01 C9                                   ret
 342+ AC02
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
1076  AC02                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ AC02              asm_tis2:
   2+ AC02              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ AC02              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ AC02 F5           	push af
   5+ AC03 E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ AC05 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ AC06 3A 72 98     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ AC09 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ AC0A 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ AC0B BB           	cp e
  11+ AC0C 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ AC0E 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ AC10 ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ AC12 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ AC13 3A 72 98     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ AC16 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ AC17 CD EF AA     	call asm_div16
  18+ AC1A F1           	pop af
  19+ AC1B E6 80        	and $80
  20+ AC1D B5           	or l
  21+ AC1E C9           	ret
  22+ AC1F              .tis2_set96:
  23+ AC1F F1           	pop af
  24+ AC20 E6 80        	and $80
  25+ AC22 F6 96        	or $96
  26+ AC24 C9           	ret
  27+ AC25
  28+ AC25
  29+ AC25              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ AC25              squareregfx:
  31+ AC25 3A 83 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ AC28 57           	ld d,a
  33+ AC29 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ AC2A ED 30        	mul
  35+ AC2C EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ AC2D              squareregfy:
  37+ AC2D 3A 85 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ AC30 57           	ld d,a
  39+ AC31 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ AC32 ED 30        	mul
  41+ AC34 19           	add hl,de
  42+ AC35              squareregfz:
  43+ AC35 3A 87 C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ AC38 57           	ld d,a
  45+ AC39 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ AC3A ED 30        	mul
  47+ AC3C 19           	add hl,de
  48+ AC3D EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ AC3E              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ AC3E CD D0 A9     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ AC41 E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ AC42 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ AC43 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ AC44              normfx:
  55+ AC44 3A 83 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ AC47 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ AC48 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ AC49 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ AC4A CD 02 AC     	call asm_tis2
  60+ AC4D 32 83 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ AC50              normfy:
  62+ AC50 3A 85 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ AC53 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ AC54 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ AC55 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ AC56 CD 02 AC     	call asm_tis2
  67+ AC59 32 85 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ AC5C              normfz:
  69+ AC5C 3A 87 C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ AC5F E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ AC60 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ AC61 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ AC62 CD 02 AC     	call asm_tis2
  74+ AC65 32 87 C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ AC68              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ AC68 C9           	ret
  77+ AC69
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
1077  AC69                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ AC69              ; Input:
   2+ AC69              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ AC69              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ AC69              ; Output:
   5+ AC69              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ AC69              ;
   7+ AC69              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ AC69              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ AC69              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ AC69              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ AC69              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ AC69              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ AC69              ;
  14+ AC69
  15+ AC69 E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  16+ AC6A A7                               and     a
  17+ AC6B ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  18+ AC6D E1                               pop     hl
  19+ AC6E C9                               ret
  20+ AC6F
  21+ AC6F              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  22+ AC6F              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  23+ AC6F
  24+ AC6F E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  25+ AC71 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  26+ AC72 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  27+ AC74 67                               ld      h,a
  28+ AC75 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  29+ AC76 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  30+ AC78 57                               ld      d,a
  31+ AC79 A7                               and     a
  32+ AC7A ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  33+ AC7C D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  34+ AC7E C9                               ret
  35+ AC7F
  36+ AC7F
# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
1078  AC7F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ AC7F              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ AC7F              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ AC7F              negate16:
   4+ AC7F              negate16hl:
   5+ AC7F                      ; Input:
   6+ AC7F                      ;       HL = value
   7+ AC7F                      ; Output:
   8+ AC7F                      ;       HL = -value
   9+ AC7F                      ; Destroys:
  10+ AC7F                      ;       AF
  11+ AC7F                      ;
  12+ AC7F AF           	xor 	a
  13+ AC80 95           	sub 	l
  14+ AC81 6F           	ld 		l,a
  15+ AC82 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  16+ AC83 94           	sub 	h
  17+ AC84 67           	ld 		h,a
  18+ AC85 C9           	ret
  19+ AC86
  20+ AC86              negate16de:
  21+ AC86 AF           	xor 	a
  22+ AC87 93           	sub 	e
  23+ AC88 5F           	ld 		e,a
  24+ AC89 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  25+ AC8A 92           	sub 	d
  26+ AC8B 57           	ld 		d,a
  27+ AC8C C9           	ret
  28+ AC8D
  29+ AC8D              negate16bc:
  30+ AC8D AF           	xor 	a
  31+ AC8E 91           	sub 	c
  32+ AC8F 4F           	ld 		c,a
  33+ AC90 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  34+ AC91 90           	sub 	b
  35+ AC92 47           	ld 		b,a
  36+ AC93 C9           	ret
  37+ AC94
  38+ AC94
  39+ AC94              macronegate16hl:	MACRO
  40+ AC94 ~            					xor 	a
  41+ AC94 ~            					sub 	l
  42+ AC94 ~            					ld 		l,a
  43+ AC94 ~            					sbc 	a,a
  44+ AC94 ~            					sub 	h
  45+ AC94 ~            					ld 		h,a
  46+ AC94              					ENDM
  47+ AC94
  48+ AC94              macronegate16de:	MACRO
  49+ AC94 ~            					xor 	a
  50+ AC94 ~                                sub 	e
  51+ AC94 ~                                ld 		e,a
  52+ AC94 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  53+ AC94 ~                                sub 	d
  54+ AC94 ~                                ld 		d,a
  55+ AC94              					ENDM
  56+ AC94              macronegate16bc:	MACRO
  57+ AC94 ~            					xor 	a
  58+ AC94 ~                                sub 	c
  59+ AC94 ~                                ld 		c,a
  60+ AC94 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  61+ AC94 ~                                sub 	b
  62+ AC94 ~                                ld 		b,a
  63+ AC94              					ENDM
  64+ AC94
  65+ AC94              macronegate16ix:	MACRO
  66+ AC94 ~            					xor 	a
  67+ AC94 ~                                sub 	ixl
  68+ AC94 ~                                ld 		ixl,a
  69+ AC94 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  70+ AC94 ~                                sub 	ixh
  71+ AC94 ~                                ld 		ixh,a
  72+ AC94              					ENDM
# file closed: ./Maths/negate16.asm
1079  AC94                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ AC94 DD 68        AequAdivDmul96Unsg:     ld			ixl,b						; Get sign bit passed in as bit 7 in b
   2+ AC96                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, TISXAccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   2+ AC96 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ AC97 D2 AC AC    >                        jp		nc,TISXAccGTEQ
   3+ AC9A 4F                                   ld			c,a
   4+ AC9B CD E1 AA                             call		asm_div8
   5+ AC9E 79                                   ld			a,c							; a = result
   6+ AC9F CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
   7+ ACA1 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
   8+ ACA2 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
   9+ ACA4 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  10+ ACA5 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  11+ ACA6 DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl						; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  12+ ACA8 E6 80                                and			$80							; recover sign only
  13+ ACAA B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  14+ ACAB C9                                   ret
  15+ ACAC              TISXAccGTEQ:
  16+ ACAC              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  17+ ACAC DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl     					; get saved sign from b
  18+ ACAE E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
  19+ ACB0 F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
  20+ ACB2 C9                                   ret
  21+ ACB3
  22+ ACB3
  23+ ACB3
  24+ ACB3
  25+ ACB3              normaliseXX1596fast:
  26+ ACB3                  ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  27+ ACB3 3A 83 C0     	ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  28+ ACB6 DD 67        	ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  29+ ACB8 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; a = unsigned version
  30+ ACBA              N96SQX:
  31+ ACBA              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  31+ ACBA 5F          >			ld	e,a
  31+ ACBB 57          >			ld  d,a
  31+ ACBC ED 30       >			mul
  32+ ACBE 62           	ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  33+ ACBF 6B           	ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  34+ ACC0              N96SQY:
  35+ ACC0 3A 84 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  36+ ACC3 DD 6F        	ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  37+ ACC5 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  38+ ACC7              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  38+ ACC7 5F          >			ld	e,a
  38+ ACC8 57          >			ld  d,a
  38+ ACC9 ED 30       >			mul
  39+ ACCB 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  40+ ACCC              N96SQZ:
  41+ ACCC 3A 85 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  42+ ACCF FD 67        	ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  43+ ACD1 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  44+ ACD3              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  44+ ACD3 5F          >			ld	e,a
  44+ ACD4 57          >			ld  d,a
  44+ ACD5 ED 30       >			mul
  45+ ACD7              N96SQADD:
  46+ ACD7 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  47+ ACD8 EB           	ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  48+ ACD9              N96SQRT:
  49+ ACD9 CD D0 A9     	call	asm_sqrt			; hl = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  50+ ACDC              N96NORMX:
  51+ ACDC 3A 83 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+0)
  52+ ACDF E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  53+ ACE1 4F           	ld		c,a
  54+ ACE2 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  55+ ACE3 CD 0A AF     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  56+ ACE6 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  57+ ACE7 DD 7C        	ld		a,ixh			;++SGN
  58+ ACE9 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  59+ ACEB B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  60+ ACEC 32 83 C0     	ld		(XX15+0),a
  61+ ACEF              N96NORMY:
  62+ ACEF 3A 84 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  63+ ACF2 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  64+ ACF4 4F           	ld		c,a
  65+ ACF5 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  66+ ACF6 CD 0A AF     	call	AequAdivDmul96     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  67+ ACF9 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  68+ ACFA DD 7D        	ld		a,ixl			;++SGN
  69+ ACFC E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  70+ ACFE B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  71+ ACFF 32 84 C0     	ld		(XX15+1),a
  72+ AD02              N96NORMZ:
  73+ AD02 3A 85 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)
  74+ AD05 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  75+ AD07 4F           	ld		c,a
  76+ AD08 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  77+ AD09 CD 0A AF     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  78+ AD0C 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  79+ AD0D FD 7C        	ld		a,iyh			;++SGN
  80+ AD0F E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  81+ AD11 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  82+ AD12 32 85 C0     	ld		(XX15+2),a
  83+ AD15 C9           	ret
  84+ AD16
  85+ AD16              ; Normalise vector
  86+ AD16              ; scale Q = Sqrt (X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2)
  87+ AD16              ; X = X / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e X = X / Q * 3/8
  88+ AD16              ; Y = Y / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Y = Y / Q * 3/8
  89+ AD16              ; Z = Z / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Z = Z / Q * 3/8
  90+ AD16              ;
  91+ AD16              ;
  92+ AD16              ;
  93+ AD16
  94+ AD16              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  95+ AD16 3A 83 C0     normaliseXX1596:        ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  96+ AD19                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  96+ AD19 5F          >			ld	e,a
  96+ AD1A 57          >			ld  d,a
  96+ AD1B ED 30       >			mul
  97+ AD1D 7A                                   ld		a,d
  98+ AD1E 32 73 98                             ld		(varR),a			; R	 \ hi sum later use b
  99+ AD21 7B                                   ld		a,e
 100+ AD22 32 72 98                             ld		(varQ),a			; Q	 \ lo sum later use c
 101+ AD25 32 6C 97                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum later just drop
 102+ AD28 3A 84 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 103+ AD2B                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 103+ AD2B 5F          >			ld	e,a
 103+ AD2C 57          >			ld  d,a
 103+ AD2D ED 30       >			mul
 104+ AD2F 7A                                   ld		a,d
 105+ AD30 32 8F 98                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 106+ AD33 7B                                   ld		a,e
 107+ AD34 32 6C 97                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 108+ AD37 21 72 98                             ld		hl,varQ
 109+ AD3A 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 110+ AD3B 32 72 98                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q
 111+ AD3E 3A 8F 98                             ld		a,(varT)			;
 112+ AD41 21 73 98                             ld		hl,varR
 113+ AD44 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				;  R
 114+ AD45 32 73 98                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 115+ AD48 3A 85 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
 116+ AD4B                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 116+ AD4B 5F          >			ld	e,a
 116+ AD4C 57          >			ld  d,a
 116+ AD4D ED 30       >			mul
 117+ AD4F 7A                                   ld		a,d
 118+ AD50 32 8F 98                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 119+ AD53 7B                                   ld		a,e
 120+ AD54 32 6C 97                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 121+ AD57 21 72 98                             ld		hl,varQ
 122+ AD5A 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 123+ AD5B 32 72 98                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q  xlo2 + ylo2 + zlo2
 124+ AD5E 3A 8F 98                             ld		a,(varT)			; T temp Hi
 125+ AD61 21 73 98                             ld		hl,varR
 126+ AD64 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +R
 127+ AD65 32 73 98                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 128+ AD68 CD F3 A9                             call	sqrtQR				; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
 129+ AD6B 3A 83 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+0)
 130+ AD6E CD 04 AF                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 131+ AD71 32 83 C0                             ld		(XX15+0),a
 132+ AD74 3A 84 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 133+ AD77 CD 04 AF                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 134+ AD7A 32 84 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 135+ AD7D 3A 84 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 136+ AD80 CD 04 AF                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 137+ AD83 32 84 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 138+ AD86 C9                                   ret
 139+ AD87
 140+ AD87
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
1080  AD87                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ AD87              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ AD87              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ AD87              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ AD87              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ AD87              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ AD87              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ AD87              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ AD87 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ AD8A CD A0 AD     	call	Num1
  10+ AD8D 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ AD90 CD A0 AD     	call	Num1
  12+ AD93 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ AD96 CD A0 AD     	call	Num1
  14+ AD99 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ AD9B CD A0 AD     	call	Num1
  16+ AD9E 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ ADA0              Num1:
  18+ ADA0 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ ADA2              .Num2:
  20+ ADA2 3C           	inc	a
  21+ ADA3 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ ADA4 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ ADA6 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ ADA8 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ ADA9 13           	inc	de
  26+ ADAA C9           	ret
  27+ ADAB
  28+ ADAB              DispAtoDE:
  29+ ADAB 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ ADAD 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ ADAE C3 87 AD     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ ADB1
  33+ ADB1              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ ADB1 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ ADB3 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ ADB4 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ ADB7 CD C7 AD     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ ADBA 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ ADBC CD A0 AD     	call	Num1
  40+ ADBF 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ ADC1 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  42+ ADC2 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  43+ ADC3 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  44+ ADC5 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  45+ ADC7              .NumLeadBlank1:
  46+ ADC7 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  47+ ADC9              .NumLeadBlank2:
  48+ ADC9 3C           	inc	a
  49+ ADCA 09           	add	hl,bc
  50+ ADCB 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  51+ ADCD FE 30        	cp	'0'
  52+ ADCF 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  53+ ADD1              .Blank:
  54+ ADD1 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  55+ ADD3              .DontBlank:
  56+ ADD3 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  57+ ADD5 12           	ld	(de),a
  58+ ADD6 13           	inc	de
  59+ ADD7 C9           	ret
  60+ ADD8
  61+ ADD8              DispQtyAtoDE:
  62+ ADD8 FE 00        	cp	0
  63+ ADDA 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  64+ ADDC 26 00        	ld h,0
  65+ ADDE 6F           	ld l,a
  66+ ADDF 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  67+ ADE2 CD EE AD     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  68+ ADE5 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  69+ ADE7 CD EE AD     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  70+ ADEA 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  71+ ADEC 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  72+ ADEE              .NumLeadBlank1:
  73+ ADEE 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  74+ ADF0              .NumLeadBlank2:
  75+ ADF0 3C           	inc	a
  76+ ADF1 09           	add	hl,bc
  77+ ADF2 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  78+ ADF4 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  79+ ADF6 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  80+ ADF8              .Blank:
  81+ ADF8 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  82+ ADFA              .DontBlank:
  83+ ADFA ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  84+ ADFC 12           	ld	(de),a
  85+ ADFD 13           	inc	de
  86+ ADFE C9           	ret
  87+ ADFF              .NoStock:
  88+ ADFF 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  89+ AE01 12           	ld	(de),a
  90+ AE02 13           	inc	de
  91+ AE03 12           	ld	(de),a
  92+ AE04 13           	inc	de
  93+ AE05 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  94+ AE07 12           	ld	(de),a
  95+ AE08 13           	inc de
  96+ AE09 C9           	ret
  97+ AE0A
  98+ AE0A
  99+ AE0A              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 100+ AE0A              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 101+ AE0A              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 102+ AE0A              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 103+ AE0A 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 103+ AE0E 0A 00 00 00
 103+ AE12 64 00 00 00
 103+ AE16 E8 03 00 00
 103+ AE1A 10 27 00 00
 104+ AE1E A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 104+ AE22 40 42 0F 00
 104+ AE26 80 96 98 00
 104+ AE2A 00 E1 F5 05
 104+ AE2E 00 CA 9A 3B
 105+ AE32 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 106+ AE36
 107+ AE36              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 108+ AE36 CD 45 AE     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 109+ AE39 FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 110+ AE3C FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 111+ AE3F 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 112+ AE41 FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 113+ AE44 C9                                   ret
 114+ AE45
 115+ AE45 DD 22 32 AE  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 116+ AE49 ED 53 34 AE                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 117+ AE4D DD 21 2E AE                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 118+ AE51 06 09                                ld b,9
 119+ AE53 0E 00                                ld c,0
 120+ AE55 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 121+ AE57 B7                                   or a
 122+ AE58 DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 123+ AE5B DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 124+ AE5E 2A 32 AE                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 125+ AE61 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 126+ AE63 22 32 AE                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 127+ AE66 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 128+ AE69 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 129+ AE6C 2A 34 AE                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 130+ AE6F ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 131+ AE71 22 34 AE                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 132+ AE74 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 133+ AE76 0C                                   inc c
 134+ AE77 3C                                   inc a
 135+ AE78 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 136+ AE7A DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 137+ AE7D DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 138+ AE80 2A 32 AE                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 139+ AE83 19                                   add hl,de
 140+ AE84 22 32 AE                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 141+ AE87 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 142+ AE8A DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 143+ AE8D 2A 34 AE                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 144+ AE90 ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 145+ AE92 22 34 AE                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 146+ AE95 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 147+ AE98 DD 19                                add ix,de
 148+ AE9A 0C                                   inc c
 149+ AE9B 0D                                   dec c
 150+ AE9C 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 151+ AE9E FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 152+ AEA1 FD 23                                inc iy
 153+ AEA3 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 154+ AEA5 3A 32 AE                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 155+ AEA8 C6 30                                add A,'0'
 156+ AEAA FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 157+ AEAD FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 158+ AEB1 C9                                   ret
 159+ AEB2
# file closed: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
1081  AEB2                  include "./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm
   1+ AEB2              ;; calcs HLB + DEC where B and C are signs
   2+ AEB2              ;; result HL with A as sign
   3+ AEB2              ;; special handling if result is zero forcign sign bit to be zero
   4+ AEB2 78           ADDHLDESignBC:          ld      a,b
   5+ AEB3 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   6+ AEB5 A9                                   xor     c                           ;if b sign and c sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
   7+ AEB6                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN     ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
   7+ AEB6 FA C4 AE    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN
   8+ AEB9 78           ADDHLDEsBCSameSigns:    ld      a,b
   9+ AEBA B1                                   or      c
  10+ AEBB                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg        ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  10+ AEBB FA C0 AE    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg
  11+ AEBE 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; both positive so a will already be zero
  12+ AEBF C9                                   ret
  13+ AEC0 19           ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg:      add     hl,de
  14+ AEC1 78                                   ld      a,b
  15+ AEC2 B1                                   or      c                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  16+ AEC3 C9                                   ret
  17+ AEC4 B7           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN:       or      a
  18+ AEC5 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  19+ AEC7 38 02                                jr      c,ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert
  20+ AEC9 78           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGNNoCarry: ld      a,b                                               ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  21+ AECA C9                                   ret
  22+ AECB              ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert:    NegHL                         ; if result was zero then set sign to zero (which doing h or l will give us for free)
  22+ AECB AF          >                    xor a
  22+ AECC 95          >                    sub l
  22+ AECD 6F          >                    ld l,a
  22+ AECE 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  22+ AECF 94          >                    sub h
  22+ AED0 67          >                    ld h,a
  23+ AED1 78                                   ld      a,b
  24+ AED2 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  25+ AED4 C9                                   ret
  26+ AED5
# file closed: ./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm
1082  AED5              ;INCLUDE "badd_ll38.asm"
1083  AED5              ;;INCLUDE "XX12equXX15byXX16.asm"
1084  AED5                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ AED5              AequAdivQmul96ABS:      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   1+ AED5 BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ AED6 D2 F1 AE    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
   2+ AED9 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
   3+ AEDB CB 27        .TIS2RollTLoop:			sla			a
   4+ AEDD                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
   4+ AEDD BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ AEDE DA F4 AE    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
   5+ AEE1 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
   6+ AEE2 37                                   scf
   7+ AEE3 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
   8+ AEE5 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
   9+ AEE7 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; T
  10+ AEE8 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 2
  11+ AEEA CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
  12+ AEEC 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  13+ AEED CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  14+ AEEF 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ AEF0 C9                                   ret
  16+ AEF1 3E 60        .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,$60							; unity
  17+ AEF3 C9                                   ret
  18+ AEF4 B7           .TIS2SkipSub:           or			a
  19+ AEF5 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  20+ AEF7 38 E2                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  21+ AEF9 C3 E7 AE                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  22+ AEFC
  23+ AEFC
  24+ AEFC              ; USES 			A DE BC
  25+ AEFC              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
  26+ AEFC              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
  27+ AEFC CB 7F        	bit			7,a
  28+ AEFE 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
  29+ AF00 ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
  30+ AF02 CB FF        	set			7,a
  31+ AF04              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  32+ AF04              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  33+ AF04              TIS2:
  34+ AF04 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  35+ AF05 3A 72 98     	ld			a,(varQ)
  36+ AF08 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  37+ AF09 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  38+ AF0A              AequAdivDmul96:
  39+ AF0A 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  40+ AF0B E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  41+ AF0D              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  41+ AF0D BA          >                        cp     d
  41+ AF0E D2 2E AF    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  42+ AF11 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  43+ AF13              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  44+ AF13 CB 27        	sla			a
  45+ AF15              	JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub            ; a < d so don;t subtract
  45+ AF15 BA          >                        cp      d
  45+ AF16 DA 34 AF    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
  46+ AF19 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  47+ AF1A 37           	scf
  48+ AF1B CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  49+ AF1D 38 F4        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  50+ AF1F              .TIS2SKIPCont:
  51+ AF1F 78           	ld			a,b							; T
  52+ AF20 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 2
  53+ AF22 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 4
  54+ AF24 47           	ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  55+ AF25 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 8
  56+ AF27 80           	add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  57+ AF28 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  58+ AF29 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  59+ AF2A E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  60+ AF2C B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  61+ AF2D C9           	ret
  62+ AF2E              .TIS2AccGTEQ:
  63+ AF2E              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  64+ AF2E 79           	ld			a,c
  65+ AF2F E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  66+ AF31 F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  67+ AF33 C9           	ret
  68+ AF34              .TIS2SkipSub:
  69+ AF34 B7           	or			a
  70+ AF35 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  71+ AF37 38 DA        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  72+ AF39 C3 1F AF     	jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  73+ AF3C
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
1085  AF3C                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ AF3C              fmltu:
   2+ AF3C              AequAmulQdiv256:
   3+ AF3C              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   4+ AF3C 57           	ld	d,a
   5+ AF3D 3A 72 98     	ld	a,(varQ)
   6+ AF40 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ AF41 ED 30        	mul
   8+ AF43 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   9+ AF44 C9           	ret
  10+ AF45
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
1086  AF45                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ AF45              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ AF45              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ AF45 21 4E 9B     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ AF48 FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ AF4A ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ AF4C 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ AF4D C3 59 AF     		jp		DV41
   8+ AF50              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ AF50 21 4E 9B     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ AF53 3A 5A 97     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ AF56 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ AF58 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ AF59              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ AF59 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ AF5A 3A 6E 98     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ AF5D              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ AF5D 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ AF5F CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ AF61 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ AF62 AF           		xor		a
  21+ AF63              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ AF63 CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ AF65 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ AF67 BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ AF68 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ AF6A              DV8:
  27+ AF6A 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ AF6B 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ AF6C              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ AF6C CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ AF6E 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ AF70              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ AF70              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ AF70 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ AF72 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ AF73              .RollRemainder:
  37+ AF73 CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ AF75 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ AF77 B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ AF78 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ AF7A              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ AF7A 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ AF7B              .DontSBC:
  44+ AF7B CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ AF7D 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ AF7F 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ AF80 32 73 98     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ AF83 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ AF84 32 6C 97     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ AF87 C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ AF88              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ AF88 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ AF89 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ AF8A CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ AF8C 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ AF8E 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ AF8F 32 73 98     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ AF92 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ AF93 32 6C 97     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ AF96 C9           		ret
  61+ AF97              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ AF97 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ AF99 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ AF9A 32 73 98     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ AF9D 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ AF9E 32 6C 97     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ AFA1 C9           		ret
  68+ AFA2
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
1087  AFA2                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
   1+ AFA2
   2+ AFA2              asm_defmutl:
   3+ AFA2              AequDmulEdiv256usgn:
   4+ AFA2              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=D*E/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   5+ AFA2 ED 30        	mul
   6+ AFA4 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   7+ AFA5 C9           	ret
   8+ AFA6
   9+ AFA6
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
1088  AFA6              ;INCLUDE "AP2equAPmulQunsgEorP-MLTU2.asm"
1089  AFA6              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulQUnsg-MULTU.asm"
1090  AFA6              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulX-MU11.asm"
1091  AFA6                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ AFA6              APequQmulA:
   2+ AFA6              asm_mult1:
   3+ AFA6              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ AFA6 FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ AFA8 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ AFAA 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ AFAB 3A 72 98     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ AFAE 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ AFAF FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ AFB1 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ AFB3 AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ AFB4 E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ AFB6 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ AFB7 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ AFB8 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ AFBA 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ AFBB 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ AFBC E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ AFBE 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ AFBF ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ AFC1 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ AFC2 32 6C 97     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ AFC5 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ AFC6 B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ AFC7 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ AFC8 C9           	ret
  27+ AFC9              .mul0:
  28+ AFC9 AF           	xor	a
  29+ AFCA 32 6C 97     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ AFCD 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ AFCE 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ AFCF C9           	ret
  33+ AFD0
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
1092  AFD0                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ AFD0              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ AFD0              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ AFD0              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ AFD0              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ AFD0              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ AFD0              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ AFD0              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ AFD0              LL38:
   9+ AFD0              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ AFD0              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ AFD0              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ AFD0              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ AFD0              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ AFD0              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ AFD0              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ AFD0              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ AFD0              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ AFD0              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ AFD0              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ AFD0              ;	ret
  21+ AFD0              ; calculation table
  22+ AFD0              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ AFD0              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ AFD0              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ AFD0              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ AFD0              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ AFD0              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ AFD0              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ AFD0              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ AFD0              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ AFD0
  32+ AFD0              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ AFD0              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ AFD0              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ AFD0              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ AFD0
  37+ AFD0
  38+ AFD0              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ AFD0 21 74 98     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ AFD3 AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ AFD4 FA DF AF     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ AFD7 3A 72 98     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ AFDA 21 73 98     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ AFDD 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ AFDE C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ AFDF              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ AFDF 3A 73 98     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ AFE2 21 72 98     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ AFE5              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ AFE5              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ AFE5 B7          >                        or a
  51+ AFE6 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ AFE7 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ AFE9              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ AFE9              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ AFE9              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ AFE9 C9           	ret
  57+ AFEA              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ AFEA FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ AFEC 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ AFEE ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ AFF0 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ AFF1 3A 74 98     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ AFF4 EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ AFF6 32 74 98     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ AFF9 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ AFFA                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ AFFA B7          >                        or a
  67+ AFFB C9           	ret
  68+ AFFC              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ AFFC 32 74 98         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ AFFF                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ AFFF B7          >                        or a
  71+ B000 C9               ret
  72+ B001              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ B001              ;--	push	bc
  74+ B001              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ B001              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ B001              ;--	sub		b
  77+ B001              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ B001              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ B001              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ B001              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ B001              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ B001              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ B001              ;--	ret
  84+ B001
  85+ B001              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ B001              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ B001              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ B001              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ B001              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ B001              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ B001              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ B001              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ B001              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ B001              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ B001              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ B001              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ B001              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ B001              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ B001              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ B001              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ B001              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ B001              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ B001              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ B001              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ B001              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ B001              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ B001              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ B001              ;;;;	ret
 109+ B001              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ B001              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ B001              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ B001              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ B001              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ B001              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ B001              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ B001              ;;;;	ret
 117+ B001              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ B001              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ B001              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ B001              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ B001              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ B001              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ B001              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ B001              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ B001              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ B001              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ B001              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ B001              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ B001              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ B001              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ B001              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ B001              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ B001              ;;;;	ret
 134+ B001              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ B001              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ B001              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ B001              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ B001              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ B001              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ B001              ;;;;	ret
 141+ B001

1093  B001                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm
   1+ B001              ; Note comparing hl vs iY, you need at least 3 incs or decs for hl to be slower
   2+ B001              ; it may be faster though if we can use hl to avoid memory actions if needed
   3+ B001              ; need to optimise mad as push hl pop hl and use de doesn't really improve speed
   4+ B001
   5+ B001
   6+ B001              moveship4Yreg:
   7+ B001 3A 5A 97     		ld		a,(regY)
   8+ B004 47           		ld		b,a
   9+ B005              moveship4breg:
  10+ B005              		; b = Y index, 9 = nosev, 15 = roofv 21 = sidev
  11+ B005              MVS4PitchAlphaRollBeta:
  12+ B005              MVS4:										;.MVS4	\ -> &52A1 \ Moveship4, Y is matrix row, pitch&roll update to coordinates
  13+ B005 3A 88 97     		ld		a,(ALPHA)					;  ALPHA
  14+ B008 32 72 98     		ld		(varQ),a					; player ship's roll Q = Alpha
  15+ B00B 21 0E C0     		ld		hl,UBnKxsgn
  16+ B00E 78           		ld		a,b							; from
  17+ B00F ED 31        		add		hl,a
  18+ B011 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+2,Y
  19+ B012 32 73 98     		ld		(varR),a					; R  \ lo
  20+ B015 23           		inc		hl
  21+ B016 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+3,Y
  22+ B017 32 74 98     		ld		(varS),a					; S  \ hi		SR = nosev_y (or axis y)
  23+ B01A 2B           		dec		hl
  24+ B01B 2B           		dec		hl
  25+ B01C 2B           		dec		hl							;
  26+ B01D 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+0,Y
  27+ B01E 32 6C 97     		ld		(varP),a					; P  \ over-written	 P = nosevx lo
  28+ B021 23           		inc		hl
  29+ B022 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+1,Y
  30+ B023 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip sign  AP = nosevx * - 1
  31+ B025 CD 7C A8     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; MAD	\ DE = X.A = alpha*INWK+1,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  32+ B028 23                   inc     hl
  33+ B029 23                   inc     hl
  34+ B02A 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  35+ B02B 2B                   dec     hl
  36+ B02C 3A 59 97             ld      a,(regX)
  37+ B02F 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-aX   \ their comment
  38+ B030 32 6C 97             ld      (varP),a                    ;  P
  39+ B033 2B                   dec     hl
  40+ B034 2B                   dec     hl
  41+ B035 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+0,Y
  42+ B036 32 73 98             ld      (varR),a                    ;  R	\ lo
  43+ B039 23                   inc     hl
  44+ B03A 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;  INWK+1,Y
  45+ B03B 32 74 98             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  46+ B03E 23                   inc     hl
  47+ B03F 23                   inc     hl
  48+ B040 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  49+ B041 CD 7C A8             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A = alpha*INWK+3,Y + INWK+0to1,Y
  50+ B044 2B                   dec     hl
  51+ B045 2B                   dec     hl
  52+ B046 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+1,Y  \ hi
  53+ B047 3A 59 97             ld      a,(regX)
  54+ B04A 2B                   dec     hl
  55+ B04B 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+0,Y  \ X=X+aY   \ their comment
  56+ B04C 32 6C 97             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  57+ B04F 3A 77 97             ld      a,(BETA)                    ; BETA
  58+ B052 32 72 98             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q	\ player ship's pitch
  59+ B055 23                   inc     hl
  60+ B056 23                   inc     hl
  61+ B057 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+2,Y
  62+ B058 32 73 98             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  63+ B05B 23                   inc     hl
  64+ B05C 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  65+ B05D 32 74 98             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  66+ B060 23                   inc     hl
  67+ B061 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  68+ B062 32 6C 97             ld      (varP),a                    ; P	\ lo
  69+ B065 23                   inc     hl
  70+ B066 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y
  71+ B067 EE 80                xor     $80                         ; flip sign hi
  72+ B069 CD 7C A8             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A =-beta*INWK+5,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  73+ B06C 2B                   dec     hl
  74+ B06D 2B                   dec     hl
  75+ B06E 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  76+ B06F 3A 59 97             ld      a,(regX)
  77+ B072 2B                   dec     hl
  78+ B073 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-bZ  \ their comment
  79+ B074 32 6C 97             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  80+ B077 23                   inc     hl
  81+ B078 23                   inc     hl
  82+ B079 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  83+ B07A 32 73 98             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  84+ B07D 23                   inc     hl
  85+ B07E 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y
  86+ B07F 32 74 98             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  87+ B082 2B                   dec     hl
  88+ B083 2B                   dec     hl
  89+ B084 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  90+ B085 CD 7C A8             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A = beta*INWK+3,Y + INWK+4,5,Y
  91+ B088 23                   inc     hl
  92+ B089 23                   inc     hl

  95+ B08E 2B                   dec     hl

1094  B091              ;INCLUDE "MoveShip5-MVS5.asm"
1095  B091              ;INCLUDE "PAequAmulQusgn-MLU2.asm"
1096  B091              ;INCLUDE "PAequDustYIdxYmulQ-MLU1.asm"
1097  B091              ;INCLUDE "PlanetP12addInwkX-MVT6.asm"
1098  B091                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ B091              ;;;LL28:
   2+ B091              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ B091              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ B091              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ B091              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ B091              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ B091              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ B091              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ B091              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ B091              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ B091              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ B091              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ B091              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ B091              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ B091              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ B091              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ B091              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ B091              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ B091              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ B091              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ B091              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ B091              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ B091              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ B091              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ B091              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ B091              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ B091              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ B091              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ B091              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ B091              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ B091              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ B091              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ B091              ;;;	ret
  34+ B091              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ B091              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ B091              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ B091              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ B091              ;;;	ret
  39+ B091
  40+ B091              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ B091 59             ld    e,c
  42+ B092 67             ld    h,a
  43+ B093 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ B095              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ B095 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ B096 B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ B097 C8             ret z
  48+ B098 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ B09B 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ B09D              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ B09D ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ B09F 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ B0A0 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ B0A2 C9             ret
  55+ B0A3
  56+ B0A3              HL_Div_C:
  57+ B0A3              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ B0A3              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ B0A3              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ B0A3 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ B0A5 AF                   xor a
  62+ B0A6              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ B0A6 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ B0A7 17                   rla
  65+ B0A8 B9                   cp c
  66+ B0A9 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ B0AB 91                   sub c
  68+ B0AC 2C                   inc l
  69+ B0AD              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ B0AD 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ B0AF 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ B0B0 32 73 98             ld  (varR),a
  73+ B0B3 C9                   ret
  74+ B0B4
  75+ B0B4
  76+ B0B4
  77+ B0B4              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ B0B4              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ B0B4              BFRDIV:
  80+ B0B4 F5           		push	af
  81+ B0B5 3A 72 98     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ B0B8 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ B0B9 F1           		pop		af
  84+ B0BA FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ B0BC CA D3 B0     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ B0BF              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ B0BF 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ B0C1 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ B0C2              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ B0C2 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ B0C4 AF           		xor a
  92+ B0C5              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ B0C5 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ B0C6 17           		rla
  95+ B0C7 B9           		cp c
  96+ B0C8 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ B0CA 2C           		inc l
  98+ B0CB 91           		sub c
  99+ B0CC              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ B0CC 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ B0CE 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ B0CF 32 73 98     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ B0D2 C9           		ret
 104+ B0D3              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ B0D3 32 73 98     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ B0D6 C9           		ret
 107+ B0D7              ;	push	af
 108+ B0D7              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ B0D7              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ B0D7              ;	pop		af
 111+ B0D7              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ B0D7              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ B0D7              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ B0D7              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ B0D7              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ B0D7              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ B0D7              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ B0D7              ;	sla		a
 119+ B0D7              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ B0D7              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ B0D7              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ B0D7              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ B0D7              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ B0D7              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ B0D7              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ B0D7              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ B0D7              ;	scf
 128+ B0D7              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ B0D7              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ B0D7              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ B0D7              ;LL2:
 132+ B0D7              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ B0D7              ;LL2Good:
 134+ B0D7              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ B0D7              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ B0D7              ;	ret
 137+ B0D7
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
1099  B0D7                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ B0D7              RequAdivQ:
   2+ B0D7              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ B0D7              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ B0D7 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ B0D8 3A 72 98     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ B0DB FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ B0DD 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ B0DF 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ B0E0 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ B0E2 AF               xor a
  11+ B0E3              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ B0E3 CB 21            sla c
  13+ B0E5 17               rla
  14+ B0E6 BA               cp d
  15+ B0E7 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ B0E9 0C               inc c
  17+ B0EA 92               sub d
  18+ B0EB              LL64:
  19+ B0EB 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ B0ED 32 71 98     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ B0F0 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ B0F1 32 73 98     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ B0F4 C9               ret
  24+ B0F5              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ B0F5 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ B0F7 32 73 98     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ B0FA 32 71 98     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ B0FD C9           	ret
  29+ B0FE
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm

   2+ B0FE              RSequQmulA:

   4+ B0FE CD A6 AF     	call APequQmulA
   5+ B101 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ B102 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ B103 32 74 98     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ B106 7B           	ld	a,e

  11+ B10B C9           	ret

   1++B10C              CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15:
