  32+ B17E
  33+ B17E              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
  34+ B17E              		; b = regX on entry
  35+ B17E              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
  36+ B17E 08           		ex		af,af'
  37+ B17F 78           		ld		a,b
  38+ B180 32 72 98     		ld		(varQ),a
  39+ B183 08           		ex		af,af'
  40+ B184 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  41+ B186 CD 7C A8     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  42+ B189              ; USES 				A BC E
  43+ B189              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  44+ B189              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  45+ B189 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
  46+ B18A E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
  47+ B18C 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
  48+ B18D 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
  49+ B18E E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
  50+ B190 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
  51+ B192              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  52+ B192 CB 27        		sla		a
  53+ B194              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
  53+ B194 FE 60       >                        cp      $60
  53+ B196 DA A3 B1    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
  54+ B199 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
  55+ B19B 37           		scf
  56+ B19C CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
  57+ B19E 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
  58+ B1A0              TIS1KIPCont:
  59+ B1A0 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
  60+ B1A1 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  61+ B1A2 C9           		ret
  62+ B1A3              TIS1SkipSub:
  63+ B1A3 B7           	or			a
  64+ B1A4 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  65+ B1A6 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  66+ B1A8 C3 A0 B1     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
  67+ B1AB
  68+ B1AB              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
  69+ B1AB              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz
  70+ B1AB
  71+ B1AB
  72+ B1AB
  73+ B1AB
  74+ B1AB              TidyRotYSmall:
  75+ B1AB CD D6 B2     		call	CalcRoofvZ
  76+ B1AE 32 20 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a			; set roofvy hi?? Says roofz TODO
  77+ B1B1 C3 E7 B1     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  78+ B1B4
  79+ B1B4              TidyRotXSmall:
  80+ B1B4 AF           		xor		a
  81+ B1B5 47           		ld		b,a
  82+ B1B6 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev_y
  83+ B1B9 E6 60        		and		%01100000
  84+ B1BB CA AB B1     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall
  85+ B1BE 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
  86+ B1C1 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
  87+ B1C2 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
  88+ B1C5 CD 9C B2     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z
  89+ B1C8 32 1E C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a			; set roofvy hi
  90+ B1CB C3 E7 B1     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  91+ B1CE              ; TIDY is broken
  92+ B1CE              TIDY:
  93+ B1CE DD 01                break
  94+ B1D0              ORTHOGALISE:
  95+ B1D0              ;-- NormaliseNosev
  96+ B1D0 CD 0C B1     		call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15
  97+ B1D3 CD B3 AC     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
  98+ B1D6 CD 45 B1     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV
  99+ B1D9              .CheckNXSmall:
 100+ B1D9 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 101+ B1DC E6 60        		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 102+ B1DE CA B4 B1     		jp		z,TidyRotXSmall
 103+ B1E1              .RotXIsBig:
 104+ B1E1 CD 62 B2             call	CalcRoofvX
 105+ B1E4 32 1C C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a    	; set roofvx hi
 106+ B1E7              NormaliseRoofV:
 107+ B1E7 CD 1F B1     		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 108+ B1EA CD B3 AC     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 109+ B1ED              ;calc sidev x
 110+ B1ED CD 58 B1     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 111+ B1F0 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 112+ B1F3 32 72 98     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 113+ B1F6 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 114+ B1F9 CD FE B0     		call	RSequQmulA
 115+ B1FC 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 116+ B1FF 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 117+ B200 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 118+ B203 CD 7E B1     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 119+ B206                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideXNoNeg
 119+ B206 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 119+ B207 CA 0C B2    >                        jp	z, NormSideXNoNeg
 120+ B20A EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 121+ B20C              NormSideXNoNeg:
 122+ B20C 32 16 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 123+ B20F              ;calc sidev y
 124+ B20F 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 125+ B212 32 72 98     		ld		(varQ),a
 126+ B215 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 127+ B218 CD FE B0     		call	RSequQmulA
 128+ B21B 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x
 129+ B21E 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 130+ B21F 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z
 131+ B222 CD 7E B1     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 132+ B225                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideYNoNeg
 132+ B225 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 132+ B226 CA 2B B2    >                        jp	z, NormSideYNoNeg
 133+ B229 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 134+ B22B              NormSideYNoNeg:
 135+ B22B 32 24 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 136+ B22E              ;calc sidev z
 137+ B22E 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			; nosev x
 138+ B231 32 72 98     		ld		(varQ),a
 139+ B234 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 140+ B237 CD FE B0     		call	RSequQmulA
 141+ B23A 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y
 142+ B23D 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 143+ B23E 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 144+ B241 CD 7E B1     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 145+ B244                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideZNoNeg
 145+ B244 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 145+ B245 CA 4A B2    >                        jp	z, NormSideZNoNeg
 146+ B248 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 147+ B24A              NormSideZNoNeg:
 148+ B24A 32 18 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 149+ B24D              .ClearLoBytes:
 150+ B24D 21 21 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 151+ B250 06 09        		ld		b,9
 152+ B252 AF                   xor     a
 153+ B253              .ClearLoLoop:
 154+ B253 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 155+ B254 23           		inc		hl
 156+ B255 23           		inc		hl
 157+ B256 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 158+ B258 CD 32 B1     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 159+ B25B CD B3 AC     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 160+ B25E              ;calc sidev x
 161+ B25E CD 6B B1     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 162+ B261
 163+ B261 C9           		ret
 164+ B262
 165+ B262
 166+ B262
 167+ B262              ;;;;;;;;.CheckNYSmall:
 168+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+2)					; first check z zero, if so we have to do Y
 169+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		and		$7F
 170+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		cp		0
 171+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ
 172+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+1)					; now we can do a realistic check of RY
 173+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		cp 		0							; we can't end up with divide by 0 for RY
 174+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ					; We can't have all values of vector 0 so we must do RZ
 175+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 176+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RY					; and tidy based on roofy
 177+ B262              ;;;;;;;;.DoNZ:
 178+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		jp		Tidy1RZ						; else we tidy based on roofz
 179+ B262              ;;;;;;;;;---RE ENTRY POINT -------------------------------------
 180+ B262              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseRoofv:
 181+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 182+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 183+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 184+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 185+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 186+ B262              ;;;;;;;;ProcessSidev:
 187+ B262              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV X
 188+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	nosev_z+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 189+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 190+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 191+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 192+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 193+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 194+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 195+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 196+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 197+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 198+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 199+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 200+ B262              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Y
 201+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 202+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 203+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 204+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 205+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 206+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 207+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 208+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 209+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 210+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 211+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 212+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_y+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 213+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 214+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 215+ B262              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Z
 216+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 217+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 218+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 219+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 220+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 221+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 222+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 223+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 224+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 225+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 226+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_z+1),a
 227+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 228+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,sidev_z
 229+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 230+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 231+ B262              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseSideV:
 232+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 233+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 234+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 235+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 236+ B262              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 237+ B262              ;;;;;;;;
 238+ B262
 239+ B262
 240+ B262              CalcRoofvX:
 241+ B262              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x = -(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
 242+ B262              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 242+ B262 3A 26 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 242+ B265 32 72 98    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 243+ B268 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 244+ B26B CD FE B0     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 245+ B26E              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 245+ B26E 3A 24 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 245+ B271 32 72 98    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 246+ B274 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 247+ B277 CD 7C A8     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 248+ B27A 7A           		ld		a,d
 249+ B27B E6 80        		and 	$80
 250+ B27D FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 251+ B27F              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 252+ B27F 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 253+ B282 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 254+ B283 E6 80        		and		$80
 255+ B285 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 256+ B287 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 257+ B289 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 258+ B28A E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 259+ B28C 42           		ld		b,d
 260+ B28D 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 261+ B28E 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 262+ B28F 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 263+ B291 CD 25 AB     		call	BC_Div_DE
 264+ B294 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 265+ B296 EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 266+ B298 E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 267+ B29A B0           		or		b
 268+ B29B C9           		ret
 269+ B29C
 270+ B29C
 271+ B29C              CalcRoofvY:
 272+ B29C              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y
 273+ B29C              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 273+ B29C 3A 26 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 273+ B29F 32 72 98    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 274+ B2A2 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 275+ B2A5 CD FE B0     		call	RSequQmulA
 276+ B2A8              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 276+ B2A8 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 276+ B2AB 32 72 98    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 277+ B2AE 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 278+ B2B1 CD 7C A8     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 279+ B2B4 7A           		ld		a,d
 280+ B2B5 E6 80        		and 	$80
 281+ B2B7 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 282+ B2B9 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 283+ B2BC 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 284+ B2BD E6 80        		and		$80
 285+ B2BF FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 286+ B2C1 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 287+ B2C3 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 288+ B2C4 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 289+ B2C6 42           		ld		b,d
 290+ B2C7 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 291+ B2C8 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 292+ B2C9 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 293+ B2CB CD 25 AB     		call	BC_Div_DE
 294+ B2CE FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 295+ B2D0 EE 80        		xor		$80
 296+ B2D2 E6 80        		and		$80
 297+ B2D4 B0           		or		b
 298+ B2D5 C9           		ret
 299+ B2D6
 300+ B2D6              CalcRoofvZ:
 301+ B2D6              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_y * roofv_y) / nosev_z
 302+ B2D6              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 302+ B2D6 3A 24 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 302+ B2D9 32 72 98    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 303+ B2DC 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 304+ B2DF CD FE B0     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 305+ B2E2              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 305+ B2E2 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 305+ B2E5 32 72 98    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 306+ B2E8 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 307+ B2EB CD 7C A8     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 308+ B2EE 7A           		ld		a,d
 309+ B2EF E6 80        		and 	$80
 310+ B2F1 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 311+ B2F3 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 312+ B2F6 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 313+ B2F7 E6 80        		and		$80
 314+ B2F9 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 315+ B2FB FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 316+ B2FD 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 317+ B2FE E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 318+ B300 42           		ld		b,d
 319+ B301 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 320+ B302 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 321+ B303 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 322+ B305 CD 25 AB     		call	BC_Div_DE
 323+ B308 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 324+ B30A EE 80        		xor		$80
 325+ B30C E6 80        		and		$80
 326+ B30E B0           		or		b
 327+ B30F C9           		ret
 328+ B310
 329+ B310
 330+ B310
 331+ B310              ;;ProcessSidev:
 332+ B310              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 333+ B310              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 334+ B310              ;;		push	bc
 335+ B310              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 336+ B310              ;;		pop		bc
 337+ B310              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 338+ B310              ;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 339+ B310              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 340+ B310              ;;		push	bc
 341+ B310              ;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 342+ B310              ;;		pop		bc
 343+ B310              ;;		xor		$80							; sidev_x = -a by flipping sign bit
 344+ B310              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 345+ B310              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 346+ B310              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 347+ B310              ;;		push	bc
 348+ B310              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 349+ B310              ;;		pop		bc
 350+ B310              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 351+ B310              ;;		ld		b,a
 352+ B310              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 353+ B310              ;;		push	bc
 354+ B310              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 355+ B310              ;;		pop		bc
 356+ B310              ;;		xor		$80							; a *= -1
 357+ B310              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 358+ B310              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 359+ B310              ;;		push	bc
 360+ B310              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 361+ B310              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 362+ B310              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 363+ B310              ;;		pop		bc
 364+ B310              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 365+ B310              ;;		ld		b,a
 366+ B310              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 367+ B310              ;;		push	bc
 368+ B310              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 369+ B310              ;;		pop		bc
 370+ B310              ;;		xor		$80
 371+ B310              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 372+ B310              ;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 373+ B310              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ
 374+ B310              ;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 375+ B310              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 376+ B310
 377+ B310
 378+ B310
 379+ B310
 380+ B310
 381+ B310
 382+ B310              ;;;;;;;;;-- Check to see if the top two magnitude bits are clear in nosev_x, if so jump to TI1
 383+ B310              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessRoofv:
 384+ B310              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 385+ B310              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 386+ B310              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 387+ B310              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 388+ B310              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 389+ B310              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessSidev:
 390+ B310              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 391+ B310              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 392+ B310              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof

 394+ B310              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version

1104  B310                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ B310
   2+ B310              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ B310 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ B311 D2 2F B3    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ B314 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ B316 CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ B318 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ B31A                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ B31A BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ B31B DA 20 B3    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
   7+ B31E 92                                   sub     d
   8+ B31F                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ B31F B7          >                        or a
   9+ B320 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ B321 CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ B323 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ B325 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ B326 C9                                   ret
  14+ B327 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ B328 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ B329 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ B32B 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ B32D 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ B32E C9                                   ret
  20+ B32F 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ B331 C9                                   ret
  22+ B332
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
1105  B332                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ B332              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ B332              TIS1:
   3+ B332 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ B333 3A 59 97     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ B336 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ B337 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ B338              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ B338 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ B339 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ B33A 32 72 98     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ B33D 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ B33E EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ B340 CD 7C A8     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ B343              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ B343              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ B343              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ B343 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ B344 E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ B346 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ B347 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ B348 E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ B34A 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ B34C 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ B34D              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ B34D CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ B34F FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ B351 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ B353 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ B355              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ B355 CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ B357 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ B359 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ B35A B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ B35B C9           		ret
  35+ B35C
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm

1113  B35C                  INCLUDE "./Tactics.asm"
# file opened: ./Tactics.asm
   1+ B35C              ;Ship Tactics
   2+ B35C              ; used  when no pre-checks are requrired, e.g. if forcing a space station from main loop
   3+ B35C
   4+ B35C
   5+ B35C              ; set angry if possible, if its an innocent then flag the space station to get angry

  48+ B3BF
  49+ B3BF              CheckPointRange:        MACRO   ShipPos, ShipSign, MissilePos, MissileSign
  50+ B3BF ~                                    ld      a,(MissilePos)                      ; check X Coord
  51+ B3BF ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipSign)
  52+ B3BF ~                                    xor     (hl)
  53+ B3BF ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  54+ B3BF ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipPos)
  55+ B3BF ~                                    ld      de,(MissilePos)
  56+ B3BF ~                                    jr      z,.SignsDiffernt
  57+ B3BF ~            .XSame:                 and     a
  58+ B3BF ~                                    sbc     hl,de                               ; distance = Ship X - Missile X
  59+ B3BF ~                                    JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
  60+ B3BF ~                                    NegHL
  61+ B3BF ~                                    jp      .CheckDiff
  62+ B3BF ~            .SignsDiffernt:         add     hl,de
  63+ B3BF ~                                    ReturnIfNegative                            ; if we overflowed then return
  64+ B3BF ~            .CheckDiff:             ld      a,h                                 ; if we have an h outside blast raidus
  65+ B3BF ~                                    ReturnIfANotZero
  66+ B3BF ~                                    ld      a,l
  67+ B3BF ~                                    and     a
  68+ B3BF ~                                    ReturnIfAGTEMemusng   CurrentMissileBlastRange
  69+ B3BF                                      ENDM
  70+ B3BF              ;...................................................................
  71+ B3BF              ; We only do one test per loop for spreading the load of work

 214+ B510              ;... Tactics........................................................................
 215+ B510              ;.PART 1
 216+ B510              ; if shiphitbymissleflag <> false
 217+ B510              ;    then dec blast check counter
 218+ B510              ;         if blast check counter = 0
 219+ B510              ;            then set shiphitbymissileflag to FF
 220+ B510              ;    else if SetShipHitByMissileFlag = current ship number

 222+ B510              ;         else if ship is in range and ship is not a station
 223+ B510              ;                  then cause blast damage to ship
 224+ B510              ;         if destroyed
 225+ B510              ;            then explode ship
 226+ B510              ;                 return
 227+ B510              ; end if
 228+ B510              ; if ship is a missle (I think we allow missile on missle action)
 229+ B510              ;    then if ecm is active
 230+ B510              ;            then destroy missile and return
 231+ B510              ;            else if ship is angry at us
 232+ B510              ;                    then if ship is close to us
 233+ B510              ;                            then explodes causing damage to our ship
 234+ B510              ;                                 enque missile blast
 235+ B510              ;                                 destroy missile
 236+ B510              ;                                 set blastcheckcounter to slotlist length
 237+ B510              ;                                 set shiphitbymissileflag to FE (general blast)
 238+ B510              ;                                 return
 239+ B510              ;                            else jump to part 3 to do updates
 240+ B510              ;                         end if
 241+ B510              ;                    else see how close it is to target
 242+ B510              ;                         if close to target
 243+ B510              ;                            then
 244+ B510              ;                                 enque missile blast
 245+ B510              ;                                 destroy missile
 246+ B510              ;                                 if ship is not station
 247+ B510              ;                                    then set up signal target ship hit my missile flag
 248+ B510              ;                                         set blastcheckcounter to slotlist length  (12)
 249+ B510              ;                                 end if
 250+ B510              ;                                 if we are in range of missle blast
 251+ B510              ;                                    cause blast damage to our ship (this will signal death is needed)
 252+ B510              ;                                 end if
 253+ B510              ;                                 return
 254+ B510              ;                         end if
 255+ B510              ;                 end if
 256+ B510              ;         end if
 257+ B510              ;.PART 2A ** adding in a collision logic
 258+ B510              ;    else if ship is close to another ship
 259+ B510              ;            then if docking flag set and other ship is space station or we are space station and other ship has docking flag
 260+ B510              ;                    then if aligned correctly
 261+ B510              ;                         then remove ship as docked
 262+ B510              ;                              return
 263+ B510              ;         else
 264+ B510              ;            call collision route and determine daamage based on sizes and bounce vectors
 265+ B510              ;            return
 266+ B510              ;.PART 2 ** Need to check if ship has AI flag
 267+ B510              ;    else if not hostile
 268+ B510              ;            then if not docking or station not present
 269+ B510              ;                    then calculate vector to planet
 270+ B510              ;                         jump to part 7
 271+ B510              ;                    else calculate verctor to docking slot
 272+ B510              ;                         call caluclate vector to docking slot (DOCKIT)
 273+ B510              ;                         jump to part 7
 274+ B510              ;                 end if
 275+ B510              ;            else case ship type
 276+ B510              ;                      >>escape pod>> point at planet and jump to step 7
 277+ B510              ;                      >>space station>> if hostile
 278+ B510              ;                                           then if cop counter < 7 and 6.2% chance
 279+ B510              ;                                                   then spawm hostile cop
 280+ B510              ;                                                end if
 281+ B510              ;                                           else
 282+ B510              ;                                                if 0.8% change and transporter count = 0
 283+ B510              ;                                                   then if 50% chance
 284+ B510              ;                                                           then spawn transporter
 285+ B510              ;                                                           else spawn shuttle
 286+ B510              ;                                                        end if
 287+ B510              ;                                                end if
 288+ B510              ;                                        end if
 289+ B510              ;                                        return
 290+ B510              ;                      >>targoid and no mother ship in slot list>> set random drift
 291+ B510              ;                                                                  return
 292+ B510              ;                      >>if bounty hunter flag>> if ship not hostile
 293+ B510              ;                                                   then if trader flag clear or 20% chance
 294+ B510              ;                                                        then if fugitive or offender
 295+ B510              ;                                                                then set hosile
 296+ B510              ;                                                end if
 297+ B510              ;                      >>Carrier and hanger slots > 0 >> if 22% chance (code to be added later)
 298+ B510              ;                                         then spawn agressive hosting one of types carried
 299+ B510              ;                                              reduce ships in hanger by 1
 300+ B510              ;                                              return
 301+ B510              ;                      >>rock hermit>> if 22% chance
 302+ B510              ;                                         then spawn agressive hosting one of Sidewinder, Mamba, Krait, Adder or Gecko
 303+ B510              ;                                              return
 304+ B510              ;                      >>pirate and in safe zone>> stop pirate being hostile by removing agressive and hostileflags
 305+ B510              ;                 end case
 306+ B510              ;         end if
 307+ B510              ;         recharge ship energy by recharge factor (TODO as a config item on ship type but by default 1)
 308+ B510              ; .PART 3
 309+ B510              ;         calulcate dot product of ship nose to us
 310+ B510              ; .PART 4
 311+ B510              ;         2.5% change ship rill roll a noticable amount
 312+ B510              ;         if ship has > 50% energy jump to part 6
 313+ B510              ;         if ship > 1/8th energy jump to part 5
 314+ B510              ;         if random 10% chance (i.e. ship < 1/8 energy and bails out)
 315+ B510              ;            then launch escape pod
 316+ B510              ;                 set AI to null
 317+ B510              ;                 set random pitch and roll
 318+ B510              ;                 set accelleation to 0
 319+ B510              ;         end if
 320+ B510              ; .PART 5
 321+ B510              ;         if ship does not have any missilesor ECM is firing to part 6
 322+ B510              ;            then if random > threshold for ship type (TODO as a config item on ship type)
 323+ B510              ;                    then if tharoid ; note this means thargoids are sensitve to ECM
 324+ B510              ;                            then launch thargon
 325+ B510              ;                            else spawn angry missle under ship
 326+ B510              ;                         end if
 327+ B510              ;                 end if
 328+ B510              ;            else return
 329+ B510              ;         end if
 330+ B510              ; .PART 6
 331+ B510              ;         if ship is not pointing at us from dot product ( < 160 , also > -32)
 332+ B510              ;            then jump to part 7
 333+ B510              ;            else if ship is pointing directly at us ( < 163 i.e. > -35)
 334+ B510              ;                    then fire laser at us (which reduces energy)
 335+ B510              ;                         cause laser damage to our ship (this will signal death is needed)
 336+ B510              ;                         decellerate by half as ship has lock on
 337+ B510              ;                         return
 338+ B510              ;                    else fire laser into space (which reduces energy)
 339+ B510              ;                 end if
 340+ B510              ;         end if
 341+ B510              ; .PART 7#
 342+ B510              ;        if ship is a msile targetting us
 343+ B510              ;           then ship turns towards us some more
 344+ B510              ;           else if z hi > =  3 or ( x hi or y hi > 1) , i.e. ship is far away
 345+ B510              ;                    then do random wiht bit 7 set
 346+ B510              ;                         if random < AI flag
 347+ B510              ;                            then   ship turned towards us
 348+ B510              ;                            else   ship turns away from us
 349+ B510              ;                         end if
 350+ B510              ;                end if
 351+ B510              ;           end if
 352+ B510              ;           calculate new roll, pitch and accelleration based on new targe vector
 353+ B510
 354+ B510
 355+ B510              ;        determine ship direction based on agression and type
 356+ B510              ;        set pitch and roll coutners
 357+ B510              ;        adjust speed depleding on relationship to us
 358+ B510              ; .PART 8 - new
 359+ B510              ;        if ship has ECM, another ECM is not active and missile targeted at it
 360+ B510              ;           if ship has enery of ECM energey cost + 1/8th total
 361+ B510              ;              if chance 25%
 362+ B510              ;                 then fire ECM
 363+ B510              ;

   1+ B510              M_GETSETDRV             equ $89
   2+ B510              F_OPEN                  equ $9a
   3+ B510              F_CLOSE                 equ $9b
   4+ B510              F_READ                  equ $9d
   5+ B510              F_WRITE                 equ $9e
   6+ B510              F_SEEK                  equ $9f
   7+ B510
   8+ B510              FA_READ                 equ $01
   9+ B510              FA_APPEND               equ $06
  10+ B510              FA_OVERWRITE            equ $0C
  11+ B510
  12+ B510 F5 C5 D5 E5  GetDefaultDrive:        push	af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  12+ B514 DD E5
  13+ B516 AF                                   xor	    a	; set drive. 0 is default
  14+ B517 CF                                   rst	    $08
  15+ B518 89                                   db	    $89
  16+ B519 32 23 B5                             ld	    (DefaultDrive),a
  17+ B51C DD E1 E1 D1                          pop		af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  17+ B520 C1 F1
  18+ B522 C9                                   ret
  19+ B523 00           DefaultDrive:	        db	0
  20+ B524
  21+ B524              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  22+ B524              ;	Function:	Open a file read for reading/writing
  23+ B524              ;	In:		ix = filename
  24+ B524              ;			b  = Open filemode
  25+ B524              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
  26+ B524              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  27+ B524 E5 DD E5     fOpen:	                push	hl,,ix
  28+ B527 DD E5                                push	ix
  29+ B529 3A 23 B5                             ld	    a,(DefaultDrive)
  30+ B52C CF                                   rst	    $08
  31+ B52D 9A                                   db	    F_OPEN
  32+ B52E DD E1 E1                             pop	    hl,,ix
  33+ B531 C9                                   ret
  34+ B532
  35+ B532              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  36+ B532              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  37+ B532              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
  38+ B532              ;			bc  = amount to read
  39+ B532              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  40+ B532              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  41+ B532 B7           fRead:                  or   	a             ; is it zero?
  42+ B533 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  43+ B534 E5 DD E5                             push	hl,,ix   	 ; load ix into hl and save hl for later
  44+ B537 E1                                   pop		hl
  45+ B538 CF                                   rst	    $08
  46+ B539 9D                                   db	    F_READ
  47+ B53A E1                                   pop	    hl
  48+ B53B C9                                   ret
  49+ B53C
  50+ B53C              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  51+ B53C              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  52+ B53C              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
  53+ B53C              ;			bc  = amount to read
  54+ B53C              ;	ret:		carry set = error
  55+ B53C              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  56+ B53C B7           fWrite:                 or   	a             ; is it zero?
  57+ B53D C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  58+ B53E E5 DD E5                             push	hl,,ix
  59+ B541 E1                                   pop	    hl
  60+ B542 CF                                   rst	    $08
  61+ B543 9E                                   db	    F_WRITE
  62+ B544 E1                                   pop	    hl
  63+ B545 C9                                   ret
  64+ B546
  65+ B546              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  66+ B546              ;	Function:	Close open file
  67+ B546              ;	In:		a  = handle
  68+ B546              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
  69+ B546              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  70+ B546 B7           fClose:		            or   	a             ; is it zero?
  71+ B547 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
  72+ B548 CF                                   rst	    $08
  73+ B549 9B                                   db	    F_CLOSE
  74+ B54A C9                                   ret
  75+ B54B
  76+ B54B              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  77+ B54B              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
  78+ B54B              ;	In:		a   = file handle
  79+ B54B              ;			L   = Seek mode (0=start, 1=rel, 2=-rel)
  80+ B54B              ;			BCDE = bytes to seek
  81+ B54B              ;	ret:		BCDE = file pos from start
  82+ B54B              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  83+ B54B DD E5 E5     fSeek:                  push	ix,,hl
  84+ B54E CF                                   rst	    $08
  85+ B54F 9F                                   db	    F_SEEK
  86+ B550 E1 DD E1                             pop	    ix,,hl
  87+ B553 C9                                   ret
  88+ B554
  89+ B554              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  90+ B554              ; Init the file system
  91+ B554              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  92+ B554 CD 10 B5     InitFileSystem:         call    GetDefaultDrive
  93+ B557 C9                                   ret
  94+ B558
  95+ B558              ; *******************************************************************************************************
  96+ B558              ; Function:	Load a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
  97+ B558              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
  98+ B558              ;		ix = address to load to
  99+ B558              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 100+ B558 CD 10 B5     FileLoad:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 101+ B55B C5 D5 F5                             push	bc,,de,,af
 102+ B55E                                      ; get file size
 103+ B55E 4E                                   ld	    c,(hl)
 104+ B55F 2C                                   inc	    l
 105+ B560 46                                   ld	    b,(hl)
 106+ B561 2C                                   inc	    l
 107+ B562 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix			; store size, load address,
 108+ B565 E5                                   push	hl				; get name into ix
 109+ B566 DD E1                                pop	    ix
 110+ B568 06 01                                ld      b,FA_READ		; mode open for reading
 111+ B56A CD 24 B5                             call    fOpen
 112+ B56D 38 17                                jr	    c,.error_opening; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 113+ B56F FE 00                                cp	    0				; was file handle 0?
 114+ B571 28 13                                jr	    z,.error_opening; of so there was an error opening.
 115+ B573 DD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,ix          ; get load address back and size back
 116+ B576 F5                                   push	af				; remember handle
 117+ B577 CD 32 B5                             call	fRead			; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 118+ B57A 38 0C                                jr	    c,.error_reading
 119+ B57C F1                                   pop	    af			    ; get handle back
 120+ B57D CD 46 B5                             call	fClose			; close file
 121+ B580 38 07                                jr	    c,.error_closing
 122+ B582 F1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,af      ; normal exit
 123+ B585 C9                                   ret
 124+ B586              ;
 125+ B586              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 126+ B586              ;
 127+ B586 DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 128+ B588 C1           .error_reading:		    pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 129+ B589
 130+ B589              .error_closing:
 131+ B589 C1           .NormalError:  	        pop	bc	; don't pop into A, return with error code
 132+ B58A D1                                   pop	de
 133+ B58B C1                                   pop	bc
 134+ B58C C9                                   ret
 135+ B58D
 136+ B58D              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 137+ B58D              ; Function:	Save a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 138+ B58D              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
 139+ B58D              ;		ix = address to save from
 140+ B58D              ;		bc = size
 141+ B58D              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 142+ B58D CD 10 B5     FileSave:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 143+ B590 C5 E5                                push	bc,,hl   			; store size& save address
 144+ B592 E5                                   push	hl		        	; get name into ix
 145+ B593 DD E1                                pop	    ix
 146+ B595 06 0C                                ld      b,FA_OVERWRITE		; mode open for writing
 147+ B597 CD 24 B5                             call    fOpen
 148+ B59A 38 12                                jr	    c,.error_opening	; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 149+ B59C FE 00                                cp	    0			        ; was file handle 0?
 150+ B59E 28 0E                                jr	    z,.error_opening	; of so there was an error opening.
 151+ B5A0 DD E1                                pop	    ix			        ; get save address back
 152+ B5A2 C1                                   pop	    bc			        ; get size back
 153+ B5A3 F5                                   push	af			        ; remember handle
 154+ B5A4 CD 3C B5                             call	fWrite			    ; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 155+ B5A7 38 04                                jr	c,.error
 156+ B5A9 F1                                   pop	af			            ; get handle back
 157+ B5AA CD 46 B5                             call	fClose			    ; close file
 158+ B5AD C9           .error:                 ret
 159+ B5AE              ;
 160+ B5AE              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 161+ B5AE              ;
 162+ B5AE DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 163+ B5B0 C1                                   pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 164+ B5B1 C9                                   ret

  19+ B65F              print_boiler_text_l2:
  20+ B65F              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  21+ B65F              BoilerTextLoop:
  22+ B65F C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  23+ B660 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  24+ B661 23           	inc			hl
  25+ B662 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  26+ B663 23           	inc			hl
  27+ B664 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  28+ B665 23           	inc			hl
  29+ B666 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  30+ B667 23           	inc			hl
  31+ B668 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  32+ B669 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  33+ B66A 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  34+ B66C                  MMUSelectLayer2
  34+ B66C ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  35+ B670 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  36+ B673 E1           	pop			hl
  37+ B674 C1           	pop			bc
  38+ B675 10 E8        	djnz		BoilerTextLoop
  39+ B677 C9           	ret
  40+ B678
  41+ B678
  42+ B678              print_boiler_text:
  43+ B678              ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  44+ B678              .BoilerTextLoop:
  45+ B678 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  46+ B679 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  47+ B67A 23           	inc			hl
  48+ B67B 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  49+ B67C 23           	inc			hl
  50+ B67D 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  51+ B67E 23           	inc			hl
  52+ B67F 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  53+ B680 23           	inc			hl
  54+ B681 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  55+ B682 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data

  57+ B685 C5           	push		bc

  68+ B6BE EB                                   ex      de,hl

  72+ B6CA FD 7E 00     .ShiftDecimalDigit:     ld		a,(IY+0)				;Push last digit to post decimal

  76+ B6D4 FE 00                                cp		0
  77+ B6D6 C8                                   ret		z

  32+ C0C2              SRM_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C0C2
   2++C0C2              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C0C2              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C0C2 C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C0C3 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C0C4 23           	inc			hl
   7++C0C5 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C0C6 23           	inc			hl
   9++C0C7 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C0C8 23           	inc			hl
  11++C0C9 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C0CA 23           	inc			hl
  13++C0CB E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C0CC EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C0CD 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C0CF C5           	push		bc
  17++C0D0 D1           	pop			de
  18++C0D1                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C0D1 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C0D5 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C0D8 E1           	pop			hl
  21++C0D9 C1           	pop			bc
  22++C0DA 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C0DC C9           	ret
  24++C0DD

  69+ C130              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  70+ C130              SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair:
  71+ C130 ED 4B 78 99                          ld		bc,(TargetSystemX)              ; bc = selected jump
  72+ C134 ED 5B 76 99                          ld		de,(PresentSystemX)
  73+ C138 79                                   ld		a,c                             ; a = target x pos
  74+ C139 93                                   sub		e                               ; a = target x - present x
  75+ C13A F2 4B C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipX                      ; if > 0 skip next bit
  76+ C13D ED 44                                neg                                     ; c = a = abs a * 4
  77+ C13F CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  78+ C141 CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  79+ C143 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ;  .
  80+ C144 3E 80                                ld      a,src_x_centre                  ; c = a = centre screen - c
  81+ C146 91                                   sub     c                               ; .
  82+ C147 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; .
  83+ C148 C3 52 C1                             jp      .fixY                           ;. now do Y
  84+ C14B CB 27        .NoFlipX:               sla		a
  85+ C14D CB 27                                sla		a
  86+ C14F C6 80                                add		a,src_x_centre
  87+ C151 4F                                   ld      c,a
  88+ C152 78           .fixY:                  ld		a,b                             ; for Y its * 2
  89+ C153 92                                   sub		d
  90+ C154 F2 63 C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipY
  91+ C157 ED 44                                neg
  92+ C159 CB 27                                sla     a
  93+ C15B 47                                   ld      b,a
  94+ C15C 3E 60                                ld      a,src_y_centre
  95+ C15E 90                                   sub     b
  96+ C15F 47                                   ld      b,a
  97+ C160 C3 68 C1                             jp      .RedrawSprite
  98+ C163 CB 27        .NoFlipY                sla		a

 189+ C22D 00 00        PosScan1                DW      0
 190+ C22F 00 00        PosScan2                DW      0
 191+ C231              ; bc = row col, d = xlength e = y length
 192+ C231              ; Check logic simplies to , if 1 = bc and 2 = de:
 193+ C231              ; 12   X1            X2    OK         2 LT X1
 194+ C231              ; 1    X1  2         X2    FAIL       1 LT X1 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 195+ C231              ;      X1  12        X2    FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 196+ C231              ;      X1  1         X2 2  FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X2
 197+ C231              ;      X1            X2 12 OK         1 GT X2
 198+ C231 16 07        FreeSlotCheck:          ld      d,7
 199+ C233 ED 30                                mul
 200+ C235 79                                   ld      a,c
 201+ C236 83                                   add     e
 202+ C237 30 02                                jr      nc,.NoOverflow
 203+ C239 3E FF        .Overflow:              ld      a,$FF
 204+ C23B 5F           .NoOverflow:            ld      e,a                     ; e now equals max length in pixels
 205+ C23C 78                                   ld      a,b
 206+ C23D C6 08                                add     8
 207+ C23F 57                                   ld      d,a                     ; e = max height
 208+ C240 ED 43 2D C2                          ld      (PosScan1),bc
 209+ C244 ED 53 2F C2                          ld      (PosScan2),de
 210+ C248 DD 21 41 C0  .CheckBoxes:            ld      ix,src_printed_text
 211+ C24C 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 212+ C24F FE 00                                cp      0
 213+ C251 28 3C                                jr      z,.SafeToPrint
 214+ C253 60                                   ld      h,b                     ; h will substite for row b as b is used in dnjz
 215+ C254 47                                   ld      b,a
 216+ C255 DD 7E 02     .CheckBoxLoop:          ld      a,(ix+2)
 217+ C258 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; zerolength, not applicable
 218+ C25A 28 29                                jr      z,.NoBox
 219+ C25C 3A 2D C2     .CheckRow:              ld      a,(PosScan1)
 220+ C25F 3C                                   inc     a
 221+ C260                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+2), .NoBox  ; X1 >= BottomLeftX
 221+ C260 DD BE 02    >                        cp     (ix+2)
 221+ C263 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 222+ C266 3A 2F C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2)
 223+ C269                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+0),  .NoBox   ; X2 <= TopRightX
 223+ C269 DD BE 00    >                        cp      (ix+0)
 223+ C26C DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 224+ C26F 3A 2E C2     .SafeToPrintX:          ld      a,(PosScan1+1)
 225+ C272 3C                                   inc     a
 226+ C273                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+3), .NoBox  ; Y1 >= BottomLeftY
 226+ C273 DD BE 03    >                        cp     (ix+3)
 226+ C276 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 227+ C279 3A 30 C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2+1)
 228+ C27C                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+1),  .NoBox  ; Y2 <= TopRightY
 228+ C27C DD BE 01    >                        cp      (ix+1)
 228+ C27F DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 229+ C282 3E FF        .MatchedBox:            ld      a,$FF
 230+ C284 C9                                   ret
 231+ C285 DD 23        .NoBox:                 inc     ix
 232+ C287 DD 23                                inc     ix
 233+ C289 DD 23                                inc     ix
 234+ C28B DD 23                                inc     ix

 351+ C376 CD 70 94                             call	memfill_dma

 352+ C379 AF           SRCCounterLoop:         xor		a
 353+ C37A 3A 63 99                             ld      a,(Galaxy)
 354+ C37D                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 354+ C37D ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 355+ C380 DD E5                                push    ix
 356+ C382 DD E5                                push    ix

 358+ C385 11 5E 98                             ld      de,SystemSeed
 359+ C388 CD 47 9D                             call    copy_seed
 360+ C38B 3A 5F 98                             ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 361+ C38E 4F                                   ld		c,a
 362+ C38F 3A 77 99     SRCcalcLocaldy:         ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 363+ C392 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 364+ C393 79                                   ld		a,c
 365+ C394 90                                   sub		b
 366+ C395 CB 7F                                bit		7,a

 368+ C399 ED 44        SRCnegativedy:          neg
 369+ C39B FE 26        SRCpositivedy:          cp		local_max_range_y

 371+ C39F 3A 61 98     SRCcalcLocaldx:         ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star

 373+ C3A3 3A 76 99                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 374+ C3A6 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord

 376+ C3A8 90                                   sub		b
 377+ C3A9 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 378+ C3AB 28 02                                jr		z,SRCpositivedx
 379+ C3AD ED 44        SRCnegativedx:          neg
 380+ C3AF FE 14        SRCpositivedx:          cp		local_max_range_x
 381+ C3B1 30 34                                jr		nc,SRCtoofar

 390+ C3C5 21 76 99                             ld		hl,PresentSystemX

 441+ C45A 3A 7C 98     local_chart_cursors:    ld     a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 442+ C45D FE 00                                cp      0
 443+ C45F C8                                   ret     z
 444+ C460 17                                   rla
 445+ C461 DC 79 C4                             call   c,src_UpPressed
 446+ C464 17                                   rla
 447+ C465 DC 96 C4                             call   c,src_DownPressed
 448+ C468 17                                   rla
 449+ C469 DC B5 C4                             call   c,src_LeftPressed
 450+ C46C 17                                   rla
 451+ C46D DC D2 C4                             call   c,src_RightPressed
 452+ C470 17                                   rla
 453+ C471 DC F1 C4                             call   c,src_HomePressed
 454+ C474 17                                   rla
 455+ C475 DC FB C4                             call   c,src_RecenterPressed
 456+ C478 C9                                   ret
 457+ C479              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 458+ C479 3A 79 99     src_UpPressed:          ld     a,(TargetSystemY)
 459+ C47C                                      JumpIfAIsZero   src_BoundsLimit
 459+ C47C A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 459+ C47D CA 10 C5    >                        jp	z, src_BoundsLimit
 460+ C480 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save target as we will need it
 461+ C481 3A 77 99                             ld      a,(PresentSystemY)
 462+ C484 90                                   sub     b                           ; get the difference between present and target
 463+ C485 FA 8D C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest           ; if target is right of present, we can go left
 464+ C488                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 40,src_BoundsLimit  ; if no more than 20 then OK
 464+ C488 FE 28       >                        cp     40
 464+ C48A D2 10 C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 465+ C48D 78           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,b
 466+ C48E 3D                                   dec     a
 467+ C48F 32 79 99                             ld      (TargetSystemY),a
 468+ C492 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 469+ C495 C9                                   ret
 470+ C496              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 471+ C496 3A 77 99     src_DownPressed:        ld     a,(PresentSystemY)
 472+ C499 47                                   ld      b,a
 473+ C49A 3A 79 99                             ld      a,(TargetSystemY)
 474+ C49D 4F                                   ld      c,a
 475+ C49E                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 128,src_BoundsLimit
 475+ C49E FE 80       >                        cp     128
 475+ C4A0 CA 10 C5    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 476+ C4A3 90                                   sub     b
 477+ C4A4 FA AC C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest
 478+ C4A7                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 40,src_BoundsLimit
 478+ C4A7 FE 28       >                        cp     40
 478+ C4A9 D2 10 C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 479+ C4AC 79           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,c
 480+ C4AD 3C                                   inc    a
 481+ C4AE 32 79 99                             ld      (TargetSystemY),a
 482+ C4B1 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 483+ C4B4 C9                                   ret
 484+ C4B5              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 485+ C4B5 3A 78 99     src_LeftPressed:        ld      a,(TargetSystemX)           ; we can't move left if target is zero
 486+ C4B8                                      JumpIfAIsZero   src_BoundsLimit
 486+ C4B8 A7          >                        and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 486+ C4B9 CA 10 C5    >                        jp	z, src_BoundsLimit
 487+ C4BC 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save target as we will need it
 488+ C4BD 3A 76 99                             ld      a,(PresentSystemX)
 489+ C4C0 90                                   sub     b                           ; get the difference between present and target
 490+ C4C1 FA C9 C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest           ; if target is right of present, we can go left
 491+ C4C4                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 20,src_BoundsLimit  ; if no more than 20 then OK
 491+ C4C4 FE 14       >                        cp     20
 491+ C4C6 D2 10 C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 492+ C4C9 78           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,b
 493+ C4CA 3D                                   dec     a
 494+ C4CB 32 78 99                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a
 495+ C4CE CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 496+ C4D1 C9                                   ret
 497+ C4D2              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 498+ C4D2 3A 76 99     src_RightPressed:       ld      a,(PresentSystemX)
 499+ C4D5 47                                   ld      b,a
 500+ C4D6 3A 78 99                             ld      a,(TargetSystemX)
 501+ C4D9 4F                                   ld      c,a
 502+ C4DA                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 255,src_BoundsLimit
 502+ C4DA FE FF       >                        cp     255
 502+ C4DC CA 10 C5    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 503+ C4DF 90                                   sub     b
 504+ C4E0 FA E8 C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest
 505+ C4E3                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 20,src_BoundsLimit
 505+ C4E3 FE 14       >                        cp     20
 505+ C4E5 D2 10 C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 506+ C4E8 79           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,c
 507+ C4E9 3C                                   inc    a
 508+ C4EA 32 78 99                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a
 509+ C4ED CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 510+ C4F0 C9                                   ret
 511+ C4F1              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 512+ C4F1 2A 76 99     src_HomePressed:        ld      hl,(PresentSystemX)
 513+ C4F4 22 78 99                             ld      (TargetSystemX),hl
 514+ C4F7 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 515+ C4FA C9                                   ret
 516+ C4FB              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 517+ C4FB 3A 63 99     src_RecenterPressed:    ld      a,(Galaxy)      ; DEBUG as galaxy n is not working
 518+ C4FE                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 518+ C4FE ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,       a
 519+ C501 ED 4B 78 99                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
 520+ C505 CD 70 FB                             call    find_nearest_to_bc
 521+ C508 ED 43 78 99                          ld      (TargetSystemX),bc
 522+ C50C CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 523+ C50F C9                                   ret

 525+ C510 AF           src_BoundsLimit:        xor     a
 526+ C511 C9                                   ret

  28+ C08E                  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C08E
   2++C08E              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C08E              .BoilerTextLoop:
   4++C08E C5           	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   5++C08F 4E           	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   6++C090 23           	inc			hl
   7++C091 46           	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   8++C092 23           	inc			hl
   9++C093 5E           	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  10++C094 23           	inc			hl
  11++C095 56           	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  12++C096 23           	inc			hl
  13++C097 E5           	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  14++C098 EB           	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  15++C099 1E FF        	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  16++C09B C5           	push		bc
  17++C09C D1           	pop			de
  18++C09D                  MMUSelectLayer1
  18++C09D ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  19++C0A1 CD C8 E0     	call		l1_print_at
  20++C0A4 E1           	pop			hl
  21++C0A5 C1           	pop			bc
  22++C0A6 10 E6        	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  23++C0A8 C9           	ret
  24++C0A9
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

 115+ C188 CD 60 E2                                 call	l2_draw_horz_line

 157+ C220              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 158+ C220 11 08 B0     gc_display_find_text:   ld		de,galactic_find_position   ; Wipe input area on screen

 167+ C237 ED A0                                ldi                             ; Copy cursor to local
 168+ C239 3A 26 96                             ld      a,(InputCursor)

 171+ C23E 3E 14                                ld      a,20

 173+ C241 47                                   ld      b,a
 174+ C242 3E 20                                ld      a," "
 175+ C244 12           .SpacePad:              ld      (de),a

 186+ C258 3A D9 C1     blink_cursor:           ld      a,(gcCursorBlink)

 189+ C25F C0                                   ret     nz
 190+ C260 3E 10        .FlashCursor:           ld      a,gcBlinkVal
 191+ C262 32 D9 C1                             ld      (gcCursorBlink),a
 192+ C265 3A DA C1                             ld      a,(gcCursorChar)

 199+ C274 32 DA C1                             ld      (gcCursorChar),a
 200+ C277 C9                                   ret
 201+ C278              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 202+ C278              ; The main loop handles the find key
 203+ C278              loop_gc_menu:           JumpIfMemTrue TextInputMode,AlreadyInInputMode  ;if we are in input mode then go directly there
 203+ C278 3A 5B 99    >                        ld      a,(TextInputMode)
 203+ C27B A7          >                        and     a
 203+ C27C CA 95 C2    >                        jp      z, AlreadyInInputMode
 204+ C27F 3E 4E        .StartFindCheck:        ld      a,c_Pressed_Find                        ;Is F pressed
 205+ C281 CD C4 95                             call    is_key_pressed
 206+ C284 C0                                   ret     nz                                      ;the main loop handles find key
 207+ C285 CD 3C 96                             call    initInputText                           ;Initialise find input
 208+ C288                                      SetMemTrue TextInputMode                        ;Set input mode to true
 208+ C288 AF          >                        xor     a
 208+ C289 32 5B 99    >                        ld      (TextInputMode),a
 209+ C28C                                      SetMemToN gcCursorBlink, gcBlinkVal             ; set up blink
 209+ C28C 3E 10       >                        ld      a,gcBlinkVal
 209+ C28E 32 D9 C1    >                        ld      (gcCursorBlink),a
 210+ C291 CD 20 C2     .DisplayInputbar:       call    gc_display_find_text                    ; now prep the boiler plate input text
 211+ C294 C9                                   ret                                             ; and exit so next interation handles new input as we have to rescan keyboard
 212+ C295              ;Already in input mode post pressing find
 213+ C295 CD 54 96     AlreadyInInputMode:     call    InputName                               ; Call input routine to parse a key
 214+ C298                                      JumpIfMemFalse InputChanged, .blinkNoDelay      ; no key they bypass rest of input
 214+ C298 3A 28 96    >                        ld      a,(InputChanged)
 214+ C29B A7          >                        and     a
 214+ C29C C2 A9 C2    >                        jp      nz, .blinkNoDelay
 215+ C29F              .WasItEnter:            JumpIfMemTrue EnterPressed, .FindEnterPressed   ; if enter was pressed then find
 215+ C29F 3A 27 96    >                        ld      a,(EnterPressed)
 215+ C2A2 A7          >                        and     a
 215+ C2A3 CA B5 C2    >                        jp      z, .FindEnterPressed
 216+ C2A6 CD 2E C2                             call    gc_display_find_string                  ; update string
 217+ C2A9 CD 58 C2     .blinkNoDelay:          call    blink_cursor
 218+ C2AC                                      CallIfMemEqNusng    gcCursorBlink, gcBlinkVal, gc_display_find_string ; on blink we get a double update but we can live with that
 218+ C2AC 3A D9 C1    >                        ld   a,(gcCursorBlink)
 218+ C2AF FE 10       >                        cp   gcBlinkVal
 218+ C2B1 CC 2E C2    >                        call    z,gc_display_find_string
 219+ C2B4 C9                                   ret
 220+ C2B5              .FindEnterPressed:      SetMemFalse EnterPressed                        ; reset enter
 220+ C2B5 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 220+ C2B7 32 27 96    >                        ld      (EnterPressed),a
 221+ C2BA                                      SetMemFalse TextInputMode                       ; leave input mode
 221+ C2BA 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 221+ C2BC 32 5B 99    >                        ld      (TextInputMode),a

 231+ C2D8 4F                                   ld      c,a

 365+ C402 ED 4B 76 99                          ld      bc,(PresentSystemX)

 368+ C40E ED 43 59 E8                          ld      (GalaxyDestinationSystem),bc
 369+ C412 CD F8 FB                             call    galaxy_find_distance            ; get distance into HL
 370+ C415 DD 2A 04 99                          ld      ix,(Distance)
 371+ C419 11 00 00                             ld      de,0

 375+ C425 E1                                   pop     hl
 376+ C426 11 36 C0                             ld      de,galactic_distance

 378+ C42A 32 22 C0                             ld		(galactic_chart_fraction),a
 379+ C42D 2B                                   dec     hl

 383+ C434 32 20 C0                             ld      (galactic_chart_dist_amount+2),a
 384+ C437 2B                                   dec     hl
 385+ C438 CD 69 AC                             call    compare16HLDE
 386+ C43B 38 0E                                jr      c,.done_number
 387+ C43D 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 388+ C43E 32 1F C0                             ld      (galactic_chart_dist_amount+1),a
 389+ C441 2B                                   dec     hl
 390+ C442 CD 69 AC                             call    compare16HLDE

 392+ C447 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 393+ C448 32 1E C0                             ld      (galactic_chart_dist_amount),a
